2a2(rgyud2): dpung thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ rdo rje mi zad pa ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgom par bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor ni//
2a3(rgyud2): rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo rdo rje khros ma dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje drag rtul ma dang / rdo rje snang byed ma dang / rdo rje grag mo dang / rdo rje
2a4(rgyud2): mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnam par snang ba dang / pad+ma gar dbang
2a5(rgyud2): dang / dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje rta mchog la sogs pa yum dang ldan pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o//
2a6(rgyud2): rdo rje nag po chen po// khro bo rnam par byed pa dpal he ru ka'i mdun du gnas pa// rdo rje hUM mdzad drag po de nyid bka' bstod tshul du gnas
2a7(rgyud2): pa'o// gzhan yang sku'i mgon po dang / gsung gi mgon po dang / thugs kyi mgon po dang / mi'u thung gsod byed dang / 'gan d+he 'dzin pa dang /
2a8(rgyud2): kheng 'dzin pa dang / de dag la yang zhing skyong gi tshogs kyi bskor ba'o// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i mthar mkha' mgro mchod pa'i lha mo dang /
2b1(rgyud2): bcas pa dang / lha srin sde brgya dang / chos skyong ba dang / ma hA ka la stag la gnas dang / dpal lha mo re ma ti dang / rngub pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / yang dud
2b2(rgyud2): khrod kyi shing ljon pa chen po rnams la gnas pa'i/ 'jigs byed rnams ni/ 'bar byed dang / gnod byed dang / 'khrug byed dang / skyem byed dang / mi bzad
2b3(rgyud2): pa dang / zil gnon dang / rngam pa dang / sgra sgrogs 'jigs byed rnams/ khro num 'bar ba'i sku/ shin du 'jigs su rung ba'i cha byad du ston pa/ grag
2b4(rgyud2): pe sprin 'khrigs pa dang ldan pa'o// // gzhan yang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i mtshogs/ gnod sprin dang / sha za dang / ro langs
2b5(rgyud2): mi sdug pa'i du ma srin po la sogs pa dpag tu med pa dang / thabs cag tu bzhags so// bcom ldan 'das zhal gsum par snang ba ste/ 'jig rten
2b6(rgyud2): gsum 'dul bar mdzad pa'o// dzad pa'o// phyag drug par ston pa'i rigs drug 'dul ba'o// spyan gsum ni sa dgu dag pa'o// phyag rgya drug gi brgyan
2b7(rgyud2): pa ni/ ye shes drug gi ngo bor gyur pa'o// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par
2b8(rgyud2): bzhugs pa ni/ bde ba chen po yongs su mi 'gyur ba'i tshul lo// gar gyi ro dgu dang ldan pa ni/ skra gsung thugs kyi rol pa yongs su rgyas pa'o// de'i
3a1(rgyud2): mgon chu / @#tshe dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor mas ched du brjod pa/ 'di sngon par brjod do// shing rta ldan pas thar pa mchog thob byed/ spu gri las gyur rgol
3a2(rgyud2): ba tshar gcad pa/ 'phrin las thogs med kun la dbang sgyur bas// mgon pa lcam bral gsang ba dus 'dir sgrub/ ces brjod do// dpal khrag 'tsho khol
3a3(rgyud2): ma las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste// dang po'o// // de'i tshe rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs/ badz+ra b+ha ra hi dang / Da kaM ya mi dang / me hi ni dang / dz+nyA ma ni dang / staM pa ni
3a4(rgyud2): dang tsan Di ka dang / rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa du ma dang / dpal he ru ka la mngon par bstod pa ste/ kun du bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings gsang
3a5(rgyud2): ba'i gnas// pad+ma ge sar chos 'byung ze 'bru'i dbus/ khrag gi rgya che col ma'i klong dkyil nas// keng rus 'jigs su rung ba'i ri stengs su// dbang phyug
3a6(rgyud2): nag po khrag gi ral pa can// lha mo khrag mdog bsnol ba'i bdan steng nas// bdud 'dul hUM las khre chen skur ston pa'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
3a7(rgyud2): ku mdog 'thing nag me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od// a ta da'i rkan rga sgrogs/ khams gsum zil gnon ma lus dbang du bsdud// ral pa khams nag gyen du rjes
3a8(rgyud2): pa las// 'jigs byed khro bo'i sprul pa tsar yang ston// spun rtse dmar po glog ltar 'gyu ba yis// glog stong dus cag 'bebs pa'i char dang ldan// dpal
3b1(rgyud2): ldan rgyal ba yab la phyag 'tshal bstod// rngam mdzad khro gnyer gyen du 'breng ba yis// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i brgyan gyis brgyan// chu rlabs lta bur
3b2(rgyud2): gyur pa'i zhal gdangs pas/ stong gsum 'jig rten ma lus shong ba'i zhal// 'brug sgra drag mo char 'bebs 'khrug la rdum// shangs kyi rdo rje'i tshub mas
3b3(rgyud2): khams gsum 'thor// hUM hUM sgra sgrogs phaT phaT thog 'bebs cing // rdo rje phag mo mnyam rol phyag 'tshal bstod// yab yum bde mchog dag pa'i ngang las
3b4(rgyud2): ni// 'jigs byed khro bo'i sprul pa sprin ltar chags// so dang sen mo ba spu'i bu ga nas// sa gsum khro bo'i sprin tshogs snang ba ni// la lar tshang pa drang song
3b5(rgyud2): stong pas zhi// snying rje chen pos brgya byin zil gyis gnon// la lar gshin rje stong pas rngam par byed// ngo mtshar smad byang klu rgyal bdug pa 'dul// thams
3b6(rgyud2): cad dbang bsdud tshogs bdag stong pas lhag/ bcom ldan pade chog sku la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo'i stobs lnga mi mgo phreng bas brgyan// la lar
3b7(rgyud2): dbang phyug steng pas skyeg par mdzad// la lar khyab 'jug stong pas grag par bston// bdul ka bdul mdzad stag lpags sham thabs can// 'jigs
3b8(rgyud2): pa'i tshon chas srid gsum bsgrol bar mdzad// dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs dkyil dbus// gsang ba dges pa'i gar gyis rol mdzad pa'i/ khyod ni za
4a1(rgyud2): mngon#byed chen po 'jigs pa'i sku/ khyod ni khrag 'thung 'bar ba mi zad pa// bde chen rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de skad ces gsol
4a2(rgyud2): ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mgon po dang / lA ma re ma ti'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten pa dang / las kyi mgon po dang / lha mo dpal med pa'i se so'i 'khor
4a3(rgyud2): dang bcas thams cad / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstod par byed cing gnas so// / dpal khrag mtsho khol ma las gleng blang bas bstong pa'i
4a4(rgyud2): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs de rjelas dpal nag pe chen pos 'di bar du byung ngo // rdo rje mdzad
4a5(rgyud2): gsang ba'i skur bstan pa// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung // bla med mchog gi chos 'di mdzin pa la// bdug pa'i bdud tshogs ma lus
4a6(rgyud2): dam par mdzad// de yang mgon po dang lha mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi dbus na// sku mdog gnag la 'tsher ba ni// rgya mtsho chen po rab tu dngas pa lta bu'o//
4a7(rgyud2): 'chi bdag drug po'i dong ltar 'khros pa'o// phyag gnyis pa ni/ dug shing gi sdong bai lta bu'o// spyan gsum pa ni me tog ban d+hu ri ka ltar ro// sU ni sran
4a8(rgyud2): po ltar thung zhing sbom la gsus pa 'phyang ba'o// klu brgyad kyi brgyan pa ni ljon shing la 'khril ba ltar ro// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs ni/ mdud pas
4b1(rgyud2): bcings pa can no// dpral bar thod pa skam po lngas spras pa ni thod ltar ro// shangs spor zhing ljon spyod pas ni drag po hUM dang phaT kyi sgra spogs pa'o// mi mgo rje/
4b2(rgyud2): pa'i do shal 'phyang ba ni/ bdud tshe rtsad nas bcad pa'o// zhal gyi mchi brtsigs pa ni/ gshin rje'i skyes bu ltar ro// smin ma ni dmar ser glog ltar
4b3(rgyud2): 'khyug pa'o// ag tshem 'bar ba me rig ltar ro// dbu skra gyen du rjes pa ni/ sprin 'khrigs pa ltar ro// phyag g.yas na rdo rje'i gri gug gis ma
4b4(rgyud2): rungs pa tshar gcod pa'o// g.yon na pad snod bdud zhi'i khrag gis bkang nas zhal du rgyun du gsel bar mdzad pa'o// zhabs gnyis gyad gyi dor stabs
4b5(rgyud2): su bkrad nas brkyang skum gyis tshal lo// sku ni ba spu'i bu ga las bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba 'phros pa'i rlong dkyil na bar tu bzhugs pa'o// de'i
4b6(rgyud2): tshe dpal nag po chen po la mkha' 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyis bstod pa// hUM nu skyes ge sar nyi dkyil dpa' bo brkyang skam gar gyi rol pa rab tu 'jigs pa'i
4b7(rgyud2): khro rgyal ni// spyan gsum dmar 'bar phyag gnyis rdo rje gri gug thod bar bdud rnams khrag gis bskangs gsol// stag lpag gos 'chang khrag 'dzag
4b8(rgyud2): bdud kyi mgo rnams phreng bar brgyas pa dang ni ro nyams sbas pa ni/ dpal ldan nag po chen po drag po stobs ldan me dpung dbus na bzhags pa khyod la phyag
5a1(rgyud2): mgo/ 'tshal bstod/ ces pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / las kyi dang / gnas kyi dang / dus kyi dang /
5a2(rgyud2): longs spyod kyi mkha' 'gro rnams dang / rdo rje la sogs pa rigs kyi lha dang / tsan d+hi ka dang / kaM ka ri dang / dza la mu kha'i dang / karma ru bi ne dang /
5a3(rgyud2): mun ti dang / sgra sgrogs ma dang / sgral byed ral cig ma dang / mi sdug ma la sogs pa dang / bya rgod dang / khyud dang / khA dang / lce spyang dang / khyi dang /
5a4(rgyud2): bag dang / stag dang / 'ug pa la sogs pa dang / ka li dang / ma hA ka li dang / ka ra li dang / kaM ka li la sogs pas bstod pa'o// dpal khrag mtsho
5a5(rgyud2): khol ma las gleng spang ba yongs su bstod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dpal he ru ka'i thugs/ dpal gyi be'u las 'od
5a6(rgyud2): zer dpag tu med pa byung ste/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ zhes bya ba du ma spros pa las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
5a7(rgyud2): cad du ltas chen po bcwo brgyad kyis khyab cing snang ba chen pos khyab pa las/ 'od zer tshur 'dus pa'i rtse me las/ mgon po gsang ba chog ces bya ba/
5a8(rgyud2): zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing nag stag zil/ nag po lta bur 'od 'phro ba/ ha ha zhes sgra sgrogs pas rngams pa'i nga ros
5b1(rgyud2): sa gsum thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na gri khug/ 'og man ral gri 'bar brdengs pa/ g.yon na ka pa la'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gsol ba//
5b2(rgyud2): 'og ma na kha Ta kha dang / Da ma ru dang ba dan dang bcas pa 'dzin pa/ klu dbang brgyad kyi rgyan gyis phud kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ rin po che du mas grubs pa/ rus pa'i
5b3(rgyud2): phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ mi mgo'i phreng bas 'chang zhing thod kyis mdzes pa/ thub pa mi skyod pas ral pa'i gcod pan gyis spyi bor brgyan pa/ yid bzhin gyis no
5b4(rgyud2): bus mtshan pa/ skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bu'i de nyid// de nas phyogs bcur khyab byed cing // gdug pa ma lus btul gyur nas// dpag med bstan
5b5(rgyud2): ba rgyas mdzad de// slar byon nag po'i sku la thim// rdo rje hUM mdzad chen po'i sku la thim ma thag tu// shin du drag po'i gdug pa can// thams cad 'dul
5b6(rgyud2): ba'i don du dbang sbyar bar byed do// slar nag po phyag bzhi pa'i rnam pa can gyis pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ tsan dan 'khyil pa'i stabs su
5b7(rgyud2): bzhags so// dus de nyid du zhing skyong gi tshogs thams cad kyis/ dpal nag po chen po la yang dag par stod pa/ dpal he ru ka dang dbyer med ye shes
5b8(rgyud2): bde chen skra lnga dges pa'i gar gyis rol pa yi// dbang phyag gsang ba'i mgon po tshad med phyag ldan dus gsum gzigs shing dpa' bo'i stengs kyi bzhags/
6a1(rgyud2): mgon/ a 'dri'i 'bru dang ral gri 'bar brdengs pa klu dbang brgyan ldan dur khrod kyi brgyan pa'o// dga' ba chen pos lha mo'i tshogs dang ldan
6a2(rgyud2): cig 'khor lo'i tshul gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ces sa 'og dang / sa stengs dang / sa sla'i zhing skyong dang / 'jigs byed brgyad la sogs pa ma lus pa
6a3(rgyud2): thams cad kyis/ mchod cing bstod par gyur pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i
6a4(rgyud2): snying po// nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du rdo rje theg pa che// gsang ba bsdus
6a5(rgyud2): pa yang dag lam// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba yis// snying po 'bras bu lam byed pa// snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du// 'dren pa ldum bral bstan
6a6(rgyud2): ba bsrungs// 'di gsang ba'i ye shes 'dir bstan gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang // de nas dpal he ru kas bka' stsal pa// ma 'ongs dus
6a7(rgyud2): na 'byung 'gyur ba// bstan pa yun du gnas bya'i phyir// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ rgyud kun snying po ngas bshad kyis// mnyam par sbyor ba'i gsang
6a8(rgyud2): chen gyis// dgongs pa bla med bshad pas ni// gsang ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos yang dag gsol pa// rnal 'byor pa dngos
6b1(rgyud2): grub ster ba'i// nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyis// bsgrub pa pos ni gang bsgrubs thabs// lam rims khyad par ting 'dzin dag/ nus pa sngon du 'byin
6b2(rgyud2): pa yis// las tshogs sna tshogs rab dbye ba// don gyur don chen don mthong bas// 'bras bcas 'dir ni gsung du gsol// ces gsol to//
6b3(rgyud2): dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las/ zhu ba pos gleng bsgreng ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / !/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
6b4(rgyud2): bka' stsal pa// rdo rje snying po gus pas nyon// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i phreng bcas pa// las rnams ma lus sgrub
6b5(rgyud2): byed pa// snying po 'od zer spro bsdus so// oM hri ha ha hAM hUM phaT/ oM ha na ma hi/ swA hA hUM/ b+h+r-i sha Ta he/ hUM hAM ho/ phaT haM/ oM baM/ haM yau/ hri maM/ rti r+thi/
6b6(rgyud2): hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka la ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM a/ ma hri/ raM hUM phaT/ oM dz+nyA na tsan ba sha ri ye swA hA/ oM ka l-i/ ma ha ka li/ ka ra li/ kaM ka la hUM hUM phaT/
6b7(rgyud2): oM ma hA ka la ya g+ha na hri ta hUM phaT/ oM hri hI hUM hUM phaT/ ces gsungs so// oM ma hA b+hai ra ba sarba si d+hi da ya ka TaM hUM hUM kaM hAM Da/ sku'i sngags so// na mo badz+ra kro ta
6b8(rgyud2): shri ma hA ka la he pe shwa ra ya/ yo ga ma ma pa ra me tri ka ru ni ka/ hri ma hA ka ru nI ka sarba bya tri pra shA ma na ka ra ya/ sarba du pa tra ma ni shA na ka ra ya/ shri badz+ra kro d+ha maH
7a1(rgyud2): mgonaka la sid d+ha lo ki sha ra ya/ ma hi ni sha tsa ra shwa ra na ya na ba la rgyu pa b+he sha d+hi ri/ tri su ra da ha/ ni sha ra ma haR+Sha t+yA pa shri ma ha/ d+ha ka Da ki n+yang ya/
7a2(rgyud2): sha ra d+ha ma ha ta b+hug+h+na tsa ma Ni b+ha sa na ya/ oM shri badz+ra kro ta mahA ka la ra ta na/ ka ba wa kud+ha ra ya/ sarba sid+hi shwa ra ya/ ma hA ka li krit+ta dzi ta dza Ta mA ku ta pra la~M b+ha/ be ti/
7a3(rgyud2): sad twa la ka ti kran ta/ ma hA sad twa b+hi ra ma hA/ shri badz+ra kr-i ta ma hA ka la sha t+yA b+hi ga nan/ sarba pa la ha ri ma hA dz+nyA na ma ha b+he sha na po k+Sha naM/ sarba b+ha ye duSh+Ta tra bA ra ya ma hA/
7a4(rgyud2): oM shri badz+ra kro ta ma hA ka la sarba bzhinan/ sarba sha truM/ mar ya ma ra ya/ mar d+ha ya mar d+ha ya/ s+phoT s+phoT/ hU~M phaT/ a kar sha ya a kar sha ya/ pu tsa tang /
7a5(rgyud2): nam/ mahA mas/ kha kha kha hrI khAhrI/ ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra kro ta ma hA ka la/ sarba sid+d+hi pra yang tshan du/ kArma ku ru ku ru/ bid+d+he ba d+hA ya ba d+hA ya/ sarba
7a6(rgyud2): sa~Md+d+hi ba d+he hi ts+tsha hU~M phaT swAhA// oM shre badz+nyA ma hA ka lak+Shi k+She tA bi ga nan bi na la gnan hU~M hUM phaT swAt+ma/ oM k+Shi ha can pa shA ri hUM shriswA hA// oM oM la~M ku li ke shwa ri he swAhA/
7a7(rgyud2): oM ma man ha~M shi rat+na sh+mi taM/ oM ma hA ka li bi ka re la kr-i/ kAk+ShaM hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM hrI han+d+ha tra~M phaT/ or tsa car ya/ tsam+ba ya hUM tri/ oM tsa tsa mun d+hed had /
7a8(rgyud2): bcab tsa/ oM ri b+he lingi b+hI tra g+h+ri hrI hUM hU~M phaT swAhA/ 'khor li'i sngags so// oM ka Di me dza hUM/ oM trik+Sha a mu kaM/ a ga ts+tshan ti ya~M/ dbang gi spyan
7b1(rgyud2): sre go/ oM dzaM a mu ki/ ka mi d+he ba/ u mu ka s+ye ha ka ra hi/ haHhaHhaHphaT/ mes shang ma na ya ho dza swAhA/ dbang du byed pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA/
7b2(rgyud2): ka la ra mo ra sarba a tha d+he wi na tha ka ya bag tsa ti sad+hi ku ru hUM/ oM kAM sa ma ya sid d+ha d+he sa ya hUM swA hA/ oM dza la ye wa hUM/ rigs pa bslab pa'o// oM wa ra
7b3(rgyud2): wa ra/ pra wa ra pra wa ra hUM/ thos pa 'dzin pa dang / mi brjed pa'i bzungs thob par 'gyur ro// / dpal khrag 'tsho khol ma'i rgyud las/
7b4(rgyud2): gsang sngags 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas las rnams rab bsgrub pa'i// sna tshogs grub pa gsang ba bstan/ 'khrul
7b5(rgyud2): 'khor phyi nang dbye ba yi// 'byung ba mchog tu gyur pa'o// oM a b+ha ga ban na bo d+hi sad tA ma ha ka la ru ni ka/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka ra la b+hi ka ra li b+hi/ bi ka Da
7b6(rgyud2): ShA ra/ hu lu hu lu/ kI li ki li/ ma ha kaM ka la ha la/ kle shri ba~M ba ma tsa hUM ma hA nang d+he sha ra ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis nyi ma re re la/ lan bdun du bzlas nas
7b7(rgyud2): rdong pa dkrus nas/ skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// chu 'grub pa la phreng ba bye zhing / sha Ni skud pa la gsom rgyas pa thogs la/ lha'i
7b8(rgyud2): nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ las thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba la/ oM hAM tsi sarba sidi d+hi Da ka ya swA hA/ ces ni ma re res zhing brgya phrag re bzlas pas/
8a1(rgyud2): mgonazla ba drug na rnal 'byor pas gang yid la 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang ru ta'i chus khrus bya zhing rtsa ku sha'i bstan
8a2(rgyud2): la 'dug ste/ yi ngam rtul shugs dang ldanu pas/ sngags khri phrag lnga sngags ste/ mgon pa'i rten gyi mdun du nyal na/ rmi lam gsal par 'char ba/ dus
8a3(rgyud2): dang byab thams cad 'grub par ston te/ oM mu so ba ni ga ka tha ya tAM/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri Ni nan ta ya/ san ka tha ya hU~M phaT swAt+na/ ces so/ mo h+nA sha Na kangi tha tu/
8a4(rgyud2): rung/ zla tra ba la pus nying ku ru swA hA/ ces pas tsa tsi d+ha ma ni la sdigs stong phrag bzlas te/ 'bru'i phung po la btor bas/ 'bru 'phel te khyim par 'gyur ro/
8a5(rgyud2): / yang rgyas pa'i sreg rdzas me tog ser po chu dang nags las byung blangs te/ sbyin sreg tu bya zhing / oM kha ng+ga rang nam Ni butsahUM/ badz+ra ag nI swA hA/ ces pas
8a6(rgyud2): gong zag lngas nor rdzas rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// / nang ri mizhi bar 'do na/ me tog dkar ba gang yang rung ba la sngags te/ oM tra/ mazen nu/
8a7(rgyud2): bab pa te/ rdzu nga / ces stong phrag lngas 'grub ste// gta ma dang bcas pas so// dpal khrag ma tshe khol ba'i rgyung las su rgyam
8a8(rgyud2): 'grub pa'i me'u ni dran pa'o// / de nas las ma tshogs pa'i byed pa grub pa dang bcas pa rab tu bshang bar bya'o// rdo rje byi khyung gi ti
8b1(rgyud2): 'dzin dang ldan pas/ sman sna tshogs dang 'bras kyi phyi ma las bamar me'i 'o mas sdus te/ ril bu rin po che'i gzhong bar bzhag te/ oM badz+ra b+hA run/ za bar/
8b2(rgyud2): sha dza dza/ ha ha hUM phaT/ oM mu ha pra bar sha ya ha/ hri b+ha ri sha ya sa ta ya swA hA/ ces klu yong ba'i gnas su phyin la khri prag lngas 'grub po// des char
8b3(rgyud2): dbab pa'i sbyor ba'o// yang na char ches na wa'i shas bsreg cing // oM k+ShaM u u phaT ya phaT ya/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ b+ha dza g+ha dza/ ru ra ru ra hUM phaT/ aSh+Ta \u0f7f
8b4(rgyud2): naM kha kha kha hI kha hI/ u u/ oM ma hA pradz+nyA pa ya hUM hUM phaT phaT me b+ha sa pra ya hUM phaT/ ces stong phrag lngas sprin bral ba'i cho ga'o// oM a g+ha ru Na ban d+ha/
8b5(rgyud2): bya khyud 'ching ba ste swA hA// oM mdza a mu kaM taM pa yaM/ staM ba ya hUM phaT swA hA/ ces 'di la sngon du khri phrag cig song bas gang dang gang la spel tshig dang
8b6(rgyud2): bcas pas lta stangs kyi sbyor ba can de/ bstan+da dngos po srog dang ldan pa 'am ma yang rang bar byed do// oM dza maM me rang sog/ oM dze chu rang so// oM kha
8b7(rgyud2): ke haM dza yau swA hA/ ral gri la sogs pa reng par ro/ oM dzaM ma raM khu ba reng ba'o// oM pra pa ra ha/ ha ha dza rab tu dbug pa'i sngagaso/ oM ru a b+hi du la/ rmugs
8b8(rgyud2): bar bya ba'o/ oM hi te Sh+Ta he ba hAM/ Da ki 'ching bar byed pa'o// oM so phug ya li hAM oM maM dzaM bya rab tu skas pa ste shing lo la sngags pas rgyun phyogs gtor na'o//
9a1(rgyud2): mngon/ de nas bza' bsrung ba ni/ nag pa'i tshes brgyad la khrus byas stag gyi lpags pa la 'dug pas lha khyab 'jug mdun du 'khor lo/
9a2(rgyud2): thogs par lta ste/ oM dza hi li hi li hUM ma ha sa na sha ra tsi raM kha kha hUM phaT/ oM ti du kha hUM phaT swA hA/ ces yaM shing 'bras so ba la sogs pa la rta ga dang sbran
9a3(rgyud2): bsrung bar 'dod pas/ 'ol ma zi/ me tog kun Da la sngags la/ oM hri hU~M ba ta ga bu dzo da ya k+Shi phaT/ dza la hUM dza/ ces chu la bsngags nas rtor bas/
9a4(rgyud2): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phran tshogs las 'di snyan pa yang / 'jig rten tha mal rtog pa rnams/ rab zhi nges pa'i don rtogs pas sgyu ma lta bur spyad par
9a5(rgyud2): bya'o// // dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// phyi rol thun mongs ma'i las bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas gsang ba
9a6(rgyud2): bshad par bya/ dpal ldan mgon po ma lus dang // lha mo bar snang klog 'gyu ma// grub gter snying po sbas pa'o// oM ma hA ka la ha na ha na
9a7(rgyud2): badz+ra ra hUM phaT/ oM ru ru ro ru b+he tiSh+Ta ba sto si tsa pa la ag shug ma b+h+yo dza/ oM ru ru ro ru b+he tiSh+Ta ba to si/ rag ma tsa ti kha rag mo hA b+h+yo/ oM shri dwe ba tsa mun
9a8(rgyud2): ti ra ka ta/ tsa mun ti sing ga mor d+ha/ ke sangi ha si ha/ khu khe ka ra ha ra/ ki la ki la/ pra k+Shi ti ta sa na sa ta/ b+h+rUM b+h+yAM laM laM ta ma/ ka pa la ma ma d+ha ri/
9b1(rgyud2): Ni n+d+ra d+hU phaT phaT swAhA/ oM b+hi ha d+ha pa gu ye/ ba ga byA klas ye/ oM ban bu d+ha ra/ oM saM ma la ye/ ma ma ni sho na s+yai/ kron d+ha ka ka ra s+ye/ u lu ka s+yen
9b2(rgyud2): ga ru na sa gu s+ye/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha r+ya ka ma/ sa~M ga na le tra ya/ sing ga la dzA ta ya/ ku ru ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ka thu ma ma ha k+ka lpa/ sa ma ya
9b3(rgyud2): ma nub la ya/ dz+nyA na sha~M pa na/ raka sha pa la/ med d+ha mang tsa/ mang sha/ pus dzu/ du ga/ d+he ba/ b+han d+ha/ ma la~M/ i ma b+ha ling / kha khA b+hitA b+hing+ga/ ka wu
9b4(rgyud2): ma ha ka la ya/ ma ma sarba duSh+Ta/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya/ ma hA ka la sa klungs ma ra ma ra/ sa traM ma hA ra ka ta kha hi/ sa traM ma hA ba su ta kha hi/ sa truM ma ha ma pA hi/
9b5(rgyud2): ba traM ma ha maM sa kha hi/ sa truM ko ni ri kha hI/ sa hUM ma hA go ro tsa na kha hi/ sa hUM ma ha tsirta kha hi/ hUM hUM phaT phaT b+h+yo b+hu ya yAM/ oM ma hA ka li d+ha ba ba ra ga/ a bkra
9b6(rgyud2): na b+ha/ dar wi ra kra ba pa ni ru krokr-i ni/ wa ra ya ni/ wa ra kha ya ka sa sa/ ya b+h+rUM d+h+waM/ phaT phaT/ kA ru ta a kar sha ya hUM phaT/ bong nag po/ gru lpags dum du/
9b7(rgyud2): gro ga la bris la zangs su gril/ rdo lcags len/ kha spu can dang bsdebs la/ sngags nyer cig gis rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ mtshon cha'i che ba bzlog
9b8(rgyud2): par 'gyur ro// // dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyis gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
10a1(rgyud2): ma cu #/ de nas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i rim/ khyad par gnas ni gang shis par// sgrub po dam rig ldan par bsgrub// dur khrod la sogs
10a2(rgyud2): pa'i rnakha' 'gro dang // shin rje gnas pa'i sa phyogs te// shar phyogs su shing rkang cig pa 'am// byang phyogasu mtsho gling gi 'gram/ dur khrod yod pa 'am/
10a3(rgyud2): nub phyogs su mkha'agro dang // ma mo gnas pa'i brag dmar khang stong dang bcas pa dang // lhor ni grag nag po zur gsum gsum pa/ ma mo sha za srin po
10a4(rgyud2): gnas pas/ ro bsreg par byed pas/ lce spyang 'du ba 'am/ nub byang na rgya mtsho'i gling la brag ri mo ral pa gzings pa lta bu 'am/ byang shar na ri'i rtse mo
10a5(rgyud2): la gnod sbyin gyi me 'bar ba'i sa dang / shar lho na dbang phyug dang dbu ma'i rten gnas pa dang / lho nub na dug shing mi ro langs pa lta bu'i nags tshal yod
10a6(rgyud2): ba ste/ lha ma srin dang ma mo 'du ba/ bye sha zan drag po sna tshogs 'du ba/ gcan zan sna tshogs rang skad 'byin pa'i gnas de dag tu dpal nag po chen po
10a7(rgyud2): yab yum sgrub par bya'o// dur khrod kyis nag po blangs la/ dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi pa/ mi ro'i rgyus pas thig btab pa/ khrag chen la sogs
10a8(rgyud2): pas dmar nag tu byugs par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi mtshon gyi ro'i ska'i stag gus bri gar bya'o// sgrub gnas lho nub nub byang nas/ dug shing 'dug pa'i shing
10b1(rgyud2): las ni/ rtsa brtse mo ma log pas// bcas de mgon po lcam bral gyis// sku bzhengs brgyan dang ldan pa la// rab tu gnas shing mchod pa bya// yang na rngo nag
10b2(rgyud2): blangs nas ni// sku'i bri tshad dang ldan pas/ mchod cing stod te ma gsol nas// 'jigs byed dbug dang snyim par bya// byang shar dkyil 'khor gyi zur
10b3(rgyud2): du ni// tshal chen mar me bsregs spos bya// dpal ldan lha me'i rten dgram bya// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor zur// dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sku//
10b4(rgyud2): zhing gi gden la bzhags par bya// med na de'i gzugs snyan steng // shar lho'i dkyil 'khor zur la ni// thod dum bu cig par ni// 'bru nag las
10b5(rgyud2): byas dpal can ni// sha chen khrag dang nya sha chang // la du khur ba po li dang // dug gi me tog ar+tha dang // thun pa'i dam rdzas bzhag par bya// nub
10b6(rgyud2): byang dkyil 'khor zur la ni// rdo rje gri gu bsreg rdzas dang // ni rang shu'i bur bu bzhag/ dkyil 'khor zur gsum logs gsum la// thod pa
10b7(rgyud2): khrag gi bkang ba dang // las mkhan rnams kyi gtor ma bsham// sgrub pa'i gtor d+ma sang ba yang // ras nag gis bkab gting bar bya// sha khrag dmar gyi b+ha
10b8(rgyud2): ling khrag/ dus dus phul la phrin las bcol// ska gsung thugs kyi rten dang ni// yon tan phrin las dam tshig rten// skyes pa grir shi'i tsi ta ta dang //
11a1(rgyud2): @zung med zi ga'i ban dang / cinathong bsrung lo tsa// 'dud kyi ldang ldanas// mdzad rdzas khyang bar chags pa/
11a2(rgyud2): zhing zhig yang gzhi'i ba dan bcas// bskyed bskul gzhal yas khang de ni// / dur khrod rab tu 'bar ba bsgom pa las/ dkyil 'khor dang rten
11a3(rgyud2): mchod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas ji ltar bsgrub pa'i rim pa gsang ba bshad par bya'o// de yang rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/
11a4(rgyud2): mchod pa gtor ma la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas rnams dbul bar bya// rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// byang sems tshad med bzhi ldan gyis// sems
11a5(rgyud2): bskyed tshogs bsag sngon du 'gro// dur khrod kyi shing la sogs pa la// yang na sa nag po la yang ngo // dpal nag po chen dang // lha mo re ma ti'i sku// gtso
11a6(rgyud2): mtha' dang ldan pa// bzhengs pa la rab tu gnas pa ste/ nan pa chen po dang / rabal lha mo mngan gsum bltar bags sa/ gnyis su med par rgya
11a7(rgyud2): brjod pa dang gton ma sogs pa yang // bsreg par bya'i bdug smos kyang dbul bar bya'o// mdun gyi nag pe chen po ni bka' snod kyi nag pa rme
11a8(rgyud2): bor shes par bya'o// bsam gtan la zhugs ting 'dzin gyis// lcags kyu zhags pa'i gzugs kyi ni// sngags kyi 'od zer sngo bar bya// de nyid
11b1(rgyud2): shin du gsal bas so// thugs kha nas thugs kha'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas/ rjes nas rang la bsdu zhing / dus gsum du mchod pa dang / gtor ma
11b2(rgyud2): la sogs pas las las rgyun mi chad par byas la/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs par mchod cing bsgrub par byas la/ dpal nag po chen po mngon gsuM
11b3(rgyud2): pa ltar gyur te/ rnal 'byor pa de don thams cad ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag mgon po'i thugs kha ra/ snying dbus su 'od zer 'phro srog gi thig le
11b4(rgyud2): las// rtsa'i 'khor lo nye dkyil zla gnas pa// yi ge phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba blta// de nas 'od bsdus mi dmigs bsam gtan bya// dus dang
11b5(rgyud2): grangs dang mtshang ma ste/ dang po bar dang tha mar yang // gtso bo dang ni las mkhan 'khor// gang ba grub rab 'bring tha ma ste// rtags kyi mtshan ma bstan
11b6(rgyud2): pa yin// rgyu ni thogs med rdo rje yis// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste// mngos gsum yang dag 'byung ba la// gang gis dgag par ma gus pa/
11b7(rgyud2): de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung // gang du thogs med rdo rje yis// snying po bla na med pa'i don// yang dag ye shes snang
11b8(rgyud2): ba po// // bla ma'i drin gyi thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang dag bshad bya ba//
12a1(rgyud2): @#gsang bsngags kyi 'khor lo las// lha'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nyid// lan tshwa chu rgyun 'bab pa'i ngang // gangs kyi thigs pa bdud
12a2(rgyud2): rtsa'i chu// me tog ma dang gsal snang pa yis// ge sar ze 'bru ldan pa la// 'dab rgyas ye shes nyi shar bas// rang khrol mdangs 'bar rab tu rgyas// rdo rje
12a3(rgyud2): rin chen ral gri dang // 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs dag las// 'khor ba'i rgyun las 'od zer 'phro// steng 'og dag las rim par ni// 'khrug cing
12a4(rgyud2): gcod pa'i gri gug gis// las dang phrin las rang 'byung du// byed cing bskul ba'i las sgrub pa// phyi nang gsang ba rim gsum du// dbab dang sngags
12a5(rgyud2): pa bzlog pa ste// rtsa ba yan lag bzhir 'gyur ba// dang po thun mongs rgyu las ste// gnyis pa bye brag dbye ba dang // bskyed pa ye shes mi ldog pa// lam
12a6(rgyud2): du gyur par phyag rgya che// snying po cig las dus gsum du// 'gyur med de nyid dbye ba nyid// gcig las du ma'i ngo bo nyid yin// 'jig rten pa dang ye shes
12a7(rgyud2): che// mi 'gyur ba dang 'gugs pa dang // las rnams byed pa srog gyur pa'o// // dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// ting 'dzin gas
12a8(rgyud2): ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba thun mongs ma yin pa// ngo shes phyir mi ldog pa'i don//
12b1(rgyud2): snying dbus srog gnas mi shigs pa// rtse mor gyur pa kun bskyed bzhi// mtshan nas brjod pa mthun mongs pa// de ni bde ba ming tsam yin// gsang ba thun
12b2(rgyud2): mongs ma yin pas// myur du bskul ba las byed 'gyur// yang snying gsang mtshan rang dbang med// len cing 'dzag pas don grub pa'o// 'phrin las bskul
12b3(rgyud2): byed drag sngags ni// brjod pas theg dang glang mtshan bzhin// gar gtad rgyug cing 'joms par byang // ma yengs ma khyal mi yur bar// gsang sngags mang/
12b4(rgyud2): du bsnyen pas 'grub// dpal ldan mgon po yab yum la mos shing // dam tshig sdom gnas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa pos// gnas nas phun sum tshogs pa dbyen
12b5(rgyud2): pa der// bsnyen pa'i dus skyon dang yon tan gyis// gus pa byed las rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// nye snyen lha mo 'khor bcas lcam bral gyis// nyi zla lta bu'i
12b6(rgyud2): tshul ni dngos dang mnyam// mtshan mo 'char byed khyad par gsal ba yis// sgrub pa'i rims pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la sogs// phyi nang rten rdzas bca'
12b7(rgyud2): gzhi dus shes pas// bsgrub dang bsgrub chen rim pa rtogs par bya// dus dang grangs kyi bsgrub pa las gang yin// las la sbyar ba dus shes par bya// tsa'i
12b8(rgyud2): gnas las 'byung zhing 'jug/ la la ra ra lar phreng ba snyad// lugs byung lugs las bzlog par byed// thig le da 'bar ba las// glog gi 'od gzer
13a1(rgyud2): mgo/ @#ltar 'od 'phro ba// dri med nu rgyun dag gis khyab// chu shing rlo ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin// 'khor lo bskor ba ldang bar 'gyur// spros bcud
13a2(rgyud2): bsdus la snying po blang // 'dis ni khams gzhan len par byed// de las mgon po nye bar 'grub// dam tshig ye shes dbyer med par// gsang ba'i bsnyen pa ting nge
13a3(rgyud2): 'dzin// thun mongs dam tshig la gnas pas// lha mo mgon po dges par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog gnas la// dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed//
13a4(rgyud2): de nyid phyag rgya chen po yis// dbang du bsdad pas thams cad skrun// kun bzang mchog tu 'phel ba nyid// lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba/ gsang ba thabs dang shes
13a5(rgyud2): rab las// yab yum sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// thig le 'dus pa dges pa'i rtags// rnam dag rnam na mkha' nor bu ni// rdo rje pad+ma gnyis med las/
13a6(rgyud2): mtshan med mnyam pa rter mchog thob// / dpal ldan khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// rdzogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
13a7(rgyud2): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ khyad par dur khrod chen por ni// rol pa'i mgon po chen po dang // lha mo 'khor bcas sgrub par bya// bstan pa rin chen bsrung bar
13a8(rgyud2): bya don du// rnal 'byor lus kyi las rnam che spang // dge slong dag cing tshang par spyod pa mchog/ mi dge rab zhi byang chub sems ldan pas// 'gro la ltas te rtag
13b1(rgyud2): par sgyu ma'i sku// bde ba mtshan bcas spro dang bsdu ba dag/ lha'i rnam pas brtan g.yo khyab par bsam// mnyam rjes gnyis med 'od kyi khyab pa'i ngang // nga rgyal drag
13b2(rgyud2): brtan 'gyur med lhar dag pas// tha ma la rtog pa dag pas sgo gsum gyi// bar chad rab zhi 'gyur med brtan par 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba ang
13b3(rgyud2): ma ko haM// oM badz+ra ka la sha// ma hA ka la ma ma sarba ka ya dz+nyA na i d+hi Sh+TA na// badz+ra na ma d+he wi dz+nyA na si d+hi oM su ka ta hUM// / dpal ldan khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud la/
13b4(rgyud2): lus dag par bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / rnal 'byor ngag gi las ni smra ba spyod// rkyen rnams spangs te sngags kyi 'khor lo nyid// a li ka'i
13b5(rgyud2): brjod pa thams cad kun// brag cha'i sgra snyan snang ba lam du byed// ngag byed tshig dang yi ge brjod pa rnams// sgra bcas sgra med srog rtsol rab 'gog pas// yid la
13b6(rgyud2): byed pa bsam gtan bzlas pa la// brtson pas snying po nye snying sa bon las// phreng ba phyogs ltar lding ba rab 'byed de// 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs spro dang ldan//
13b7(rgyud2): rang gzhan thams cad sgrib pa dag don du// bzlas pa sngags kyi nus pa mngon du 'byin// oM sarba ta tha ga ta wa ge badz+ra swa b+ha ba// ad ma ko haM// oM badz+ra ga la sha/
13b8(rgyud2): ma hA ka la ma sarba bad dz+nyA na aSh+NI na ba d+he wi// dz+nyA na sid+hi i su ka ta aM// / dpal ldan khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las/ ngag dag par bya ba'i le'u ste brgya
14a1(rgyud2): mngonabazhi pa'o// // rnal 'byor yid kyi las ni log lta spangs// nyon mongs rtogs pa chags sdang zhi bar spyod// skye
14a2(rgyud2): 'gro ma rnams byams dang snying rje yis// byang chub sems kyi tshad bzhi ldan du/ dpal ldan he ru ki go 'phang mchog/ bdi chen tshe 'dir thog bya dmigs pa'i
14a3(rgyud2): yul// mtshan med pa dngos rnams rang dag pa// stong nyid spros pa med pa'i ngang dag tu// rtog pa sna tshogs rgya mtshor rlabs thim ltar// rang 'byung zhi chen po
14a4(rgyud2): gdod nas dag/ rang grol sbrul mdud gsal ba mi rtog pa// na mkha'i ngang du sprin tshogs deng pa bzhin// 'bad pa med par rtog bral bde ba che// 'gro la rtse
14a5(rgyud2): bas snying po mi 'gyur mchog/ 'di nyid mar me rang gsal mun sel ltar// bag chags dri ma dag par gyur pa na// ye shes mgon po rang grub de nyid de/
14a6(rgyud2): snang ba med pas lha rnams 'dud par 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsi taM badz+ra sa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM badz+ra ka la sha/ ma hA ka la ma ma sarba ta tsa badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha na/
14a7(rgyud2): badz+ra na ma d+he wi/ dz+nyA na sid d+hi hUM/ su ka ta hUM// dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// sgo gsum dag pa'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o//
14a8(rgyud2): de nas gzhan yang 'dir bstan pa// sgrub po rnal 'byor pa dag gis// sgo gsum nus dang mthu ldan pas// gsang ba gsum gyi rdo rje grub// rin chen dbang gi
14b1(rgyud2): rgyal po ltar// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub// pad+ma rgyas pa g.yas 'khyil du// chos bdag so sor rig pa mchog dri med dpal po rdo rje ni// mi byed bad
14b2(rgyud2): chen ye shes so// dpal brjid 'bar bas rab tu mnga'// phyag rgya lngas ni rab tu mdzes// mtshan dang dpe spyang yongs dag pa// sku'i mgon po phyag 'tshal lo//
14b3(rgyud2): snying po sngags kyi phreng ba yis// nga ro 'brug sgra chem chem sgrogs// gzhan pa'i gad mos ri rab skyel// gsung gi mgon po phyag 'tshal stod// he ru ka dpal
14b4(rgyud2): gnyis med pa'i// nag po mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug gtso// snying rjes 'khros zhing gdug pa 'dul// thugs kyi mgon po phyag 'tshal stong// dpal khrag
14b5(rgyud2): mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// sku gsung thugs dag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan 'jigs byed pa'i// mchog tu gyur pa bshad
14b6(rgyud2): bar bya/ rigs kyi mgon po gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor gang du byas pa nyid// ma lus bde ba chen po las// ye shes bla med 'dir bstan pa'o// dang por
14b7(rgyud2): thugs kyi mgon be ni// pad+ma zla ba nyi ma la// hU~M yig thig les spros bsdus/ zhe sdang rnam par dag byed cing // 'gro ba sbyang nas brtan g.yo kun// 'od tu zhu nas
14b8(rgyud2): mgon po bskyed// rdo rje 'bar ba sa non bcas// rdo rje zhing khams chen por na// rdo rje'i bkod pas kun khyab pas// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin ste// rdo rje'i
15a1(rgyud2): dkyil 'khor chen por ni// dpal ldan gsang ba yongasu rdzogs// zhal cig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// 'thing nag 'od 'bar bde ba che
15a2(rgyud2): rgyan rnams thams cad kyis sbas pa// dur khrod chen por bzhugs pa ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gnyis med pas/ rdo rje rigs kyi lha mos bskor// nam sa man ta ka ya
15a3(rgyud2): wa ka tsi ta badz+ra ni// badz+ra ma hA ka la badz+ra DA ki ni hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a b+hi Shats+tshi d+hu/ mi bskyod pa yi dpur brgyan pa// thams cad du ni dbang bskur bas/
15a4(rgyud2): chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag cing // ye shes bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas// dges pa mchog tu rol pa'o// dpa' bo rdo rje'i rtse mo las// ma skyes dri med 'od 'bar
15a5(rgyud2): bas// ud dpal 'dam ltar rnam par dag/ rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po phyag 'tshal lo// // dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu bdun
15a6(rgyud2): pa'o// / yon tan rin chen rigs dag pa// de nyid gsal ba'i mgon pa ni// pad+ma zla banyi sa la// hUM yig 'thing nag spros dang bsdus// nga rgyal
15a7(rgyud2): rnam par dag mdzad cing // 'gro ba srung nas brtan g.yo rnams// 'od du zhu nas mgon po bskyed// rin chen 'bar bas sa bon bcas// rdo rje rin chen zhing
15a8(rgyud2): khams ni// nor bu'i bkod pa kun du rgyas// thams cad rin chen rang gzhin te// yid bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ni// dpal ldan gsang ba yongs su rdzogs/
15b1(rgyud2): zhal cig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mthing nag bai DUr+ya ltar gsal// rin chen rgyan ni du mas spras// dur khrod rngam par bzhags pa ni// rin chen mkha' 'gro gnyis med
15b2(rgyud2): 'khril// nor bu rigs kyi lha mos bskor// na mu sa man ta ka ya wa ka tsita ta badz+ra na/ oM badz+ra ma hA ka la/ rad na Di ki ni traM// oM sarba ta tha ga ta rang na a b+hi Shin
15b3(rgyud2): tsa traM// dkon mchog rin chen dbu brgyan pa// thams cad du ni dbang bskur bas// mnyam nyid ye shes rnam dag cing // rin chen gcod paN dbu brgyan pa// dges
15b4(rgyud2): pa mchog tu rol pa'o// yan bzhin nor bu'i gter ldan pa// yon tan dbang phyag mdzad mnga' ba// rgyal mtshan 'byung gnas nag po che// ran chen mgon khyod
15b5(rgyud2): phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// rin chen le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// // gsung mchog pad+ma chags pa med/
15b6(rgyud2): de nyid rims dag gsal ba'i mgon// pad+ma zla ba nyi ma las// hUM yig mkha' spro spu'i 'od// 'dod chags dag pa'angam skyes rtags// 'gro spangs gnod bcu
15b7(rgyud2): dngos po rnams// 'od du zhu nas dpal ldan gsal// pad+ma 'od 'bar sa bon 'bar// rdo rje pad+ma'i zhing khams te/ pad+ma rdo rje'i dkod pas rgyas// pad+ma 'dab
15b8(rgyud2): rgyas thams cad khyebs// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por ni// dpal ldan gsang ba yongs su rdzogs// zhal cig phyag bzhi spun gsum pa// ud dpal
16a1(rgyud2): mdog sngar lakhriste// rin chen bad+ma dums smras// ngur khrod 'bar ba 'dzin par ni// pad+ma rigs kyi lha pos bskor// nams na ta/
16a2(rgyud2): ka ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra na// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la pad+ma Da ki ni hri// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma a b+hiShin tsa hri// tshe dpag med pas spyi gtsug mdzes// dges pa
16a3(rgyud2): gsang ba bla na med// kun dgu ye shes dpe med pa// ma chags pad+ma ge sar rtags// chos kyi dbang phyug bde chen po// pad+ma rigs kyi mgon po khyod la bstod
16a4(rgyud2): / dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud las// pad+ma'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / sna tshogs phrin las kun khyab pa// don grub rngon mi za ba'i mgon// pad+ma
16a5(rgyud2): zla nyi gnas pa la// hUM yig sngo nag las spros bsdus// phrag dog dag pas na mkha' ltar// 'gro sbyangs gnod bcud thams cad kyang // 'od du zhu zhing thim pa
16a6(rgyud2): las// rdo rje rgya gram sa bon bcas// sna tshogs khams khams ste// rdo rje ral gri bkod pas rgyas// ral gri 'bar bas thams cad khyebs// ral gri'i dkyil
16a7(rgyud2): 'khor chen por ni// dpal ldan gsang ba yongs su rdzogs// zhal cig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// rgya mtsho gnag ltar gsal ba'i sku// sna tshogs rdo rje du
16a8(rgyud2): mas spras// dur khrod dges pa gsang bar ni// las kyi Sha kis bde bar 'bar// ral gri'i rigs kyi lha mos bskor// nam sa man ta ka ya wa tsi ta badz+ran
16b1(rgyud2): oM ma hA ka bi sha ba ki khaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shin tsa khaM/ don yod grub pas dbu rgyan pa// 'phrin las thogs med rab bsgrub pa'o// 'phrin las kun la dbang
16b2(rgyud2): sbyar bas// rlung shugs mtshan ldan stobs rdzogs pa// nus pa'i ye shes las byed pa// // sna tshogs mgon po phyag 'tshal lo// las kyi rigs bstan pa'i
16b3(rgyud2): lo'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / bde gshegs rgyal ba lhun grub sku// sangs rgyas mgon po phyag n+d+he// pad+ma zla nyi la bzhugs pa// hUM sngon 'thing ka rin chen
16b4(rgyud2): ltar/ gti mug dag pas rgya mtsho che// 'gro sbyangs brtan g.ye ma lus pa// tshur 'dus 'od phung yongs gyur pas// 'khor lo 'bar bas sa bon ldan// 'khor
16b5(rgyud2): le rtsibs stong zhing khams ste// rdo rje 'khor lo bkod pas spras// 'khor lo rtsabis ldan kun du g.yogs// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por ni// dpal
16b6(rgyud2): ldan gsang ba thams cad la// zhal cig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// char sprin mdog 'dra yongs su gsal// 'khor la dums mdzes shing klubs//
16b7(rgyud2): dur khrod rab tu sgra sgrogs par// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yang dag sbyor// 'khor lo rigs kyi mkha' 'gros bskor// nam sa man ta// ka ya wa tsi ta badz+ra na/
16b8(rgyud2): oM badz+ra ma hA ka la/ babide Da ki ni b+h+yAM// oM sarba ta tha ga ta/ b+hud d+ha a d+hi Shiny+tsa d+h+waM// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu brgyan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byur pa//
17a1(rgyud2): mgon #de nyid nga bdag gsang rdzogs pa// chos rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings las mi 'gyur zhing // de zhin nyis kyi stobs mchog lnga/
17a2(rgyud2): byams pa chen pos ma rungs 'dul// bde gshegs mgon po phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rigs mgon le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan
17a3(rgyud2): mgon po yis// bla med mchog gi bla ma yis// dkyil 'khor phyi nang gsang ba yis// yang dag byin brlabs dbang bskur bya// ye shes gsang ba mchod rdzas ldan//
17a4(rgyud2): gsol btab bsnyen pa rtags gsal bas// bsgrub pa snod ldan rim pa la// ye shes lam mchog rjes snang ba'o// sprul pas 'gro ba 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas
17a5(rgyud2): bstan pa bya'i phyir// di ring rigs kyi skal ldan la// sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bstan no// oM shri ma hA ka la/ na tha d+he ba ka la// a d+hi Shin tsa hAM// ces brjod do// bla med
17a6(rgyud2): sku gsung gsum dngos grub rnams// gsang sngags brjod du med pa'i don// nus pa mchog tu ster gyur pa// dril bu dbyangs nyid rnal 'byor bzung / oM badz+ra na
17a7(rgyud2): ma ma hA ka la b+ha ga g+han d+he shab ta bu tsa a b+hi Shin tsa hUM/ thugs rje chen pos don grub pa// ye shes mi bskyod rnal 'byor pas// rtul shugs chen pos 'bad med par/
17a8(rgyud2): rdo rje mi 'gyur dbang bskur ba'o// oM shri ma hA ka la badz+ra bo te tsi a b+hi Shin tsa hUM// 'dul 'dul mdzad drag po che// zhing skyong chen po'i phyag rgya ni// gcod byed
17b1(rgyud2): gri bu 'bar ba yis// mngon gcod ye shes dbang bskur ro// oM shri ma hA ka la na tha grin+ta a b+hi Shi nA tsa hUM/ dngos rnams log rtog bcom nas kyang / sna tshogs 'go
17b2(rgyud2): ba'i phreng ba ni// bdud dang mu stegs tshar bcad phyir// yon tan rgyas byed bzung bar gyis// oM shri ma hA ka la/ ka pa la ma la a d+hi Shin tsa hUM/ las rnams bsgrub
17b3(rgyud2): cing bstan pa skyong // rnal 'byor 'phrin las dbang byed pa/ nus pa tshar gcad phur pa yis// mi gnas btab pas sbyin par bya// oM pra tha ma hA ka la/
17b4(rgyud2): ki li ki li ya/ a b+hi Shi na tsa hUM// dam tshig rje su 'dzin byed pas// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang bsdud phyir// btor ma'i gsang ba sbyin pa 'dis// dus kun du ni sbyin
17b5(rgyud2): par bgyi// oM shre ma hA ka la sa ma ya b+ha li ta a b+hi Shin tsa hAM// de nas so so'i lhas dbang bskar gsal ba las// yid dam dpal nag po chen po'i sku gsung thugs yon tan
17b6(rgyud2): 'phrin las nus pa la mchog thob par bsngags pas// phrin las bzhi nus pa so so la nus pa brtan par bya ba ste// bskal ldan khyod kyi gdul bya la// sna tshogs
17b7(rgyud2): longs spyod 'phel byed pa// phan dang bde ba sgrub gyis la// rgyas pa'i 'phrin las grub par gyis/ oM ma hA ka la na thA ta ru s+thi ta me ni rang na a b+hi Shi Na tsa a/ ces
17b8(rgyud2): brjod// 'di ni dngos grub kun gyi gnas// thod pa an+ti sa bkang ba 'di// 'gro ba rjes su bzung ba'i phyir// dbang gyis 'phrin las grub gyur cig/ oM ma hA
18a1(rgyud2): mgon#ka la na tha ka pa la ra byan a b+hi Shany+tsaH hUM// 'di ni ma rungs 'dul byed cing // bdud las rnam par rgyal ba yis// gcod byed ral gri
18a2(rgyud2): 'bar ba yis// drag po'i las rnams grub gyur cig/ oM ma hA ka la na thA kha ra ka tsaN+Da a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM/ lus ngag yid gsum nyams pa rnams// rab zhi rtse gsum
18a3(rgyud2): 'bar ba 'das// ye shes sku gsum rtogs gyur nas// zhi ba'i phrin las dbang bskur ro// oM shri ma hA ka la/ kha TaM ga d+ha a d+hi Shany+tsa hUM/ khyod la sku gsung thugs
18a4(rgyud2): nyid kyi// mthu stobs nus dpag med rnams// zhi rgyas la sogs las chen rnams// nga lta nyid du 'dir grub 'gyur// dpal ldan nag po chen po la// phyi nang gsang ba
18a5(rgyud2): gsum gyis mchod cing // lha mo las mkhan pa bkol ba'i phyir// rdo rje dril bu Da ma ru// rnal 'byor spyir sbyin par bya// yang dag don ldan mchog don du// rnal 'byor
18a6(rgyud2): rtul shugs ldan// gsang ba 'dzin par byed pas na// nam yang 'bral bar mi byed cig/ ces pas gsang ba 'dzin pas rjes su gnang ba sbyin zhing / sngags brjod
18a7(rgyud2): mchod stong // gtor ma dbul lo// dbang gi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang lcam bral gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi
18a8(rgyud2): rdo rje yis// nus pa dpag med thob bya ba// byin rlabs dbab pa rab tu brtag/ gang du dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing // dam la bzhag par bya ba ste// rdong pa
18b1(rgyud2): g.yogs dang ldan pa yis/ gsol ba gdab pa sngon 'gro bas// dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa nyi// 'greng thabs su lus ngag rlung gi sbyor ba can// sha chen dang gu bul
18b2(rgyud2): bsreg cing // rol mo dang ldan pas so// slob ma rnams la sems bskyed dang ldan pas/ dag pa'i sngags brjod pa'i rjes la// mgon po zhal cig phyag gnyis bri bus
18b3(rgyud2): thod pa can// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang bzhugs pa// nyi zla'i steng na gar stabs mdzad pa dang / bla ma dang dpal he ru ka yab yum du bzhugs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi
18b4(rgyud2): dbus na ye shes kyi mgon po phyag bzhi pa'i thugs kha'i sa bon las// 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas/ rang bzhin gyi gnas dang / grub pa'i gnas las sku
18b5(rgyud2): gsung thugs kyi mgon po las kyi mgon po dang / lha mo dang / nag po stong dang sha za 'bum/ ma mo bye ba/ mkha' gro bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pa/
18b6(rgyud2): na mkha' la sprin ched pa lta 'am/ kha ba bu yug tshub bzhin du byung bas/ so so la thim par blta zhing / oM ma hA ka la badz+ra na thA/ ka wu wa ki la ya e be sha ya/ a a/
18b7(rgyud2): ces drag sngags drag tu brjod do// yang na so so'i lus kyi lte bar pad+ma nyi ma la gnas pa'i mgon po phyag bzhi pa gar mdzad cing gnas gsum gyi Da ki ma thams cad byang ste/
18b8(rgyud2): bdag gi ba spu'i bu kha nas thim pas/ lus ngag yid rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlobs par byed pa'o// oM ma hA ka la ya/ wa pu sha ya Da ki ni ka ya wag tsi ta
19a1(rgyud2): badz+ra naM/ a be sha ya a a/ ces brjod pas ye shes dbab par bya'o// rjes rig pa rang grol dang la bzhag/ ye shes mgon po 'khor bcas
19a2(rgyud2): kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis/ lus ngag yid la gang babs pa/ mthong sna mtshan ma g.yo ba 'byung / rtags gang byung las rim pa yis// ye shes nus
19a3(rgyud2): pa 'phrin las ni/ khyad par gsal bar spyod yul du/ 'byung bas log non shes par bya// // byin brlabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// //
19a4(rgyud2): de nas gzhan yang las grub pa// zhi ba'i rim pa bstan par bya// gnas ni phun sum tshogs pa der// bya ba'i rim pa mchod gtor gshams/ dkar phyogs rdzog dang dus
19a5(rgyud2): sprod lam// sems bskyed nad dang gnod pa dag/ zhi phyir spro bsdus lam bkod nas// mgon po lha mo gsal bskyed la// ye shes stim zhing 'phrin las bcol//
19a6(rgyud2): oM ma hA ka la ya a yu ma yo su Nu sarba sid d+hi ma ma ku ru ye swA hA/ oM ma hA ka la swa a d+ha ste/ ma ma sarba sA tA ShA/ a yu dz+nyA na sid d+hi pu r+ye me ya dza ya swA hA/ oM pu N+ya d+ha d+hi ye
19a7(rgyud2): swA hA// oM s+thidI Sha Na ti ye hUM swA hA/ oM saM b+ha ri Ne hUM swA hA/ oM ban d+hA ri Ni hUM swA hA// bcud len ldan pas cung za sogs/ las las sman gyi zhi bar byed/ 'khor lo ldan
19a8(rgyud2): bas rtags byung ba// sgrub pa po yis bcang bar bya// 'di yis tshe 'phel nad gdon zhi// yon tan nor bu gter bzhin du// // dngos grub khyad par don 'byung bas
19b1(rgyud2): dpal stobs gzi brjid mi zad thobazhi pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan nag po ni// 'phags pa la sogs 'khor dang bcas// gnod sbyin dang
19b2(rgyud2): du byed pa ste// 'phrin las thogs pa med pa 'grub// gnas dus bcas pa'i rims pa rnams// yongs su dag pa rin chen dbyig/ dam tshig bskyed cing ye shes sdom/
19b3(rgyud2): rdzas ni nor bu sman 'bru sogs// mchod dang gtor ma tshul bzhin du// rin chen khang rtsegs dbus su ni// mgon po lha mo gang mdzes dang // 'brog gnas la sogs
19b4(rgyud2): rin chen gyis// char 'bebs grub ster ba'o// sna tshogs rgyas pa'i las mdzad pa// oM ma hA ka la rang na d+he d+ha d+hi/ d+he ba pa la sid+hi/ ma ma ku ru ye swA hA/ oM yak+Sha pu
19b5(rgyud2): Na b+had tra ye hUM/ oM su dad d+ha a rgya li yak+Sha li ye swA hA/ bsnyen pa'i sngags ni shus tshad bzlas// mngon gsum bzhin du gsal bar/ oM swa N+ya d+ha d+hi ye hUM phaT/ oM smi
19b6(rgyud2): du ra Na ti hUM phaT/ oM sang b+ha ri ni hUM phaT/ oM sa d+ha ri ni hUM phaT/ mngon sum rmi lam nyams la yang // rtags ni gsal bar byung ba ste// sa g.yo ba dang 'brug sgra dang /
19b7(rgyud2): shing thog thu dang 'bras char 'bebs/ khang bzang ske phyi gter rnyed dang // dpal be'u rab 'bar 'bru srogs spel// rgyal po bskor bcas 'grub par 'gyur// rgyas
19b8(rgyud2): pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas dbang gi las brtan pa// gsang ba yang dag sgrub pa ste// gnas dus rdzas dang gtor ma la// brten nas stobs
19b9(rgyud2): las sgobs pa'i
20a1(rgyud2): mgon rgyud dang myos byed kyis// thun mngos pad+ma b+han dza las// tshar bcad rjes bzung 'phrin laso// dpal ldan mgon po yab yum ni// sku mdog pad+ma
20a2(rgyud2): ra ga ltar// 'od 'bar phyag mtshan brgyan rdzogs pa// Da ki brgyad bcas gar byed pa// sa gsum dbang du byed pa nyid// spro bsdus bsgrub bya'i lus bkug ste//
20a3(rgyud2): rang la 'dud byed mos par bsam// yang na de dag yin pa'i// snying khar ye shes yab yum dang // las mkhan spros pas gar byed cing // srog dang rnam shes
20a4(rgyud2): bsdus nas kyang // lha rnams rang la thim par bsam// rang nyid nus pa rgyas par bsam// oM ma hA ka la ya/ dz+nyA na swa ri ni/ karma na tha/ na maHa mu kaM/ mo pa sha ma na
20a5(rgyud2): ya hau/ dzA dza/ ces pas so// gtor ma dag la bsgrub stim/ 'od du zhu ba bdud rtsir gyur// des ni myur du 'grub par byed// thal na sgo dang srog la tshe// rang la bdud
20a6(rgyud2): 'gyur zhi bar byed// yang na gro ga dar dang ras// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rtsa sngags bcas/ kha phyed tsan+da rgya rgyags kyi// mu khyud ming spel bcas pa bri// de bzhin
20a7(rgyud2): 'og tu bzhug sku yis// mnga' gsol rab gnas mchod pa bya// nyi shu la sogs sgrub par bya// // gsang ba grub par the tshom med// dbang gi sgrub pa'i le'u
20a8(rgyud2): ste nyer drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// sngon bsregs las ni gsang ba bshad// sbyin bsreg me lha mchod pa dang // thab khung gasreg
20b1(rgyud2): rdzas so shing sogs// 'dug phyogs gos dang kha dog dang // bsgrang 'phreng dgang gzar thugs bzar rnams// sngags dang srel tshig 'phrin bcol// mchod dang gtor
20b2(rgyud2): mgo rims bzhin// sems bskyed dus kyi khyad par dang // kun la sbyar ba shes par bya// las thams cad pa sbyin bsreg// bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun
20b3(rgyud2): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ mgron po rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ sgrub pa'i rims pa bstan du gsol// ces zhus pa dang / dpal
20b4(rgyud2): ldan he ru kas bka' rtsol pa// dpal ldan nag po sgrub pa ste// dkon mchog pa ma 'gro sogs la// gang zhig gnod byed gdug pa'i bsgrub bya de// snying rjes sgrol
20b5(rgyud2): bar byed pa'i rdo rje mgon po bskyed// e las chos 'byung de nang 'khrag mtsho khol ma'i dbus// de'i steng du paM las pad+ma 'dab rgyas pa// raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM bcas
20b6(rgyud2): gri gug te// de dag slo bsdus gyur la spyan gsum zhal cig pa// mgon po nag po phyag gnyis dbu skra gyen du 'bar// lus thung zhal gdangs mche rtsigs bsus
20b7(rgyud2): pa 'chang // pad+ma nyi ma'i steng du ro'i gdan las ni// g.yon rkyang g.yas skum rdo rje gri gug dang // g.yon na thod pa khrag gyis bskang dang rtse gsum 'phyangs// mdzes
20b8(rgyud2): ba'i mi mgo bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i phreng bas brgyan// zhal nas khrag 'dzag 'jigs pa'i klus brgyan sku mdog gnag/ de ltar bsam nas ye shes mgon po sran drangs rgya
21a1(rgyud2): / #de la sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yis ci rigs mchod// ye shes lha ni dam tshig de la stams// lha'i nga rgyal yang na de'i mdun du ni// bsgrub bya'i
21a2(rgyud2): mang spel snying po yang snying 'di ltar bltas// oM ma hA ka la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA ka la g+hun hri d+ha hUM phaT/ bsgom dang bzlas pas skyon mchod dang gtor ma sbyin/
21a3(rgyud2): der ni yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ljang khu bskyed/ me rlung sbyor bas bdud rtsi'i thig ler gzhu byas la// sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcad de la 'bru gsum bsam/ oM a hUM
21a4(rgyud2): gis byin gyis brlabs te dza hUM ba hos mchod// rgya chen gtor ma bshams la hUM las 'od kyang 'phro// de'i khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyang dgug byas nas/ de rjes sngags
21a5(rgyud2): 'di yis ni chos skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ oM ma hA ka la b+hi ka la pa/ kaM b+ha la/ ba raM mi maM b+ha la~M/ pra ti tsa/ hUM hUM phaT phaT sAhA/ de nas dpal ma hA ka la de
21a6(rgyud2): pa stong / 'gron la 'dzin las bzhin du kha dog bsam byas nas// sngags rings nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas par byas nas ni/ de bzhin gtor ma'i sngags ni nyi shu rtsa bdun
21a7(rgyud2): bzlas/ de rjes kha dog bzhini ltar gtor ma'i phyag rgyas sbyin// gshegs gsol bzod byas dam tshig bsrung dang de rjes byar/ dpal khrag mtsho khro
21a8(rgyud2): ma'i rgyud las// nag po rang rkyang bsgrub pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'phrin las bsgrub par byed pa'i gang zag gis/ drag po'i las
21b1(rgyud2): la 'bum mo bdun gyi bsnyen pa bya/ oM ma hA ka la/ sarba sha tru baM/ da ha da ha pa tsa btsa d+han me ke na ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ dur khrod ras sam gro ga'i ana'i lo ma la/ dug
21b2(rgyud2): dang khrag gi 'khor lo rab tu bris pas la/ sgrub bya'i ming spel sngags kyang de ru bsam byas la/ kha sbyar ba'i thod dbus la de'i lte ba la// 'khor lo bzhug pa sgrub bya'i
21b3(rgyud2): ming spel sngags dag bzlas// de ltar 'khor lo mdun rgyab kha sbyor bcug byas nas// ling kha'i yan lag 'khor lo brgyad kyang bzhug/ shing cag sdong bur sor
21b4(rgyud2): ni nyi shu nyer cig pa// de skos de'i nang du lang ga sgrig par bya// de rtsin kun sha'i gzugs snyan byas nas ni// yar ngo mar de'i brgyad dam bcu gcig gang rung cig la/
21b5(rgyud2): nyin mtshan phyed kyi dus su shing gi rgyab phyogs bcings// de yang tsha ba gsum dang sgrub bya'i zag sbas dang // srin lag rak+Sha dug dang ra dzi ti de bzhin te/ dug shing 'o ma
21b6(rgyud2): dur khrod thal lang thang dang / ni pa'i shing dang tig ta gro ga'i shun pas bri// chu bo'i 'gram dang phung shul grog khar bsre byas la/ phye mar byas te ling ga sgrub pa'i rnal
21b7(rgyud2): 'byor pa yis ni// sgrub bya'i ming spel dkyil 'khor khar bzhug byas la// sngags bshed pa ska shi'i gzugs rnyan tshang byas de'i// lus de la ni spra tshal gyis ni
21b8(rgyud2): khyab par byug par bya// rgyab phyogs tsher ma sna tshogs dpung zhing dpral ba dang // mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang ba spyi bo ru/ lcags kyi phur ba btab pa drag po'i thab
22a1(rgyud2): mgon/ khung du/ sgrub bya'i mgo ni rang gi phyogs su bstan byas la/ kha ni nub phyogs ltas pa'i de'i rdong la ni// dur khrod thal bas byug
22a2(rgyud2): cing rdo rje brgya khrab gyis/ kha bcad bzhin du ni ci rigs cho ga bya// // drag po'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dbu pa'o// // de nas sgrub pa'i rim
22a3(rgyud2): ba thab khung phye la// sgrub bya'i de khas phub bzhag pa lha mo'i bzhi'i// nga rgyal gyi ni sngags rings brjod cing nyung dkar brab// tsha ba gsum dang skye dub sna
22a4(rgyud2): rnams kyis byug// thod gsum skyed 'bras gsum me la sro// bu gul sha chen dang sres pa drag pa'i spos kyis bdug/ slar yang sngar bzhin cing nyin mtshan re re
22a5(rgyud2): la// lan no gsum gsum bdug bya de nas bzlas pa'o// oM badz+ra ma hA ka la ya// sha sa na/ a pa ka ri/ e ShA/ a pas ts+tshi/ ma hA ka la a laM/ i d+han
22a6(rgyud2): mam shar+tha/ dz+nyAn ta/ b+ha li d+ha ra ma~M/ rang tra yA/ a ba ka ra na/ ya tig pra tri ga d+ha/ slar med d+ha/ i bas te mduSh+Ta 'ang+ga/ kha kha khA s+t+rai ShA hU~M/ ma
22a7(rgyud2): lA ma rA ya/ b+h+r-iHg+h+raM b+hU/ b+har d+ha b+hanad+ha/ han ha na/ da ha daha pa tsa ba tsa/ d+hin me ke na/ dwe ba tAng tra ma/ sarba duSh+Ta/ na ma ren d+hu hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor ma dang
22a8(rgyud2): sbyin bsreg bzlas pa'i 'phrin las rnams// 'di la la rten nas las rnams 'grub ste yang na ni// oM a ra li ho// dza hU thaM tso/ badz+ra Da ki ni/ sa ma ya
22b1(rgyud2): tra/ ldanaH/ oM an+ta sA ma/ / rtu tu d+ha/ su/ rA/ 6/ 6\u0f7f/ sa @N+Da2/ a sa ba / oM / nupa da m+b+ha/
22b2(rgyud2): d+hi pa/ g+ha d+ha/ pa ri/ swA hA/ ji srid rab dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum gyi bar// rtags mtshan ma byung bar du gsang ba bzlas pa bya// sngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste sum
22b3(rgyud2): bcu pa'o// / de ltar ma byung ba'i dus su sbyin bsreg gis/ thab khung ni zhal zhal nag po byug par bya// de'i dbus su rtse gsum rdo rje gri gug bri/ kha khyer gri
22b4(rgyud2): khug rtsegs pas bskor bar bya// de'i 'ag mu khyud gnyis pa ni// me ris 'khor bar bri// gsum pa la ni rdo rje'i phreng ba bri bar bya// ye shing drag po'i tsher ma thab khung
22b5(rgyud2): haM du rtsig/ gtor ma lha bshos rdzas kyi tha ma bskor// de rjes sngags pas kha lhor lhas te skra grol nas// rang lhar mdun du mgon po bskyed ye shes bstim// mchod
22b6(rgyud2): pa byas nas bsreg rdzas rnams ni dbul bar bya// sgog skya nyungs dkar mi thun rus pa'i phye ma dang // sha chen la sogs sha sna'i ling ga'i gzugs brnyan ni// zhib tu
22b7(rgyud2): bdungs nas til tsam sngangs rings sbyin bsreg bya// bsreg rdzas re re'i grangs ni brgya brgya bul bzlas pa yin// sngangs rings lnga brgya thon nas sbyin sreg tshar cig rdzogs//
22b8(rgyud2): de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sprin sreg byas na tshar bdun gyi// zla ba bdun nas sgrol bar 'gyur te the tshom med// // rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyin bsreg bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu
23a1(rgyud2): mngon/ #rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas nag po chen po'i thugs kha'i kha sbyor las// pad+ma nyi ma'i steng du gdan la hUM las ni// lha mo zhi bsdus
23a2(rgyud2): ste 'di rnams so// nag po chen po skrag byed ma dang ke rus ma// dus mtshan rnams kyi sku mdog rim bzhin du// nag dang ser mo dkar mo ldang bar shes par bya// kun kyang
23a3(rgyud2): zhal cig phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa 'dzin// sgrub bya'i mgrin par zhags pas btab te bkug par bsam// gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni// phyogs skyong rgyal chen bzhi
23a4(rgyud2): bskor bar bsam nas ni// lce sbrang khyi dang khA ta 'ug pa sbrul sogs kyi// dgra bo'i lto ba dpral nas sgyu ma za bar bsam// bden pa bdar cing dkon mchog gsum
23a5(rgyud2): sogs la/ rnas pa byas na dpa' bo'i 'khor rnams khyod kyi shes/ snying rje ldan par thabs kyis lam du 'jug pa'i phyir/ rgya cher cho 'phrul rnams kyi bya ba kho nar zad/
23a6(rgyud2): 'di yis sgo nas dbugs mi smra bar byed pa dang / 'od gsal bral dngos med kyi rnam pa yin/ dpal ldan thabs kyi mchog ni ston par byed mod kyis// // byang chub
23a7(rgyud2): dri med thob par bya ba rang bzhin med// lha mo bzhi'i spro bsdu bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu ste gnyis pa'o// !/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// nag po chen pos
23a8(rgyud2): gsang ba yi/ yab yum gnyis su med pa yi/ lha'i rnal 'byor cho ga ni/ de ltar bsams gtan rim pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' rtsal pa/ khrag
23b1(rgyud2): mtsho khol ma'i dbus las/ 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i sdong po'i steng / dur khrod 'bar ba chen po'i gzhal yas na/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la/ gnas pa'i rdo rje nag mo chen po
23b2(rgyud2): sku shin du gnag la 'tsher ba/ 'thing nag rngam par bzhugs pa/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje sngal phra mo dang me 'bar ba 'phro ba/ bskal pa'i meng phung 'bar ba'i klong
23b3(rgyud2): dkyil na// sprul pa'i khro chung dpag tu med pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'phro ba/ 'phros pa'i spyan gsum me stag ltar dmar ba/ zhal gdang zhing mche ba zla ba tshes pa ltar
23b4(rgyud2): gsal brtsigs shing ljags 'gril ba/ dbu skra dang a ga chom dang // smin ma thams cad dmar ser gyen du khyil pa// zhal cig pa phyag bzhi pa las g.yas kyi dang po
23b5(rgyud2): shing thog b+he ta'i 'bras bu bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na lha ma yin gyi thod pa'i nang na bdud bzhi'i khrag gis bkang nas/ zhal du gsol zhing khrag rgyan rab tu 'dzag pa/ g.yas
23b6(rgyud2): kyi 'og ma na ro lad kyi lce las byung ba'i ral gri 'bar ba gdengs pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma kha TaM kha dar sbyangs can/ ba ma ru dang ldan pa/ sku slad stag gi lpags pa rlon pa
23b7(rgyud2): yan lag ma nyams pas bkris pa/ klu brgyad kyi brgyan pa ni/ sbrul dkar pos dbu skra bcings pa/ dmar pos sna brgyan/ ser khras mgul brgyan pa/ nag pos
23b8(rgyud2): zhabs lbub/ ljang khras phyag rdug/ sngo pra yi se ral khar thogs pa/ smag nag gis ska rags su byas pa/ thal skyas lhu tshigs thams cad brgyan pa'o// rin po
24a1(rgyud2): tshe'i dbu brgyan las/ rigs lngas dbu brgyan zhing 'phro ba/ rin po chen do shal dang / se me do la sogs pa/ nor bu du mas spras pa/ bdud btal
24a2(rgyud2): ba'i rus pa'i phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ dar dpyangs kyi gcod pan 'chang ba/ dar dpyangs kyi gcod pan 'chang ba/ spyi bor yid bzhin gyi nor bus mtshan pa/ thub pa mi skyong
24a3(rgyud2): pa dbu'i btsug gtor la rab tu gnas pa'o// de'i sku la rab tu 'khril ba'i yum btum pa'i dbang phyug ma ni/ sku mdog sngo sangs ma/ zhal cig ma/ zhal cig me/ phyag
24a4(rgyud2): gnyis ma/ spyan gsum dmar la rab zla pa/ zhal khro 'dzum phyag g.yas pa/ gshin rje'i lce 'dri'i gri gug brdengs cing sdigs pa/ g.yon pas mu stegs sgral ba'i thod pa khrag gis
24a5(rgyud2): bskang nas ya ba la stob pa/ dbu skra ser zhing 'bar ba grol ba/ phyag rgya lngas rab tu brgyan pa'o// yab yum rdo rje dang pad+ma gnyis su med pa snyoms par zhugs pas/ mchog tu mi
24a6(rgyud2): 'gyur ba'i bde chen po la rab tu brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis steng gar gyi rol pas bzhags pa/ dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras yang dag par bskul ba/
24a7(rgyud2): thod pa skam po lnga lngas dbu la brgyan pa/ mi mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzag bzhin pa lnga bcu'i sgyu ma'i thag pas rgyus pa ni/ bdud kyi bde dpon bzhi bcu zhe dgu/ dga' rab dbang phyug dang
24a8(rgyud2): lnga bcu bsgral ba'i dus kyi'o// yul la yang thod pa cung zad skam pa'i phreng ba yang de rnams kyi chung ma rnams bsgral ba'i mgo bo rnamaso// tsaN bal 'khyil pa'i rngang thabs dpa' bo
24b1(rgyud2): mchog tu 'gro ba'i gom g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ g.yon phyed dkyil du gyur pa'o// zhal nas sngags kyi rngam pa'i nga ro rab tu sgrogs pa ni// tshang ba la sogs pa yang
24b2(rgyud2): 'dar bar byed/ sku gzi brjid chen po tshad med pa/ thugs snying rje chen po dang dbyer med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ngang la rab tu gnas so// dpal ldan he ru ka'i sprul pa mchog/
24b3(rgyud2): bdug pa kun 'dul gsang ba'i mgon po ni/ yab yum rnal 'byor bya rog sprul pa 'gyed// // thub pa'i bstan bsrungs 'phrin las thams cad mdzad/ rab tu gsal
24b4(rgyud2): bar gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ dpal ldan lha me'i ting 'dzin bstan/ sa bon snying po mchog gyur pa/
24b5(rgyud2): bskyed cing bsdus pa mngon du byas/ dpal ye shes mgon pa'i g.yon logs su/ g.yu mtsho sngon ma'i 'gram ru/ rlung chub dmar nag gi nang du/ rdzu 'phrul stobs
24b6(rgyud2): ldan gyis bong bu ga dmar la/ zhing rgyus kyi mthur byas pa/ srin mo'i ma mgal dang ya 'gal snga ru dang phyi ru byas pa/ zhing chen gyi rga stan/ zhing chung gi rga g.yog can/
24b7(rgyud2): sbrul nag gi gong thag gong sleng byas pa/ ru sgra phrug gu stsol nas sba logs byas pa/ skra gong du b+h+yo mthing nag las/ lha me re ma ti/ zhal cig phyag bzhi ma/ spyan
24b8(rgyud2): gsum 'khrol ba/ zhabs gnyis tsan dan dkyil brkyang bskam/ ral pa'i thor rtsug g.yas g.yon du 'khyil ba// ral ba'i zeng bus khams gsum dbadad
25a1(rgyud2): mngon#bsdud pa/ snyen cha g.yas nas sing ge ral dmar can mtshungs med du 'phongs pa/ g.yon nas bskul nag gi rdeng ka 'phyo ba/ gnyis ka
25a2(rgyud2): nas gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba/ sku stong la glang chen gyi lpags pa dang / zhing lpags kyi g.yang bzhi mgul du bkris pa/ sku spad la re lde nag po dang / gzig
25a3(rgyud2): dang stag gi lpags pas shams thabs su kris pa/ rin po che dang rus pa dang / sbrul gyi brgyan pa/ mche ba zur gsum du cung zad rtsigs pa/ khro gnyer 'bar
25a4(rgyud2): bta phyag g.yas dang po ral gri me 'od 'bar ba can/ 'og ma smra bya'i mnan po can gyi shag ti/ phyag g.yon dang po na thong rlon dmar gyi bkang ba gsol ba/ 'og
25a5(rgyud2): ma tri shu la rtse gsum pa 'phyar ba ba dan skyod pa/ thod phreng lnga bcu se ral ka byas pa/ dpral ba'i dbyings nas zla ba 'char ba/ pa lte ba'i dkyil nas nyi ma mchar ba/
25a6(rgyud2): dbang gi lcags sgrogs zhags pa 'khrol ba/ bong bu ga dmar zhal phyir logs su gzigs pa/ bong bu'i 'jug ltag na mig gnyis yod pa/ me ri me dpung/
25a7(rgyud2): 'bar ba'i nang na 'gying bag dang ldan pa'o// shin du skyeg pa'i cha byed ldan pa'o// 'khor ni las kyi re ma tis dre'u rkang gsum can dang / chu srin rdong ma dang /
25a8(rgyud2): ba lapa dri sna ma dang / khri sman si ma dang / ma he mgo can ma la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje kun sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje kun bzang ma dang / ye shes rdo
25b1(rgyud2): rje ma dang / rdo rje 'od sgron ma la sogs pa dang / sing ge rdong ma dang / stag rdong ma dang / bya rgod gdong ma dang / kang ka'i gdong la sogs pa ste/ srid pa'i ma
25b2(rgyud2): mo ste/ las kyi srin mo stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhis skor ba dang // // bcas par lta'o// dpal lha mo dpon g.yog bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// //
25b3(rgyud2): de nas yang rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams na shin du drag byed las ni mgon po bya rog gdong can gsum po 'di'i rang bzhin
25b4(rgyud2): ji ltar lags/ bstan du gsol ces zhes pa dang / rdo rje snying po le gso legs so// skra'i sprul pa gsod byed bya rog gdong ni/ skye 'gro'i tshe la dbang byed pas/
25b5(rgyud2): bdag ces bya ba/ 'khor du gying gi tshegs kyi bskor ba'o// de ni bdug pa 'dul ba'i drag po ste/ 'gro ba'i tshe la dbang byed lus stobs len/ las kyi mgon po mun
25b6(rgyud2): pa'i mdog can yin/ gsang ba ston 'phel byed rnam 'phrul can/ ces so// gsung gi sprul pa rngam byed bya rog gdong can ni/ skye 'gro'i 'chi ba la dbang byed pas/
25b7(rgyud2): 'chi bdag ces pa/ 'khor du bdud kyi tshogs kyi bskor ba'o// rngam pas 'ching byed rtsum pa'i dbang phyug ni/ ma ma rung rtsad gcas 'chi bdag dbugs la rol/ nus pa
25b8(rgyud2): 'phrog byed bsgrub la dngos grub ster/ ma lus dgra bgegs rtsad nas gcod pa yis/ thugs kyi sprul pas sgrol byed bya rog rdong / skye 'gro'i rnam shes lus dang
26a1(rgyud2): makon #sems thal te/ bsrog bdag ces bya ba/ 'khor dum me'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// 'gro ba'i dus mthu'i 'phrog byed gang yin zhing /
26a2(rgyud2): rab shes mi skyong zhing du 'phangs nas ni/ gnas sgor rdzu 'phrul sgrub la yang dag col/ gar gyi cho 'phrul 'bar ba 'dir ston byed/ ces gsungs so// las mgon
26a3(rgyud2): gsum gyi ngar bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi mgon po bsgrub pa'i rim pa ji ltar lag/
26a4(rgyud2): so sor sgrub pa gang dang gang / spyir dril man ngag khyad par dang / las tshogs bya ba bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
26a5(rgyud2): nyon cig rdo rje snying po che/ las mgon gsum gyi bsnyen bsgrub dang / bsgrub chen bya ba las rim bshad/ bdag nyid ye shes mgon por rabs pa/ tshogs gnyis rnal
26a6(rgyud2): 'byor sngon 'gro bas/ dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su/ me dbus 'thing nag 'bar ba la// gnas pa'i las kyi mgon pa ni// ram las nyi steng chu skyes steng /
26a7(rgyud2): bdug pa re'i gdan steng du// hUM las nag po bya rog dong / zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// srin po 'phros pa 'bar ba'i sku// g.yas na gshing rje'i lce 'ja
26a8(rgyud2): ba'i// rdo rje gri khug rnon po bsnams/ g.yon pa bdud kyi 'go bcad pa'i/ thong po khrag bskang zhal du gsol// shin du 'jigs pa'i sbrul gyis brgyan// g.yon pa
26b1(rgyud2): bar 'dzin pa yang // dar nag lce lding ru mchor 'phyar/ glang chen ko rlon khrag 'dzag dang // mi lpags g.yang gni gos su myod// thod rkam dbu brgyan mdzes pa yis//
26b2(rgyud2): mi mgo phreng bas do shal byas// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gshog pa can// yum ni sha za mkha' 'gro ma// zhal cig phyag ni bzhi ma ste// spu gri mi mego khrag 'dzag dang // rtse bsu
26b3(rgyud2): sa dang mi shing rkang // bdang ba'i zhal du gsol bar byed// sku mdog dmar smug 'jigs pa'i tshul/ khrag 'dzag mi mgo dur khrod brgyan// dug sbrul do zhal spun
26b4(rgyud2): dang zhal// shin du bkrang bas brkyang bskum zhabs// dor stabs me dpung nang gnas pa'i// ma rung bdug pa ma lus pa// rdul du rlog byed mdun du bsam// dam
26b5(rgyud2): tshig bskyed nas ye shes bstim// bsil ba'i 'tshal nas spyan drangs la// gnyis med bstim zhing byin rlab po// lha srin bde brgyad ma lus pa// lha klu gnod sbyin
26b6(rgyud2): dri za dang // lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// na mkha' lding dang lto phyi dang // so so yab yum 'khor dang bcas// de'i bka' nyan gsung bstod/ de nas rtsa ba'i srog nas/
26b7(rgyud2): drang // snying dbus sa bon ge sar la// rang sngags 'bring ba glog gi gzer// 'od 'phros rin chen 'bar ba'i gnas// gsal na rgyun du dmigs pa yis/ sgre'i
26b8(rgyud2): chun ltar 'khor bar ltar// gtor ma dbul zhing 'phrin las bcol// las la bskal zhing rbad par bya// de rjes thun bsnga las kyi rims// // tshar gcod gzar la
27a1(rgyud2): mgon/ #dbye bsdu bya// gsod byed las mkhan gyi le'u ste so drug pa'o// / rdo rje las kyi nag po yis/ sgrub brtson pa'i rnal
27a2(rgyud2): 'byor pas// bstan pa bsrung phyir sems bskyed cing // rang nyid ye shes nag por bsam// mdun du gru gsum la gnas pa yis// nag po chen po 'jigs pa'i tshul//
27a3(rgyud2): ma rungs gdan las mgon pa ni// zhal cig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ sman gsum 'bar ba mche rtsigs shing // gri gug thog khrag 'dzin pa yis// rdo rje bshog/
27a4(rgyud2): brdebs khros pa'i ska// chu srin rgyal mtshan mchan khung 'dzin// brgyan dang cha byad rdzogs pa ni// rdo rje gang me cher sgrogs pa/ khams gsum zil gnon bsam par bya//
27a5(rgyud2): de'i mdun du gnas pa'i/ yum ni khrag 'thung mkha' 'gro ma// dmar nag gcer bu gzig sham can// phyag g.yas nu gri 'debs pa dang // zhal cig phyag bzhi
27a6(rgyud2): sbrul gyi brgyan// rtsigs pa'i zhal nas me dpung 'phro// las byed ma rung 'dul ba shis// de'i 'khor du bskor yang // bdud dang srin po gying gi tshogs// ma mo
27a7(rgyud2): gnod sbyin gshin rje yi// klu rgod gza' chen yab yum bcas// so so mdun da gsal bar lta// mgon po 'di'i sprul pa ni// dur bya nag po kang ka'i
27a8(rgyud2): tshogs// 'phur zhing lding ba'i mnu sder gyis// dgra bo'i lus kyi kha bye nas// rkog ma lce bcas khar bcupa nas/ khrag ni 'dren cing rngub par byed// de'i
27b1(rgyud2): gsang sngags thog gi gzer// drag po sngags dgod mi ldog pas// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lta bu yis// mnga' yi shugs kyi 'gro ba ste// gang la dmigs
27b2(rgyud2): ba'i gnad la brdeg/ dur khrod gnas pa'i chos skyong rnams// mgon po lcam bral ma lus pa// rgyobs song rtogs cing 'phrol cig ces// rngam pa'i nga
27b3(rgyud2): ro ma lus pas/ gdug pa'i snying khrag dron mo yang / kha nas skyug cing mchi bar byed// snying 'goms blang ba gzer gyis 'gas// slong bas 'di gsang
27b4(rgyud2): ba'i las/ bya rog chen po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud// gsang ba mngon spyod 'di bstan pa// mgon po dngos grub 'byung ba las// las byed gsang ba 'di bstan pa'o// rngam byed
27b5(rgyud2): kyi las bstan pa snyan pa ste so bdun pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje nug po chen po yis/ gsang ba thugs kyi mgon po yis// sgrub pa'i rims
27b6(rgyud2): pa bshad bya ba/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung byed/ bya rog rdong can bsgrub par byed pa/ sdom la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing //
27b7(rgyud2): byams dang snying rje byang sems kyi// 'gro don tshar gcad rjes gzung bas// tshad med bzhi dang ldan pas sgrub/ tshe cig gi ni he ru ka'i/ tshe go 'phang thos par byed pa la/
27b8(rgyud2): bar chang bdud dang log 'dren tshogs// brlag byed 'gon po yab yum sgrub// phyi nang gsang ba'i rten gtsugs pas// skyes pa grir shi'i rtsi rta ni/ ma nyams
28a1(rgyud2): mgon/ srog rtsar bcas pa la/ g.yas dbar las mgon snying po gsum// g.yon rtsar dbu gsum lha mo yi// sngags dang ye shes bcas pa yis/
28a2(rgyud2): sngags ni hUM ces rin chen dang // rten bcas phyag mtshan bzhi po yang // 'phrin las ces pa spel byas nas// de nyis dbus mar gnas par bya// legs dril rten bcas sba ba
28a3(rgyud2): yis/ gsang ba nyid bya ba yin/ rnal 'byor ye shes pa'i/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yis// lhag pa lha'i ting 'dzin ni/ lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa dang // gos
28a4(rgyud2): gnon rang chags la btab te// tshul gsum 'byung ba don shes pas// de nyid dbang du bya'o// mdun du gru gsum gnas pa yis// nag po chen po 'jigs pa'i gzug
28a5(rgyud2): snying rjes 'gro ba'i mgon po ni// log 'dren gdan la bzhugs pa yis// zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum 'bar// nag pi gri khug thod pa can// bya rog chu can mche
28a6(rgyud2): rtsigs shing // stag gi rgyal mtshan g.yon 'dzin pa// rin chen brgyan gyi sku mdzes shing / bdug pa 'dul phyir rngam pa yis// gyad kyi dor stabs 'gying bag can// srid
28a7(rgyud2): gsum bsgrol byed chen po bsam// de'i mdun du rtsa 'dzin ma// dmar sdug zhal cig phyag bzhi pa// rtse gsum bsnams cing las la rgyug/ za byed zhal ldan khro ma
28a8(rgyud2): bsam// de'i 'khor du bskor ba yang / sha za ro langs gcer bu ste/ nag cing dmar ba'i lus can la// mi lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// g.yas na lcags
28b1(rgyud2): kyi phur ba thogs// g.yon du mi yi rkang lag gis// sha za 'jigs pa'i cha byad can/ ro langs steng 'dug bsam par bya// de nas mkha' 'gro rnam drug gis// sing
28b2(rgyud2): ge stag dang khA yi rdong / khro zhal dur khrod bdag mo ste// zhi ba bsrung mas bskor ba lta// de dag gsang sngags bstan pa ni// sgyogs kyi zer rdo lta bur 'gro// shugs
28b3(rgyud2): bcas 'khor lo bskor ba yang // myur dang dal grags spangs nas bzlas// mgon po 'di'i sprul pa yang // mkha' lding nag mo khyud chen ni// ma hA ka la'i khyung nag
28b4(rgyud2): ste// rdo rje chu rder 'bar bar ldan// lus las rang 'dri khyud tshogs 'gyid// dgra bgegs lus kyi snying kha nas// mchu gcugs snying rtsa 'dren par byed// de'i
28b5(rgyud2): snying khrag drangs nas kyang / yid ni sme zhing 'grog par byed/ snang ba 'khrul dang shes pa 'khrul// lus 'khrugs 'byung ba dkrugs pa dang // las mgon gyi ni zhe
28b6(rgyud2): sdang gcod// 'dod chags tsan bi ka'i 'grog/ gtso bos ma lus rtsad gcad na// lus dang rnam shes so sor 'byed// / dpal khrag mtsho khol ma'i rgyud
28b7(rgyud2): las// bsgrol byed las kyi le'u ste gsum bcu so brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// las mgon rnam gsum spyi dril nas// gsang ba drag po'i
28b8(rgyud2): 'phrin las ni// grub po'i rims pa bstan par bya/ bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis// rtags kyi rims pa byung ba ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i cho 'phrul rim// grub pa
29a1(rgyud2): mnyena'achar tshul shes par bya// rang bsrung skyong bzlog pa dang // rang gshed rang dbab las la sbyar// ma grub spogs pa'i rim pa ni// gsang /
29a2(rgyud2): zhing sbab bya ba yin// 'grub pa 'di ltar byas pa la// lang gi bya ba bstan pa ni// zag pa la sna gzugs dag la// gru gsum chad pa'i shing shun la/ ro ras dag la dug
29a3(rgyud2): chas bri// dgug stim lha dbye las byas las ni// nyes pa bgo dang bsgrag par bya// thod nag bca' zhing mtshan ngan du// thun blugs de nyid rims pa bya/ bca' bzhi
29a4(rgyud2): ldan pas las la bskal// ting 'dzin sgrub bya dgug pa dang // nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi// ral gri gri khug phur bu snrums// rdeg cing dur khrod lce spyang sogs//
29a5(rgyud2): dur bya nag po kha ta rtsigs// sha zos til 'bru tsam du bya// dus der thun las zhag bdun bzlas// drag po'i thab khung bcas pa las// me la gdungs pa zhag bdud
29a6(rgyud2): dang // de rjes sbyin bsreg mnan pa dang // zor 'phangs sgrub bya rlag par byed// thun rtags bla khugs cho 'phrul 'byung // sdang byed de nyid skyo ba dang // rang
29a7(rgyud2): sha rang gi za ba dang // las kyi mgon po 'khros pa yis// sgrub bya'i spyi gtsug nas bzung nas// chu gcugs rtsa gnas gcod pa yis// gri khug dmar 'khor
29a8(rgyud2): ba yis// 'khor ba'i srid rtsa bcod par 'gyur// ma grub rdong can thugs khar ni// 'khor lo rtsibs drug gsang ba ste// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru srog gnas la//
29b1(rgyud2): sngags bzlas 'khor lo go bzlog 'gyur// 'khor bas rang dbang med par ni// las byed srog ni dbang du bsdu// / dam la bdags cing bcud la bor// de la/
29b2(rgyud2): rtags ni byung ba dang / gos bzla dkyil bdud rtsi'i rgyun// ye shes dam pas myug gu bskyed// me tog ga 'bras bu rim 'byung ltar// sa bon gnas las rdzogs
29b3(rgyud2): par bya// oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya ka wu ba ma hA ka la ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka li hi ra ma dun ting sha tru ma ra ya dza/ sku'i mgon po dang yum sha za ma'i sngags so// oM
29b4(rgyud2): ma ha ka lA rag sha ru ti b+ha k+Sha ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka li ma ma snying kha rag rbad/ gsung gi mgon po dang / khrag thung ma'i sngags/ oM tri sA ru ta ma ra ya/ ma hA ka la ci
29b5(rgyud2): ta hri hri dza dza/ oM ma hA ka li re'u tre ma du sha sha dza dza hUM b+h+yo// ces thugs kyi 'gon po dang rtsa 'jib ma'i sngags bstan pa'o// sku'i mgon po tshe bdag gis/ rtsa 'phrog
29b6(rgyud2): tshe dang dbang thang 'phrog// gsung gi mgon po 'chi bdag gis/ nus pa nyams cing rgyal bar byed// srog bdag thugs kyi mgon po yis// rnam shes bsgral
29b7(rgyud2): nas 'pho bar byed// bya rog rdong can gsum po yis// lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo rnams// phyi nang kha 'byed rtsad bcad nas// gri khug dmar nag
29b8(rgyud2): gzer sngams pas// nang du 'khor bas gcod par 'gyur// gsang ba'i tshul gyi srog rtsa bsdad // yum gsum gyi srog dmar len// can Di ka yis
30a1(rgyud2): ma@#kha sbyar 'byed// gying gi tshogs kyi myur du rgyug/ bdud dpung gi rno bar byed// ma mo'i tshogs kyi mtshon ka bskyed// nag po stong
30a2(rgyud2): gi sgo sngags dang // sha za 'bub gyi rbang sngags dang // ma me bye ba'i thun sngags kyi// pha rol 'khor bcas rlag par byed// de'i gsang sngags bstan pa dang // rnal
30a3(rgyud2): 'byor dril dang dkrug pa'i tshul// byin che tshan bskyed mi bzlog phyir// spyi dang bye brag bzlas pa bya// // thun mong spyi dril bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu so dgu
30a4(rgyud2): ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ ye shes las dang 'khor rnams kyis// thun mongs las dang spyi khyab pa// gsang ba snying po sbas pa'o//
30a5(rgyud2): las mgon las la ma rung bar// gtor ma mi slab las bcol sbyin// gnya' non btsun par rang snying 'am// gtso bo'i las sham gdags par bya// gal te las
30a6(rgyud2): ni mnyan zhing // rang la khu ldog byed 'gyur na// gnad ni sreg gi 'khor lo gzir// yi ge sngags ni mas bzlog bya// ha cang mi rang tshod zin bya// yang na mdu
30a7(rgyud2): du spyi btsugs bsam// yig bdun hUM phaT nas bzlog pa// mang du rung ba ma yin no// badz+ra can gyi yig 'bru dag/ bdun po thugs yin gtso bo la// gong
30a8(rgyud2): 'ag ma nor ga dang shes bya/ gal te bcu gnyis pa sngas na/ mi chun mi shes 'di la 'byung / de phyir man ngag ldan pa ces/ bsang ba'i snying po nyi shu lnga// sde tshan
30b1(rgyud2): rnam pa gsum po la// mkha' 'gro drug gi gsang bas mnan// sngags la ming rus papa bsang gsub spel/ mi bzad mthun gyi phreng ba gnyis/
30b2(rgyud2): tshogs pa sum bcu gsum yin no// ro ras la sogs dag la ni// rgya skyags dug dang tsha ba gsum// skye tshe mi khrag dur sol ces// bya rog sgro rtse'i stug gu yis// ma
30b3(rgyud2): nor bar ni bris nas kyang // e'i dbyibs can nang du ni// sbyin sreg bya ba ji bzhin du// ling ga dag dang ming rus kyang // de nyid nges par dmigs pa la// dgug dang
30b4(rgyud2): lha dbye brag pa dang // sde tshan gsum dang sngags drug dang / de bzhin thun gyi phreng ba ni// ka lI nga rgyal chen po yis// // yangs pa med par drag tu brjod// bya rog
30b5(rgyud2): sdong can grangs med dang // mgyogs byed mkha' mgro la sogs rnams// na mkha' khyab par khengs byed cing // de bzhin sa bzhi dag la yang // gsad cing phyogs
30b6(rgyud2): bcur khyer bar bsam// a'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo ni// ma ra ya'i mtha' can yin/ man ngag bzhin du bri ba'i don// bcu pa gcad la 'khor lo ltar// mnan dang
30b7(rgyud2): ling ga dag tu shis// mtshan ma rdzogs nas laling ga sreg/ sum bcu rtsa gsum steng du sba// mngon spod las la rtags thod nas// // gtor ma so so'i
30b8(rgyud2): bya ba 'am// yang na cig tu bsdus la dbul// mnan 'bebs sngas na sngar las 'byung // dpal ldan nag po chen po yis/ gsang ba srog gi yang tig 'di//
31a1(rgyud2): @nges par yul yo bdes// snang bang dngas pa na gyi dang / las la khol bar gdon sa pa/ y-i dwagal yang gzugs pa /
31a2(rgyud2): ma hAka la su d+hi su ti ya ma du dza/ sder lnga pa spyi dril bstan pa'o// oM ma hA ka ye ba na ya// shatru nga ma trag shang / a mu ka da mi ku ru sa~M ti la dung/ thun zeng snga ma las
31a3(rgyud2): 'gon dang 'brel ba'o// oM ma hA ka la thag shang / trag rag sha ru thu ma dza dza/ las mgon bsnyen pa'o// thag rag shal/ rtsa khrag la kha hi kha ti/ thai thA dzadza/
31a4(rgyud2): yum rtsa 'dzab mas gsad pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka la trag ling trag rag sha tsirta ma ra ya rbang / do trag rag sha/ thu ging kar ging ka ra/ rgyug rgyug/ zeng phreng /
31a5(rgyud2): thu bruM b+h+yo b+h+yo// / yig 'bru sum cu so gsum pa las la sbyar ba'i sngags so// las mgon yab yum gyi sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//
