31a6(rgyud2): de nas rdo rje snying po yis// dpal ldan ye shes mgon po yi// gsang ba de nyid sgrub pa'i ribs// yang dag bla med gshad du gsol/ ces zhus pa dang / bcom
31a7(rgyud2): ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gsang ba 'dzin pa che// yang dag sbas pa bshad par bya// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/ gsang ba sprug pa'i rnal
31a8(rgyud2): 'byor pas// mchod dang gtor ma ldan pa yis// mgon po srog gi snying po sgrub// sems bskyed ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// tshad med bsod nams tshogs
31b1(rgyud2): gnyis bsag/ stong pa'i ngang las pa ci'i stengs// hUM las 'od 'phros don byas de// bsdus las nag po chen po ni// zhal cig spyan gsung phyag gzhi pa/
31b2(rgyud2): gri khug ral gri thong khrag dang / kha tra~M kha bsnams drag po'i sku// brgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs pa bskyed// mkha' mgro brgyad kyis bskor ba la/ shar du bya rgod
31b3(rgyud2): rdong can ma// byang du khyung gi// nub tu kho'i/ lho ru 'ug pa'i/ shar lhor phyag gi/ lho nub khyi'i/ nub byang lce spyang gi// byang shar du stag rdong can ma'o// zhal
31b4(rgyud2): cig phyag gnyis 'gying bag ldan// gcer bu dung bu'i brgyan gyi brgyan// bcu drug lo tshad skyeg pa'i tshang // phyi nang gsang ba'i gnas tshul gyi/ gar byed bde ba'i
31b5(rgyud2): lha mo bskyed// de'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yang // gsang ba'i snying po sbas pa'o// 'od zer spro bsdu dbang du bsdu/ 'phrin las bcol la gtor ma dbul/
31b6(rgyud2): bskyed stim byin rlabs dbang bskur la// rgyas bdab nyer bsdu ram pa'o// thun 'tshams bskul ma dbye bsdu zhing // yang dag ye shes rnam par rol// mi 'gyur
31b7(rgyud2): mchog ni bsgrub pa ste// bde chen ngo bo gnas thob 'gyur// // dpal khrag tshe khol ma'i rgyud los/ dpal ye shes pa'i gsang ba bla med sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
31b8(rgyud2): zhe cig pa'o// // / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// 'gon po yum du gyur pa yi// ma mo i ka dza ti yis// bsgrub pa'i rims pa ji ltar lags//
32a1(rgyud2): mgon// @ces zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mgon po ldum bral ma lus dang / grags byed kun gyi ma byur pa'i/
32a2(rgyud2): sgrol byed ral cig ma mo yi// sgrub pa yang dag bshad par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas nyid du// rnal 'byor stobs dang rab ldan pas// dkyil
32a3(rgyud2): 'khor bzhings la mchod rdzas dang // gtor ma bzang po brgyan dang bcas// rnal bri'i thod pa snying dang bcas// thun rdzas ldan pas bsam gtan
32a4(rgyud2): bya// ra las rag ti'i rba rlong 'khyil pa yi// dbus kyi pad ma las// ma b+h+yo trag las 'phro 'du byas pa las// ma mo zhal cig phyag bzhi ma//
32a5(rgyud2): sku mdog mthong nab spyan gsum pa// mi re'i gdan las bzhengs pa/ zhabs gnyis byed kyi dor stabs su pA// phyag g.yas na tri shu la rtse gsum pa thod pa
32a6(rgyud2): ba dan dang bcas po dang / phyag g.yon na ban d+ha'i nang dmar gyi bkang pa zhal du gsol pa/ g.yas 'og pa dgra'i snying phyung nas bsnams pa// g.yor
32a7(rgyud2): 'og ma g.yu'i spyang mo 'gyed pa// ral pa nag mos sa gzhi khebs pa// g.yu'i ral cig gyed du 'greng ba/ dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyi brgyan pa/ de'i
32a8(rgyud2): 'khor du gyur pa na/ srin mo nag mo ro shal can dang / bal mo kun thub bdug ma dang / mon mo dung gi sna na ma dang / lha mo nab mo ska cig ma la sogs
32b1(rgyud2): pa dang / yang dbang sa rnam pa bzhi dang / bdud dang kyang dang gan sbyi dang / klug zugs can la sogs pa dus dang / thabs ga tu bzhugs sa sa par/
32b2(rgyud2): dam tshig bskyed la ye shes sems// dbang bskur byas pad ba gtsor ma dbul// gachen sras bsreg dgra bsgred/ dam sre pa la bzhag par bya/ de nas
32b3(rgyud2): kha'i rtsa dbus su/ sa bon 'phros 'dus las la bskul/ dngos dang nyams la gsal snang 'byung rdo rje ba snying dang bskul bas te/ dam tshig skyem pa gnas pa ni/
32b4(rgyud2): ma mo rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// ma mo 'grub nas 'khor lo rnams/ rang dbang med par las byed do// trag rag sha kha mu tra mu tra/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ rag me de
32b5(rgyud2): ku dza dza/ kha la ma b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu ma hi b+h+yo/ trag rag sha sa ma ya dgra bo'i snying lang rdung / e ka dza te khA so ba ti ma ra ya rbad/ trag rag sha mu tra e ka dza ti snying kha
32b6(rgyud2): rag ma b+h+yo srog la rbang / tsi ta long / rag ta thun b+h+yo// chu ma thum ri li li rbad/ las drag por bskul ba'o// ma ma rag mo e ka dza ti yaM li ma sha dza/ mi sha dun rtse
32b7(rgyud2): pho ba ya/ tra ga ra ka sha sa ma ya b+h+yo dgra be'i snying lang chung / trag rag sha mu tra e ka dza ti snying kha rag/ trag tra ga he de ma dun rtse ya/ krem kri ma li li dud rtsi yA/ kyang kyid/
32b8(rgyud2): pho ba ye/ 'ur 'ur/ krab krab/ thib thib/ kyid kying / dun dun/ pho ba yA/ tsi bi li/ du ra yag shA/ duru tri la dun rtsi pho ba ya/ tra ge he he/ rgya rgya pho ba yA yA/
33a1(rgyud2): ma#des cho 'phrul bstan pa'o// rdel dre'i snying dang khrag thun sgrub pa'o// ma mo bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa'o//
33a2(rgyud2): de nas yang rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// 'gon po mi thung khros pa yi// las kyi lha mo dang bcas pa/ srin po gdub pa can// las kyi rlung ni spu gri can la/ dbang byed
33a3(rgyud2): drag po'i las kyi rims/ bcom ldan bstan pa bstan byed pa'i// man ngag gsang ba bshad du gsol/ ces zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
33a4(rgyud2): dur khrod pas mtha' dben par ni/ las kyi 'gon po bsgrub 'dod pas// mchod dang gtor ma tshul bzhin du// legs phul bstod cing bsam gtan bya// rang nyid
33a5(rgyud2): thugs 'gon nag po yis// nga rgyal brtan par gyur nas ni/ thugs kha'i sa bon las 'phros pas/ mdun du pad nyi'i steng dag tu/ shaM las re'i gdan gnyis
33a6(rgyud2): bsam// de steng hUM las nag po bskyed// mam las las kyi gzugs can ma// shin du gnag cing skyeg pa la// zhal cig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// dang
33a7(rgyud2): be rtse gsum thong khrag can// thal chen khrag gi thig le can/ zod phreng brgyan can glang lpags gon// phyag g.yon dgra bo bzung nas kyang // snying phyung
33a8(rgyud2): bdag po'i zhal du ni// stong par byed pa mdun du bsam/ oM ma hA ka la hAM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka la tsaN+Da ya hAM hUM phaT/ o ka ma ru pi ni/ tsu lu tsu lu/ paNai Da
33b1(rgyud2): bteg/ Da ki Da ni hUM phaT swAhA/ gtor ma dbul ba ni/ karma ru pi ni/ sham+bu a pu kaM/ b+h+r-i hAg+h+ri hA/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsin d+ha tsid+ha/ bzhe' pa Ne ra/ b+hin d+ha b+hinan/ bki
33b2(rgyud2): ni Da ki ni/ ma ra ya ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sha chen 'bru sna ldan pa yis// gtor ma dbul zhing las bcol bya/ raka ta'i arge bsgreng ba ni/ sha za pra men dges pa
33b3(rgyud2): yis/ dgra bgegs sha la rol par bsam/ a ha ra a ha ra ma ha ra ka kha kha kha hi kha hi/ ces spyan drangs pa la dbul lo// gang du sangs rgyas bstan pa la/
33b4(rgyud2): gnod cing bla ma la smod cing // sems can tshe zhing bdug pa la// snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni// byang chub sems dang ldan par ni// grog ro ras shin shun la/
33b5(rgyud2): dug dang khrag dang skye tshe sogs// sgrub bya'i gzugs bri ming rus bcas// chu 'gram grog mkhar rkang rjes sogs// zag pa'i rdzas las tsha ba dang / dri ma
33b6(rgyud2): gos sogs sbyar nas kyang // dgug stim lha dbye drag por bya// gzugs kyi snying khar bzhug par bya// dug tsher lus kun brti nas// mtshon gyis rtsub cing ro
33b7(rgyud2): bsregs pa'i// me la bsregs nas 'chi bdag gis// myur du nges par dbang byed 'gyur// mtshan mo las kyi mkha' 'gro la// sngar bzhin b+ha ling dbul ste/
33b8(rgyud2): thod pa khrag gis bskang ba la// thun la sngags byas bdag par bya// zhag drug bar du gzugs stob la// sdig pa bdun pa'i dus su'o// thod khrag gtor ma dgra
34a1(rgyud2): mgonaphyogs 'phang // thun stong stag tu bcang bar bya// dngos sa mkhrad pa same khang pas phyogs 'dang / 'khor gyur las mkhan re ma ti//
34a2(rgyud2): dre'u dred mo bse ru zhon// nag mo dmar mo ljang khu ste// dam la bdags cing 'phrin las bcol// gshin rje dmar mo srin mo nag/ srog bdud 'jigs byed
34a3(rgyud2): sngo nog la// srog gi shen pa smug nag rnams// // po nya las kun sgrub byed pa'o// las mgon drag pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// // rdo rje snying
34a4(rgyud2): pos gsol pa// dur khrod gnas kyi bdag po yis// cho 'phrul sna tshogs rdzu 'phru sregs// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gaslo/ lcam bral sgrub
34a5(rgyud2): tshul ji ltar las// srin po khros pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // dbang gi tshogs bdag sgrub tshul gang // phre min mgo dgu'i cho 'phrul dang // dbang phyug khrag ral
34a6(rgyud2): nus stobs dang // 'phags pa sras rnams yab yum bcas// gnod sbyin mched lnga'i sgrub pa ci// ring po'i sngags kyi lha rnams gang // bsrung ba'i khyad par
34a7(rgyud2): stobs chen gang // mgon po beng ma'i las rims gang // dur khrod bdag mo'i gnas tshul dang // dges byed mchod gtor ji ltar dbul// bsrung ba'i khyad
34a8(rgyud2): par snyan pa dang // mi thung khros pa'i las dang yang // mchod sbyin gtor mas bskang ba ste// drang srong lha tshan sgrub pa ste// gnas lcags thog dang ser ba ste// sbyin
34b1(rgyud2): zang me rlung dbab pa dang // rdo rje khyud 'char dbab pa dang / khye tra pa la las kyi khyud // rdo rje hUM mdzad bstod pa dang // ye shes pa'i bstod bskul dang // dbang
34b2(rgyud2): phyug dbang dang 'phrin las te// rdo rje bstod pa'i tshogs bstan pa// rjes su yid rang 'jug bsdad pa// man ngag rter dang mtshungs par bstan// bsdus don dri ba
34b3(rgyud2): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu zhe bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan he ru kas// rten g.yo srid pa 'jig rten khams// rnam par snang byed dur khrod ni//
34b4(rgyud2): rab 'jigs de'i rnam pa bshad// 'di lta ste/ de ltar dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i gnas chen po tshad med bzhi pa de na/ shin du 'jigs shing skye bung byed pa// nyin
34b5(rgyud2): zhing du bar thul ba// mtshan zhing zhing mi 'bar ba// skabs su gnam lcags 'bar ba 'bab pa// sa gzhi gnag la snum pa la dug shing gi sdong po ka ri ces bya ba la sogs
34b6(rgyud2): pa ste/ gnag la thug pa sdong po'i yal ga la tsher ma rab tu rno ba/ bya rog gi mchu lta bu 'dug pa/ du ba'i nags tshal rab tu stams pa/ lo ma ni ral gri'i so lta bu yod
34b7(rgyud2): pas gcod cing / tsher ma rab tu 'bar ba yod pa'o// ljon shing b+hi na pa tra sa ni// lo ma 'khor le'i brtsibs ltar yod pa dang / ljon shing rtsa pu tra ni spu gri'i so/
34b8(rgyud2): lta bu'i 'dab ma zur gsum pa can no// ljon shing ni tra pa la ni 'dab ma rtse gsum pa so dang ldan pa'o// ljon shing chen po ka ling sha ni/ lo ma phur bu lta bur 'dug pa/
35a1(rgyud2): mgon 'gro ba dag gi phyin pa na/ phar zhing lus la snun par byed pa dag yod do// dug shing tsa la na tra ka ni/ lo ma mdung gi rtse mo lta bu yod pa//
35a2(rgyud2): dug gi thang nu 'bab pa'i rlung srog chags phra mo 'chi bar byed pa/ thang chu za'i zer ma pog pa tsam gyi kyang srog chags la khrag dang chu ser dang rnag 'bab par byed pa'o//
35a3(rgyud2): dug shing ni pa ka ta zhes bya ba la/ lo mo dgra sta'i so lta bu yod pa/ de la lcag gi pog pa thams cad du ga ha la ha lar gyur pas/ rlung dang dri snam pas 'chi bar
35a4(rgyud2): byed pa'o// dug shing yA tha na dza la zhes bya ba la sogs pa me lce'i phreng ba lta bu tshal chen po du mas bskor ba ste/ de dag la gnod sbyin dang 'byung po drug pa can du ma
35a5(rgyud2): gnas pa'o// sa gzhi thams cad ni/ bstan pa la gnod par byed pa thams cad rab tu bsgral ba'i mi ro dang ta ro mang pos gang ba/ ro gsar snying mang po skyel ba'i
35a6(rgyud2): sa ste/ ro lang gar byed pa/ kyeng rus kyi gzugs kyi bro brdung / mi mgo rtseg pa skam rlon spel ma'i rtsig pa'i khang bu du ma dang / sha lang lang dang / rus pa'i
35a7(rgyud2): dum bu dang / thod pa sna tshogs 'khros pa/ yang ro mes bsregs pa dang / tshig pa dang / byed tshig pa dang / dum bu dang / gsal shing la skyon pa dang /
35a8(rgyud2): 'gyegs te shi ba'i ro dang / bam pa dang / rul ba dang / myags shing hang pa dang / yang khrag gi chu bo'i lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rdzi ba ka ma ra la sogs pa ste/
35b1(rgyud2): raka ta'i rlabs dang rba rlong khyil par gyur pa du yod do// yang chu rlung drag tu 'bab pa du ma dang / zhag dang / glad pa dang / tshil chen po'i rang bzhin du 'beb pa/
35b2(rgyud2): dri dang mi bzod pa dang / rlang pa rab tu phyar bas ro lang dang sha za mo thams cad sprin du thibs pas sa gzhi gang ba/ zhing de dag la longs spyod pa/ sprin drag po nag
35b3(rgyud2): po rab tu 'bar bas rab 'khrigs pa/ zhu na nang gi rlang ba sngon mar khyug pas khyab par gyur pa/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dmar chub ma 'khyil pa/ glog
35b4(rgyud2): gzer rab tu 'phro ba dang / dkar mda' 'khrug pa/ thog dang ser ba 'brug sgra dge rog drag po 'byin pa/ rlung spu gri can bzhi yod te/ sa rlung spu gri can
35b5(rgyud2): gyi snye zhing 'bog pa la 'ge bo glang gzer gyi 'gems so// chu rlung spu gri can gyi khrag dron mo skyug par byed do// me rlung spu gri can gyis lus tsha bas bsreg cing
35b6(rgyud2): rgyal bar byed do// rlung gi rlung spu gri can gyi lus thams cad bye ma rdul du byed pa'i gnas de ni/ srog chags bdug pa can gnas pa du ma ni/ dug sbrul mi
35b7(rgyud2): zan bdug pa can/ du ma yod pa/ phag rgod mi bsrun pa du ma dang / glang po che smyon pa du ma dang / bse dang / ma he drag po du ma dang / khyu mchog dang /
35b8(rgyud2): rta rgod dang / gcan zan du ma dang / lce spang dang / stag dang / gzig dang / gung dang / rtse mes po dang / dbyi dar wa dang / dom dang / bred mo dang /
36a1(rgyud2): mgon/ byi la khra bo dang / sri mo dang khyi rgod rab tu mi bsrun pa dpag tu med pa gnas so// dur khrod kyi bya'i tshogs la/ dur bya nag po kaM kaM
36a2(rgyud2): ro zan dang / khyod rigs mang po dang / shaM shaM sha zan dang / kha dang bya reg dang / skyung kha dang khra dang / srin bya dang / 'ug pa dang / byangs sngon po dang /
36a3(rgyud2): dkar po dang / gyi ldang dang / hor ba dang / glag dang / 'bring dang / ne le dang / bol ba dang / go bo dang / bya rgod dang / ri skyeg dang byi dur dang / sreg
36a4(rgyud2): ba dang / so bya/ nu skyags rma bya/ ne tso/ bya ba sar dkon ni le sogs pa dpag tu med pa yod do// chu la gnas pa yang chu srin byis pa bsod pa dang /
36a5(rgyud2): chu srin dzi b+hi b+ha la dang / chu sran dza la chan dang / chu srin b+hi na sa la sogs pa dang / kha ga dang zhing yan lag du ma can dang / chu glang mi zan dang / nya dang /
36a6(rgyud2): srin bu bdug pa can du ma dang / rus sbal mi zan dang / ha khrag can la sogs pa dang / dpag tu med pa yod do// de dag dang / klu gdug pa can/
36a7(rgyud2): sa bdag gnyen dang / rdol pa nag po dang / snum po 'am rigs de/ sa 'og dang / sa steng dang / sa bla na gnas pa thams cad la che ba du yod do//
36a8(rgyud2): / 'jig rten dur khrod brtan pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ rdo sol ces bya ba'i phung po la char phog
36b1(rgyud2): pa thams cad me rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ tsha tsha 'phro ba dang bcas pa/ srog chags bdug pa can dang / sha'i tshogs chen po dang / de dag thams cad mi
36b2(rgyud2): 'gro ba'i sreg dang dbugs dang sha khrag drod la 'jib cing / tshe la rang dbang med pa za ba longs spyod pa dpag tu med pa yod do/ srin po dang / srin mo dang /
36b3(rgyud2): 'chi bdag gshin rje'i tshogs dang / ma mo dang bdug tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / gying dang klu dang / 'byung po pi mo dpag tu med pa
36b4(rgyud2): gnas so// dpal mgon po'i rigs du ma dang / dpal lha mo thams cad dur khrod der rab tu rol pa'i sa/ las mgon bya rog gdong can gsum ni gar stabs
36b5(rgyud2): byed cing 'dun nas 'gro ba/ de la klu dang sa bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi ni sa 'og nas sprul pa dug sbrul bkye nas/ mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / kha rlung
36b6(rgyud2): kyi dug gi dgra bo rnams nyes par byed pa/ bdud kyi rgyal po khyed tra pa la dang / rag ta pi tra la sogs pas/ dgra bo rnams kyi nang khrol don snying za zhing
36b7(rgyud2): 'gro ba/ khri khrag bcwo brgyad kyis steng khyab pa/ lha ma yin thag bzang rigs dang / rab si ma dang / rnam par snang byed la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad kyi dgra'o
36b8(rgyud2): dam nyams pa la/ mtshon cha'i char 'bebs pa/ srin po bum sna dang / lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa/ dgu tri dgu stong gi srog dang dbugs la za ba/
37a1(rgyud2): mthodan/ gnod sbyin nag po 'bar ba mi zan la sogs pa nyi khri chig stong lcags khrab can rnams kyi sra dang tshe srog 'phrog nas gnas pa/ gnod sbyin gtun
37a2(rgyud2): po nyi ma'i gzi brjid la sogs pa nyi khri rig stong gser khrab sku la gsol ba rnams kyis rgyas pa'i 'phrin las la dbang bsgyur ba/ gnod sbyin ha la 'bar byed la sogs
37a3(rgyud2): pas/ smug po bas khrag can nyi khri cig stong gis dbang gis las mdzad pa/ gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la sogs pas g.yu khrag can nyi khri cig stong gi zhi las byed do//
37a4(rgyud2): tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po du mas steng nas bdud rtsis char 'bebs pa/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pas tsan dan dang /
37a5(rgyud2): a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos 'bul/ gnod sbyin mo sang ha da ra dang / kun byed ma la sogs pas 'bru sna tshogs kyi char 'beb par byed pa'o// gzhan yang nag po
37a6(rgyud2): stong gi tshogs kyi mtshon bya sna tshogs thogs nas bar snang la 'gro ba/ sha za 'bum gyi tshogs kyi gri khug dang spu gris bgegs dang dgra be'i lus dum bu dum bur rtab
37a7(rgyud2): cing rgyug pa/ ma mo bye ba'i tshigs kyi khram shing dang ban d+ha thogs nas rtsa dang sgyu ma dbral te/ khrag bcus nas 'thung bar byed do// gying can po tshong pa dung gi thod
37a8(rgyud2): cog can la sogs pa khri khrag bzhis ni dgra bo sgo 'bog rgyal nad gtong pa/ gying chen po khu le lag dgu ni gzer nad glang thabs stong pa/ gying chen po nag po
37b1(rgyud2): 'jub med gri dgrod mdze nang gtong ba/ bying chen po gnam la phub kyi ni/ ye 'brog dang khrag spyug tor bar byed do// bying chen po ji phrag bcwo brgyad zad du 'khol
37b2(rgyud2): kha'o// shin rje chos kyi rgyal pos ni srid pa las kyi me long bstan nas shang thang 'byed par byed do// gshin rje 'chi bdag sel ta swa ta 'khor bye ba dgu khri dang
37b3(rgyud2): bcas pas srog dmar len byed do// gzhan yang seng ge nag po bcwo brgyad ni 'tshong zhing ral pa'i sig tshul gyi 'gro ba/ rta dgod mi zin rgya ni 'dur zhing bang
37b4(rgyud2): rgyug pa/ stag gzig khro bo rgya ni rol cing rdzing pas phyi nas 'phreng ba/ glang po che nag po 'bum ni dam nyams thams cad kyi lus rdzis pa rdul du btong ba/ dom
37b5(rgyud2): dred pag rgod khyi nag lce spyang bye ba sa yas ni/ mche rtsigs kha rdangs nas skad mi snyan pa sna tshogs kyi skrag cing rngar bar byed pa/ gang zhig dpa' dregs pa che la
37b6(rgyud2): rdul bod pa dag kyang / dur khrod der phyin ma thag der spa zings zhes byed pas de// gnas 'di dang mtshungs pa ni/ 'dzam bu gling na yang / srin po'i yul gyi
37b7(rgyud2): ri ma la ya gnas lcags 'bar ba'i pho brang yin no// de dang cha cung zad mthun pa dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal yin no// gzhan yang rgyal po chen bzhi yis ni
37b8(rgyud2): bstan pa'i bya ra ba byed pa'o// phyogs skyong ba rnams kyi ni bstan pa bskyong bar gnas so// gzhan yang bya khyung nag po rnams ni steng gi nam mkha' la lding zhing
38a1(rgyud2): mgon/ sgra skad drag po sgrogs pa/ kaM ka nag po rnams kyi ni gshog pa rdebs pas/ sgrub bya rnams 'dar zhing 'gyel zhing du 'jug pas/
38a2(rgyud2): bya rog nag po kha ta rnams kyi ni/ mchu sder gyis rdong la 'brang cing 'gro ba/ lcags kyi bya khra rnams kyi ni/ rdong la babs de glud pa 'bru ba/ lcags kyi lce sbrang rnams
38a3(rgyud2): kyi ni rngam zhing rtsa dbral zhing khrag la 'thung / sha za po mo rnams kyi sdang ba'i snying 'byin cing rang sha rang gi za ru 'jug pa dang / mgon po ldum bral gyis sbrul nas
38a4(rgyud2): rnams shes gnas sbar de sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing du skye bar byed pa'o// // dpal ye shes kyi mgon po ni gnam lcags 'bar ba'i ri/ ma la ya'i rtse me'i gzhal
38a5(rgyud2): yas khang na nus pa'o// gsong byed ska'i mgon po bsil ba tshal na gnas pa'o// rngam byed gsung gi mgon po ni gyad kyi yul na gnas pa'o// sgrol byed thugs
38a6(rgyud2): kyi mgon po ni u r+yan na gnas so/ mi thung 'khros pa srin po'i gling na ste de'i 'khor las kyi shan dmar ni/ kan pa'i yul gyi rlung spu gri can gyi gnas su'o// phyag
38a7(rgyud2): drug pa dpal gyi ra'i 'gram na'o// gri khug brtsegs pa ni ha ri kaM lar ro// chu srin la zhon pa'i mgon po dpal skyong grag po ni/ rdo rje gdan gyi bka' bsrungs so//
38a8(rgyud2): rdong bzhi pa'i mgon po ni sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'o// bang mdzin pa ni rdong dmar gyi brag la rten pa'o// beng 'dzin pa bar pa ni/ rgya nag gi ri bo rtse lnga la'o// dpal
38b1(rgyud2): lha me ni li yul g.yu mtsho mer ba can na'o// las kyi re ma ti rtsa ri tra rang 'byung can la'o// dung skyong ma ni 'o ma'i mtsho ri can da la yod par ro// nam grum ni b+ha su b+ha kra'i
38b2(rgyud2): mtsho can na'o// e ka tsa te so sa gling dur khrod do// lcags kyi spang mo 'go dgu ma dang ldan pa ni pa sa ra ta'i gnas Da ki 'du ba can nang du'o// bse'i lha mo mtsho la gnas
38b3(rgyud2): pa can no// de yang mdor bsdus can no// chos skyong chen po de dag ni/ bstan pa 'dzin pa'i bsgrub pa po gar gnas par 'du zhing las thams cad grub par byed pa'i
38b4(rgyud2): dur khrod kyi gnas pa'i le'u zhe drug pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas mgon po lcam bral gyis bsgrub pa thams cad gang yin pa/
38b5(rgyud2): sgrub tshul rim pa bshad par bya// gnas ni phun sum tshogs pa der// mgon po bsgrub pa'i rim pa tsam// sngon du 'gro ba sems bskyed tshad bya/ stong pa'i ngang
38b6(rgyud2): las 'byung ba mtshon bcad de/ dur khrod gzhal yas khang dbus su ni/ pad nyi'i steng du hUM ni nag po las/ spro bsdus nag po chen po gtso bo bsam/ de'i g.yas su
38b7(rgyud2): pad nyi re steng su// hUM las byung ba'i mgon po gsang beng ni/ zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum mthing nag ste/ g.yas na tsan dan beng chen smug po las/ lha dmag
38b8(rgyud2): nye khri chig stong 'gyed byed cing / g.yon pa seng sdeng phur pa skar rten pa/ thod skam dbu brgyan rine de shal can/ skal mi dpung 'bar bas 'khros pa'i ska/ dur khrod
39a1(rgyud2): mgon #/ brgyan dang gar gyi rol pa'o// de nas g.yon du lha mo rem ti/ bong bu la gnas gsal bar dmig par bya/ bskyed cing bsdus nas dpa
39a2(rgyud2): bskur byin brlabs pa/ rgyas bdab bsang sngags snying po'i don 'khor/ oM ma hA ka la a g+hor du re sa hUM hUM phaT ces so// las sngags bstan pa oM a g+ho ra du bengs
39a3(rgyud2): dgra/ bgegs 'byung po dzi pi ta ma ra ya dza dza/ sha truM tsi ta phyung / tsi ta ti shig/ tsi ta paM/ tsi ta bad/ ces dmigs bya la pur thun beng gis bdeg par bya'o//
39a4(rgyud2): rjes la mthun bsdu gtor ma dbul// mchod stod bya/ lcam bral du spel pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ las mgon
39a5(rgyud2): nag po gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ sgrub tshul bla na med pa las/ rims pa las kyi cho ga bstan/ dur khrod dang ni shing cig pa'am/ ma mo ga shing rje gnas pa'i sa/
39a6(rgyud2): nam mkha' bar snang dang / sa gzhi zur gsum 'jigs su rung ba'i gnas su/ dkyil 'khor dug dang khrag gis thod mkhar dang bcas pa bkod la/ mchod rdzas
39a7(rgyud2): la sogs pa thams cad bsham te/ lha bskyed pa ni/ dbus mthing nag e'i steng du/ rdo rje hUM mdzad gsal bar bskyed pa'i mdun du/ las kyi mgon po gri khug can
39a8(rgyud2): dang / de'i mdun du yum ci rta stob pa gsal bar dmigs par bya'o// de na zla kham gsum po la/ re'i gdan steng su/ mdun gyi mam las re ma ti dbugs
39b1(rgyud2): len pa'i bdag mo// 'thing nag zhal cig spyan gsum phyag gnyis pa/ dre'u'i steng na phyag g.yas pa ral bri/ g.yon tri shu la ba dan can no// ya maM las sha za ba/
39b2(rgyud2): zhal cig phyag gnyis ma g.yas spu gri g.yon lcags kyu can no/ g.yon na khrag 'thung ma dmar mo spu gri thod khrag thogs pa ste/ ma ma trag kham b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hri hring
39b3(rgyud2): ma ra ya dza dza had te mo na ya/ ma ma sha sha le b+h+yo/ ma b+h+yo ka tsa ma ra ya phaT/ ces pas lha mo de dag gsal bar bskyed pas te/ re re yang spyan gsum gsum
39b4(rgyud2): ba/ ral pa kham nag rjes cing grol ba/ rus pa dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ khrag dang zhag gi zer bu can/ zhing chen dang dur khrod ras kyi brgyan pa/ de gsal
39b5(rgyud2): bar bskyed do// dkyil 'khor gyi shar lho'i grar/ ro lad kyi ba dan la/ las kyi 'chi bdag dmar po dmar ru rtse g.yas na las kyi me long dang / g.yonan
39b6(rgyud2): khri shing thogs pa sku mdog dmar po ni/ oM ma hA ka la sa sha re re na/ sha sa na sha hi re/ g+hi hA g+hi h+na kha traM kaSh+Ti na yag shaM swAhA/ ces pas 'byung ba sa'i spu gri
39b7(rgyud2): la dbang byed pa bskyed do// da la'i lho nub kyi grar ru gang gi steng du las srin mo 'char sprin mngag can g.yas na ral gri dang mi mgo// g.yon na chu gri dang zhags pa
39b8(rgyud2): thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa can/ ral pa gzings pa mi srun pa'o// nub byang gyi grar srog bdud nag pos g.yas gri khug dang / g.yon thod pa can/ skyes
40a1(rgyud2): mgonakhams pa'i steng na me'i spu gri la dbang byed pa'o// byang shar gyi gral srog shaM rngam pa/ rta dgong mi zan steng na/ mdog smug nag
40a2(rgyud2): g.yas 'khor ro// g.yon rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ rlung spu gri la dbang byed pa ste/ so so'i sngags las grub pas te/ ma hA ka la
40a3(rgyud2): ya ma ra tsa ma ru tsa/ ha ra ha ra/ san ta ra tsi li sha pa ta ka b+h+yo b+h+yo/ shar lho'i gshin rje'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka la sa sha ri ri na/ sha sa na sha shi ha re g+ni da g+h+r-i hA phaT
40a4(rgyud2): kaSh+min yag shaM swA hA/ srin po nag pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka la hi li ki li badz+re badz+re badz+re gra dzir khug shi mu khug/ ha ya ha ya/ ha na ha na/ badz+re na badz+re na a
40a5(rgyud2): mu kaM sha truM dza dza/ ces srog bdud nag po'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka la ya shi du na/ sa hA ya shi du na/ sha truM ma ra ma ra/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ tshed tshe da/ b+hu hU ta b+hU ta hUM hUM
40a6(rgyud2): phaT swA hA/ ces pa srog shan mar be'i sngags so// sgo bzhir dza hUM ba ho las sha za ma bzhi gnas pa'o// dur khrod kyi sa pho brang shin du 'jigs su rung ba'i gnas su//
40a7(rgyud2): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dbang byed pa bskyed par bya'o// gri khug 'khros pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste zhe brgyang pa'o// // de nas he ru ka dpal dang / mgon/
40a8(rgyud2): po ldum bral 'khor bcas kyis/ las mkhan nor gyi dbang phyug che/ tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu bshad/ 'phags pa sku mdog dmar la 'tsher ba/ zhal ni
40b1(rgyud2): glang po che'i sna dang sna ba can/ phyag bzhi pa dbu ske nag po ral pa'i thong rmugs can la/ nor bu dang zla tshes can/ bsus khyim che ba/ phyag g.yas dang po na la phug
40b2(rgyud2): dang / 'og ma na rin po che'i dgreng phyung can/ g.yon na rin po che'i snod du/ la du la sogs kyis bskang paM/ 'og ma na dgra sta rin po ches mtshan pa/ nor bu du
40b3(rgyud2): ma dang / me tog sna tshogs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ 'khor lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa ste/ oM ba ra ka ta swA hA/ oM hUM b+ha na pa ti ye swA hA/ oM b+haM g+ha na pa ti yi swA hA/
40b4(rgyud2): puSh+Ti ma na tra si hi shan ti ku ru ye swA hA/ na mo sU te ma hA g+ha na pa ti ye b+ha langi g+hi hA kha raM kha hI swA hA/ 'bar byed ma dang zhi ba ma dang / dbang ma dang / rnam par dgod
40b5(rgyud2): ma ste/ phyag rgya dang bcas pas sgrub pa po la dngos grub brtsol ba'o// dbang gi las ni 'di dag gis/ rnam par rol pas grub pa ster/ 'jig rten lha po
40b6(rgyud2): rol ma sogs/ sna tshogs 'di sa ni myur du 'gugs/ oM k+Shi bi g+ha ra/ ma he b+hi d+ha ni b+han d+ha badz+ra s+yA sa tha/ badz+ra maSh+Ti/ badz+ra d+ha wi mo san duSh+Ta/ badz+ra a b+ha ri
40b7(rgyud2): ma ya bi rdung pad/ pus Sh+TaM/ e ka wa b+ha hau/ na bu ta hi/ ma ra d+he shi/ oM b+haM ga d+hA li/ mun tsa sid d+ha/ tan b+ha mi She mi/ ma langi bu ta ya/ ma yani bud+d+haM
40b8(rgyud2): hi sa/ pu wa pas/ tsa ri ka ran De/ dzA yi so la spos/ hi la pa ra phye/ po lo so ti/ tA h+ya ni/ u ba ra/ d+ha na pi/ oM badz+ra mud ka ra/ ko ri a b+hi shaM ru ta/
41a1(rgyud2): man#b+han d+ha wa bu/ dz+nyA yin b+han d+ha ya/ rak+Sha pa ri he ra/ dzA kha ba no// re hi sid d+hi/ oM ba me ra s+yAn d+ha/ swa bor b+han d+ha sa ye ra b+ha rA dza b+ha/ tong
41a2(rgyud2): b+hi tang lu b+han d+ha/ sarba d+ha ki ni/ ma yi d+ha pe/ b+han du/ ral yu ta Sha ma ban d+ha rak+Sha pa ri/ ha ra dzA rba na ho ya/ li ra sid d+hi swA hA/ rigs 'dzin lha mo grub pa mo// 'phru
41a3(rgyud2): phrag rnams kyi sngags pa ste/ sprin sreg las la shis pa nyid// // stong phrag bzhi'i 'grub par 'gyur// tshogs bdag lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu
41a4(rgyud2): ba'o// // de nas bzhan yang bshad bya ba/ he ru ka pa dpal badz+ra hi'i// las byed mkha' 'gro za byed rdong / tsa ri tri sar pa thIl/ ka bsrung po nya byar byed/
41a5(rgyud2): de nyid bskul ba'i rim pa bstan/ rab tu 'jigs gnas su ni/ de la e dbyibs dug khrag byug/ rtog bral ba mun can 'gro ba// ma nyams srog pong thun
41a6(rgyud2): rdzas bsag/ dmigs bya'i gzugs ni sngags kyis bskor/ lha dbye dgug bstim las bcol bya// bya ba'i rim pa bsngags bsgrub/ mchod gtor khyad par gri
41a7(rgyud2): khug bcas// bsnyen pa sngon song bsgrub pa tsam// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas// bden bral phyogs bltas rnal 'byor pas// spos bsreg bsrung ba'i
41a8(rgyud2): 'khor lo bya// g.yu 'tshe med pa'i 'gram nyid du/ dur khrod gnas su skyes pa yis/ ma mo drag byed 'bar ma ni// mdun du bka' stong byed par bsam/ dza las
41b1(rgyud2): gyur pa'i spang me ni// lcags kyi lce spyang 'phros stengs// yang ni dmar nag 'od 'bar bas// gcer bu zhal dgu phyag brgyad ma// re re la yang spyan gsum pa/
41b2(rgyud2): tsan dkyil phyed krung tshul du'o// gri khug ral gri dpra sta dang // Da ma ru ni g.yas pa'o// thod khrag zhags pa rtse gsum pa// lcags kyu bsnams pa rus pas brgyan/
41b3(rgyud2): khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// shin du 'jigs cing rtum pa ma// me bung dbus na gnas pa bsgom// de'i thugs kha'i pad nyi'i steng // sa bon sngags kyi
41b4(rgyud2): bskor ba lta/ 'jig rten khams su 'od 'phros pas// ma mo mkha' 'gro dbang bsdus nas// / gsang sngags thog gi zer ltar bzlas/ oM badz+ra Da ki ni/
41b5(rgyud2): badz+ra ye gi ni/ ka ma ru pa ni/ dza la mu khi ni/ tshe 'du ni me b+han d+ha/ tshin d+ha rag tshom/ yo snying kha rag// rag mo rag mo drongs/ khug khug myur du khug dza dza//
41b6(rgyud2): sha tru tsirta gshog/ dum bur chod du mchod/ dgra bo la ma ra ya dza sod/ oM badz+ra Da kI ni ma ha ye ki ni/ lo ka Da ki ni ma ma rag mo rab mo dzo dza// thun rdzas rdeg
41b7(rgyud2): cing las la spad/ gtor ma dbul zhing phrin las bcol// sbyin bsregs las kyi mtha' bsdu bya/ he ru ka dad ba ki be skul// Da ki las bstan pa'i le'u
41b8(rgyud2): ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan mgon po dang // ye shes lha mor bcas pa yis// las byed 'phags pa ngal so yis// gsang bsgrub rim pa
42a1(rgyud2): mngon/ @bstan par bya// gang du dkyil 'khor mchod rdzas bstan// maN+Dal me tog gtor ma bsham/ skyes pa grir shi'i tsirta ni// gang du kha/
42a2(rgyud2): sbyor rin chen bcas// ma hA ka ra snying rta sngon mig/ snying po nyi snying b+hai la ni// spel tshig bcas pa gsar gyis na// chu dar la bris sku gzugs sogs// nyer cig
42a3(rgyud2): bsnyen la rten du bzung // mgon po chen po rnam thos sras/ mi 'jigs sing ge'i khri steng na// zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog mthing // spyan dgu 'bar ba 'phros
42a4(rgyud2): pa'i zhal ta/ gdug pa klu dbang rini chen brgyan// rdo rje pad+ma dang pos 'khyad// g.yas na rgyal mtshan ral gri dang // g.yon par chen zhags pa'o// yum ni pad+ma
42a5(rgyud2): gtsug bde ma// dmar zhing ser ba gzi mdangs ldan// gtso bo'i sku la 'khril bas ste// g.yas pa nor bu pang snod g.yon// rgyal po rol pa'i tshul du ni//
42a6(rgyud2): gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bsam// lha me nor 'dzin bzhi yis bskor// 'tshams su gter gyi brgyan pa'o/ oM b+hai su tra bo pa to// be shar/ bi dza ya swA hA//
42a7(rgyud2): oM b+hai shra ma Na ye swA hA/ oM su ko sha/ b+ha su d+ha ra/ mi ni d+hi ga ma/ b+ha su d+ha ri ni swA hA/ snying po gsang ba srog sbas pa/ de nyid ye shes bskul bar 'gyur// dam
42a8(rgyud2): tshig ye shes gnyis med byed/ khri phrag bcus ni nges pa 'grub/ sngon po gos dang rin chen shing // bzang phreng a ru 'bras bu bsreg/ rten la rten pas rab
42b1(rgyud2): gnas 'gyur// 'di ni gsang sgrub thun mongs yin// ngal so sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcung gcig pa'o// / de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug na/
42b2(rgyud2): gang nas khrag gi ral pa can// ud dpal 'dra ba drag po yis// bsrung dang bzlog pa'i las 'di sngags/ oM badz+ra g+ha ra/ badz+ra ka pa ra/ badz+ra ma tha tsha ba yi'i la/
42b3(rgyud2): badz+ra ye b+had d+ha ma na ba du ba ra/ ma cha a tsha ye bi/ sa ka ra/ ki d+ha d+ha b+ha ra/ badz+ra ka pa tsa pa ka pa tsi pa/ b+ha la g+ha na hi/ bri bas/ u pa ri/ mud da ho/ mung d+hi/
42b4(rgyud2): hu ti b+hu ba na ye la pa se/ au ra ga ta dza ta/ a ra ka ta phaT/ dza taM ma ra ma/ Di ri ni u la Te/ be ta ba Ti/ dz+nye mi li/ si re u la ta ya/ ta ta ha sta pa ra/ sa ra he yi
42b5(rgyud2): b+hin sa/ pre ka le/ sa tha ke ya/ saM ka ra b+ho lan Ti/ a re g+ha sa b+ha ra ni b+hi ya/ si tra sa ta la/ pa shA phaT phaT/ khams gsum zil gnon la la sngags/ snang
42b6(rgyud2): srid cad nas gcod par byed// stobs chen dpa' bo 'khor lo nyid// bya rog chen po'i rgyud las ni// 'dir ni las rnams grub byed pa// smod pa bzlog pa
42b7(rgyud2): gsang ba bstan// // dbang phyug chen po khrag gi ral pa can gyi le'u ste lnga bcung gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'phags pa rnam thos sras kyis/ dkyil 'khor
42b8(rgyud2): gnas pa'i lhar gyur pa'i/ gnod sbyin mched lnga'i sngags bstan pa// 'phrin las myur bster bshad par bya/ b+ha baM saM baM g+ha/ mi dgong rkun mdzer pa'i// la
43a1(rgyud2): mgon/ #g.yas 'thil du 'khor lo ni// rtsibs lnga yig 'bru kha dog lnga// sor mo la ni mtshan sngags dgod// mgul bar spel nig dbang
43a2(rgyud2): skur bri// grir shi'i lag sor dar sna lnga// 'bru sna lnga'i tshom bu dgod dang dril/ mchod gtor sman 'bru longs spyod rdzas// me tog lu du dmig 'dra ba// pa la sha
43a3(rgyud2): dang bu d+ha ri// dril 'dra glang po sna 'dra dang // ku nu ma bya snga in tra// mchod cing kha dog ldan paso// rnal 'byor byang sems lhag lha las// mdun du mgon
43a4(rgyud2): po 'khor bcas la// so so gsal bar dmigs pa ste// nor bu bzang po b+he tra'i gdong // zhal cig phyag bzhi rgyal mtshan can// shel mdog rin chen rgyan smras
43a5(rgyud2): pa'i// gang ba bzang po rta'i 'go// gser mdog bum pa ba dan 'dzan/ yang dag shes ni ri dgas sdong // be dur mdog can nor bu 'chang // rgyal ba mkhyud ma
43a6(rgyud2): glang chen dbu// ma rgad 'dra ba phyag g.yas na// rin chen gzhong par zas sna tshogs// sred tshe ri'i drang so skyong // zangs mdog bre bas bsdud pa'o// lhag mas
43a7(rgyud2): rin chen 'bar ba dang // pad+ma rdong bu bsnams pa'o// yum rnams lha mo rin chen dang // ljon shing 'bras bu can pa'o// oM b+ha su b+ha tra/ pun d+he tra si b+hu ta dzaH/
43a8(rgyud2): ra thi ste/ b+ha ba Sho na ra swA hA/ yak+Sha brta sarba paM ba te ka ra puSh+Ta/ sid d+hi ma ku ru ye swA hA/ oM a r+ya ma g+hu mi/ a d+hi b+ha li/ pu na b+ha li/ ya yaM kA li/ ra rag sha li/
43b1(rgyud2): ya ya ma li/ ma ma sarba sad d+hi ku ru swA hA// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba yis// mgon po dpal ldan 'khor bcas la// rnam bzhi byed de gtsug lag gnas// 'brog
43b2(rgyud2): gnas mched lnga bstan pa'o// / nor bdag sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcur gsum pa'o// / de na bkra shis ye shes rter// rigs drug mgon
43b3(rgyud2): po so so ste// 'byung po dam tshig mgon po skyong // 'chi bdag 'joms pas tshar gcod pa// bya rog can dang re ma ti// ral cig nag mo khrag mdog ma// gsang
43b4(rgyud2): ba'i mgon po thog mar byung // thugs mgon nag po chen po ste// 'phags pa 'phrin las bzhi byed pa// las mgon rlung gi spu gri can// dbang po nor ster ye shes che//
43b5(rgyud2): rin chen dkon mchog g+han d+he can// las byed sku gsung thugs bstan pa// 'chi bdag las mkhan tshe bdag rgyal// drang srong rgyas byed rgya mtsho'i lha// nag po chen mo
43b6(rgyud2): rtsig pa ma// srin mo gnod sbyin 'bar lha mo// gri khug ye shes lag tshad med// tshangs pa chen po mthu chen ldan// las ngal so dang sing ge can// snying po mgon po
43b7(rgyud2): rgyas pa'i las// bzung 'dzin ma stes 'dzin ma// mkha' 'gro ma mo gsang ba ma// gshin rje las bskul nag po dang // brgyan drug ldan pa mgon po che//
43b8(rgyud2): ma mo mgon po lha min bzlog/ khyab 'jug gis ni song ba'o// ya ka k+Sha d+ha na sha gying che// bar sna mun sna zung cig pa'o// thod pa'i bsnod can bzung mar ldan/
44a1(rgyud2): @chen po'i mgon po drag po ste// rab tu gcod pa'i mgon po'o// ral gri can gyi mgon 'dul byed// sa 'og chu srin sna gug can/
44a2(rgyud2): zhum pa'i mgon po dbang phyug ma// zla can mtshan mo las byed ma// rlung lha rigs 'dzin paskyong ba che// gdug pa can gyis mtshan ma ste/ kha nas me skab 'phro ba can/
44a3(rgyud2): gnod sbyin chu dbang ldan pa dang // nyin mo 'bar ba'i lus skyems so// las kyi spu gri can ral pa// ma mo srin mo 'chi bdag mas// las byed tsan ti ka yis so//
44a4(rgyud2): dron d+ha na mu kha ka ka mu ka/ u lu mu kha/ g+ha ru na mu hi kha/ gri d+ha saM mu/ sa mu kha/ sha na b+ha ya mu kha he// 'di ni las rnams bsgrub byed pa// bar chad bzlog dang
44a5(rgyud2): nus pa 'byin// bya rog chen po'i rgyud dang ni// dngos grub 'byung ba las gang bshad// lha dang sngags ni ngos bzung ba// 'dir na gsal bar bstan pas so// //
44a6(rgyud2): sngags rigs kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcung bzhi pa'o// / de nas gnas pa rang bsrung ba/ gnod pa bzlog pa gsang ba yis// sngon 'gro tshogs bsag
44a7(rgyud2): rim pa ldan// gnod pa kun la rab grol bshad// b+h+rUM las gser mdog 'khor lo bsam// dbus su hUM gis brgyan par gnas// de las bskyed pa ltar gsal
44a8(rgyud2): bas ta 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa bsgom// de nas bla med snying po las// spang blangs gsal bzhag med pas na// 'jig rten gsum po kun gyi ni// rgyal ba'i
44b1(rgyud2): snying por bdag nyid 'gyur// mnyam nyid dang las mi g.yo bas// rang sems ri rab ltar bstan ma// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang // de ming thos pas/
44b2(rgyud2): rab tu byer// 'jigs dang skrag pa chen po yis// de ma thag du bran du 'gyur// blo ldan ring por mi thogs par// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// rang nyid kyi
44b3(rgyud2): bskul khro bo dang // rdo rje ra bas 'khor bas ste// drag ri chu me rlung dang dug/ phyi rol bde brgyad me rir bcas// gnod byed dgug gnan bcings pa dang // bsregs
44b4(rgyud2): dkrus rdor bas dag par 'gyur// thams cad bsrung bzlog las la sngags// dmigs med pa las mi dmigs bzhag/ bya rog rtsa ba'i rgyud las ni// /
44b5(rgyud2): bsrang ba nyid las gzhan du min// man ngag snying po bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu nga lnga pa'o// // de nas mgon po gsang ba yis// lha mo dang ldan bang 'dzin pa'i//
44b6(rgyud2): las kyi sgrub dag byed pa ni// dben par sgrub pa tsam par bya// dur khrod gnas su rang hUM mdzad// shin du gsal bas mdun du ni// g.yas phyogs mgon
44b7(rgyud2): po beng ma dang // g.yon du lha mo bong zhon pa// de mdun las mgron 'khor bcas kyis// bskor zhing las rnams byed par blta/ oM mahA ka la g+hun d+hidad+hU/
44b8(rgyud2): phaT/ oM ma hA ka la raka sha du beng ni dza dza/ oM ma hA ka li kra pa li ni ka la ra tri b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka la shi ri aM/ ma hA ka la ru pa ka la ru pa tsA phaT/ oM ni
45a1(rgyud2): gan/ @#trag e na shan+nan+dan+tu hU~M phaT// bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor thun gyi las// gtor ma dbul cing 'phrin las bcol// myur 'grub rtags 'byung
45a2(rgyud2): rib pa sbyar// zor bya tsher ma'ang bsreg par bya/ thal ba dang bsdebs shi sar mnan// ma grub lan bdun gzir bas grub// yang na las mgon gzir bar bya//
45a3(rgyud2): des ni myur du las byed pa'i// // mgon pa beng ma'i las bstan pa'i le'u steng drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang dur khrod kyis// bdag mo mched
45a4(rgyud2): drug gsang ba bshad// lha dang sngags rdzas bya ba'i rim// las byed ma mo grub pas te// oM Da ki ni ces shin du 'khros pa'i sku ni du mar bstan cing / dgra bo ma
45a5(rgyud2): lus glad pa 'gyems// khrag 'dzag 'go 'am phreng bas rab tu rgyan cing phyag rgya lngas spras// dme dmi dum zhes dug sbrul mang po 'khros pas// dug rlang nag pos
45a6(rgyud2): ngam nyams bsreg/ de dung daHces mkha' 'gro nag me gri khug thod khrag bsnams pas dur khrod rol par mdzad// Da ki ni zhes mi lpags rlon pa'i na bza' phyag gis
45a7(rgyud2): rgyang nas gon byed cing // sgrub pa pos tshe skad cig myur du 'od byed glog 'gyu'i gzugs// raM re ru rab tu 'bar bas lus la me stag cha cha skar mar phyogs bcur rdor// re rung
45a8(rgyud2): ra ces bsgrub pa po la bsrung byed po nya'i tshogs rnams las sgrub cig/ ka li ni ces sa 'og sa stengs sa bla'i 'jig rten kun du sha khrag srog dbugs dbang byed pa/ rabs su
45b1(rgyud2): rol pa'i khro mo dur khrod gyis brgyan spyan gsum me mngag phung po lta bur gzigs// lam lang lum zhes mtshon na 'dzin pa rngam pa'i stobs kyi pha rol dpung tshogs drug
45b2(rgyud2): byed pa// lem lu la sgrub pa po'i gnod pa ma lus zhi byed lha mo khyod kyi skyong / ka ki ni zhes rab tu drangs rno'i mche rtsigs lce 'dril cing / gnod byed lus can rnams kyi
45b3(rgyud2): lus la mi srun gya gyur 'gro bas rus pa ma lus chom nom za// kaM ki kung zhes thod ras grang pa lbu ba 'jigs byed rtsa rnams gcod byed cing las byed pa// kem kum ka
45b4(rgyud2): zhes sa bdag klu gnyen 'dul zhing zhags gnyis sa la bdabs 'joms par mdzad/ sa ki ni khams gsum dbang du bsdud byed ral pa nag mos sa bzhi khyebs/
45b5(rgyud2): bstan pa 'jig pa'i sems can ma lus kha sbyar dbye bas snying khrag myur drangs nas/ sem sing sum zhes sngags kyi nus pa ma dpung shin du dran pa'i zer 'phros pas/
45b6(rgyud2): sem su sam zhes sdig chen ma lus bsreg cing ro lang srin mo dpa' mos myur du sgrol// na ki ni zhes pas kyi nus pa byang sde mas ma lus 'joms/ 'jigs byed sku
45b7(rgyud2): chen gnam lcags 'bar ba'i char 'bebs shing // gnod byed sems ni rgyal byed ma// hai hUM zhes 'phrog byed 'jib byed 'bar byed ma mo bdud 'dul bstan pa/
45b8(rgyud2): bsrungs// he hAM ha zhes sha za Da ka ki stong sdes sgrub pa po rnams 'khor bcas bsrung du gsol/ Da ki ni las bstan pa'i le'u ste nga bdun pa'o// / de nas te/
46a1(rgyud2): mngon/ @#ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas/ dkyil 'khor mchod pa gtor ma tshogs rol pa'i/ lhag ma yi ni bki mnyes par bya/ de nyid sha zam po//
46a2(rgyud2): dges par 'gyur/ oM na mo d+he wi na ma Sha kri ba/ na mo hI/ ma hA ka la ka ni ye sha truM la ma pra ti b+ha ba kan d+ha tsa na/ tad+ya tha/ pa ta sa ra ke sa ri sa ka ni d+ha ba/
46a3(rgyud2): d+hu ke ru ke ba ri a mu ka bya pri ta/ sa ha pra sha kha N+ya ku ru ku ru/ ku b+h+yo ku b+hu/ b+ho d+hi sha b+ha/ d+ha sha a mu ka s+ya/ a mu kaM sha truM/ ma ra ya hUM phaT// de nas
46a4(rgyud2): zos cing thungs par// lhag ma'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te/ gang du bkod pa'i gtor ba dang // so sor byin rlabs sngo bar bya// ha ho hri 'ab sbyar ba yis/
46a5(rgyud2): bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar tshogs/ mdzes pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// 'gron mchog rnams la dbul bar bya// oM e ha hi ru lu ru lu dza hUM ba ho// badz+ra
46a6(rgyud2): ki ni b+h+yo e a ra li dza dza/ suM b+ha ni suH/ a kad rgya/ a gang rgya/ pra pe sha ya/ tha be sha ya/ khan d+hA ya ban d+ha ya/ to sha sa to sha ya/ me ha ya mo ha ya/ tri
46a7(rgyud2): ha/ po la ma k+Sha ka kar+d+han// ga g+ha kha d+hA na/ sarba du'aM rgyan pan/ b+hUr+thab+hU d+hA/ a ru ka kra/ shAn ta~M ku ru hUM ba rmAhA/ kha hi bgag su gan d+hu tiSh+pe ta pra ti/
46a8(rgyud2): b+ha ya kha hi/ oM b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha sarba ye gi shwa ri hAM tsa swA hA/ mchod gtor bstan pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o// / de nas bsrung ba dam pa dang // drag po las
46b1(rgyud2): kyi dbye ba bshad/ khre bo hUM mdzad rdo rje dang / yas byed yub dang bcas pa yis// 'khor lo bskor ba bla med pa'o// oM badz+ra bahA kro ta sarba ya ma sha ni tras ni/
46b2(rgyud2): sarba pra ta gi ra yig tsa hr-iswa/ sa tra ma la/ ba ru ba ga/ ba ra b+ha ni ti/ ta na sarba pra tam/ gi ra na ba d+ha du hUM hUM phaT/ 'chang ba po la rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT hU~M swA hA/ gur gum
46b3(rgyud2): gI haM dri dang ldan/ khro bo 'od zer spro bsdu yis// bar chad bsrung ba 'di nyid kyis// ye shes gsang ba bstan pa'o// ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro dang // las kyi

47a7(rgyud2): mchod sbyin gyi nus pas pha rol 'joms cing phyir mi bzlog par bya ba la/ oM sa rba rnam ma ba tu nyig te lan rnamis sbya gung rnyeg/ ces dpag tu med par byin gyis

47b1(rgyud2): dpal ldan 'gon po yis// las kyi pho nya chen po ni// las kyi pho nya chen po ni// drang srong bza' bdud 'chi bdag ste// de nyid sgrub pa bshad par bya// dur
47b2(rgyud2): khrod brag nag dug shing dang // gdug pa can yod 'jigs pa'i gnas/ khrag sna dug gi chag chag bya// bstan pa bsrung bar sems bskyed nas// ting 'dzin ldan
47b3(rgyud2): bas dkyil 'khor ba shams// rdzas dang mchod pa gtor mar ldan// 'di nyid las kyi mgon pos te// mdun bskyed gsal las sa bon las// rab tu drungs

47b7(rgyud2): dgra bo khrag tu kyag/ gal te las ni 'gyang pa na// spogs pas gnad la bor cing bcung // bdun 'bum grangs ni tshang ba na// sgrub bya myur du sgrol bar nges//

48a1(rgyud2): / @#go rims phyogs dang stong zla can// / 'dis ni tshig chod grub par byed/ rayul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o//

48a3(rgyud2): lcags khro bcu dang // zar mnyung dkar ti la nag rdzas// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po'i nang // dur ras 'khor lo bris pa dril// gser dbul 'khor
48a4(rgyud2): lo srog dang ni// las mkhan gnang dbab 'khor lo bri// 'bum tshe bdun gyi las 'di 'grub// oM ma hA ka la ya/ re ma ti b+h+yo/ rargyal sring drung cang chod/
48a5(rgyud2): mu yer a mu ka/ k+Sha snying du khri ba ni du sdus/ k+Shu shang tsakra/ nu ma ra ya/ thib thib dza nar ma ra ya/ b+ho ra sa du ya b+han d+he ba ba/ d+hi du pa ya tsa thun/ tsi ta la
48a6(rgyud2): thob bog/ khyod shi'i bud med zhabs ma las// rang la mi ldog sngags bdab bya// ni nag dza mun ti a a/ sngags 'jub yid dam chos skyong gsal/
48a7(rgyud2): tha mar rtags byung rta bskyal te/ dmod por bya zhing gtor ma bskyal// thun brdeg las sbyor grub par 'gyur// drang srong thog la bstan pa'i le'u ste re gnyis
48a8(rgyud2): pa'o// // de nas gyon thang dbab pa'i las// thog mar skrag ma'i las 'di'o// dang po rdzas ldan thus las bya// ting 'dzin gsal bas sngags
48b1(rgyud2): spel dazlas/ oM ra hu la gser thog thog/ pr-i pr-i/ le le du du bye bye ya/ d+he ba ku ru ye/ d+he ba kun d+hu li/ de ba phung pro/ thar thu thar thu 'ur 'ur rlog/
48b2(rgyud2): thug thug che tsho'u ra mi kar thog leng ling / shar shar thug thug phaT phaT dza// rug rug tag tag cheb chem lkog lkog phob po ba ya/ na mo b+hu thA ya/ oM ki
48b3(rgyud2): khi ki li ya/ tsan d+ha mi ri li tsan b+ha tsaN d+he na ga// b+han d+ha b+han d+ha ya/ hUM hAM phaT swA hA/ na ga na ga mgo la thog drag pos phob te ma ha rag sha Sha Na/ i man du
48b4(rgyud2): ti sprin rgyob/ i ma la hi phreM shig du ma chen rgyob/ thun bro 'ur 'ur tsher lcags lhags/ phob pob/ na ga na ga/ d+he pa ri ba/ phreM pro/ hri la hri la/ e na
48b5(rgyud2): la da/ pro sha la sil/ du ma sprin chen phreM pro shar/ sil sil 'ur 'ur phob pho ba ya/ oM ma hA ka la tra ga shad do tra bdud phreM/ ma hA ka li ser po/ shung
48b6(rgyud2): d+he sIn pra bro shwar shar/ drag du mgon nal na la/ chem chem pra dr-i shar shwar na ga nag bdud phro/ g+ha na hri ta trag shad ling ling / 'ur 'ur lhogs lhags/
48b7(rgyud2): shA sha shu shu ging ka ra ma ru tsa dmar/ gul phreM pro/ na ga shu bo ho/ li ma ma rag mo dza dza phob phob/ oM ni gnag mgo la thun khrag phob/ pu ta pra ta yA/
48b8(rgyud2): i ba s+ya/ b+ha ri sha ya/ na ga na ga// drag por phob/ ta ra tra phaT de hu ya hu ya/ mi tri li la pu pu ho/ byin thang mi rlung cha brang thab/
49a1(rgyud2): mgonades ni thog dang ser ba 'bab// thog ser skrag ma'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu re gsum pa'o// // de nas 'gon
49a2(rgyud2): po chen po yis// sprul pa'i las byed po nya ni// bya khyung tshogs kyi bdug pa 'dul// sa 'og sa steng sa bla ra ni// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las dang sangs
49a3(rgyud2): rgyas rigs kyi khyung // dam tshig pa 'jig rten khyung // 'og gi glu gnyenas bdag 'joms// bar gyi 'byung po gnod sbyin dang // lha ma yin dang gdon
49a4(rgyud2): tshogs 'dul// gal te 'jig rten char dbab pa// klu gnas pa'i ri bo'i rtse ra/ bal po se'u lcags ma la/ sngags bzlas char pa myur du 'bebs//
49a5(rgyud2): ba dmar dkar rlo ma las// 'bras dang so ba gro sran dang // sman sA rin chen 'bru sna tshogs/ ri lu gzugs bsnyen cho 'phrul bya// ba'i lci bas byug pa yis//
49a6(rgyud2): pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad bri// 'gon po ldum bral las mgon dang // bya khyung klu rgyal thams cad dang // phyogs skyong bcu dang rgyal chen bzhi// bza'
49a7(rgyud2): dang drang srong rgyu skar sogs// lha srin bde brgyad ma lus pa// yul de'i lha klu bka' sgo bya// gtor ma phul la 'phrin las bcol/ oM na ga ka la hUM/ na ga le
49a8(rgyud2): le dum pa li la~M/ na ga ra tsa hUM phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA oM tsa ta tsata/ badz+re tre sho te she swAhA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tsa ma ti tri swAhA/ oM na ga ta li b+ha ri sha/ ya d+ha rma
49b1(rgyud2): sha swa ta ya swa ta ya/ myur du phobo pho ba swA hA/ rlung lha mchod chu gtor btang // oM ti ti la ya nan/ nar chur ya nan/ b+ha yu stam pa nan/ mu kha stam pa ya/ la
49b2(rgyud2): snyam pa ya/ b+hu pa tra stam b+ha nan/ des ni myur du dbab par 'gyur/ gal te las ni 'gyangs pa na/ klu'i gnas ni 'brug par bsam// bye mtshan char dbab rjer
49b3(rgyud2): spo bya// yang na g.yo ba'i nus pa bskyed// des ni myur 'grub mchod sbyin bya// de nas stobs sbyin dpa' bo yis// bsrung ba'i mchog gyur bsang ba 'dis// nyin
49b4(rgyud2): dang mtshan mo mi dang ni// mi ma yin rnams bsrung bar byed// phyag rgya ldan pas bcing par byed/ rag ta dza Ta rag ta sa tra/ ra ga ta ma g+hu Ta/ d+ha ri ni/ u la ti/ b+ha d+ha
49b5(rgyud2): wa d+hI/ hi ya tsu ga ti/ tsa d+ha wa/ mo ha ko/ me la sa te ha ka/ ka b+ha wi/ rag ta dza la/ rag ta phaT/ ra ga Ta dzA Ta ma ku Da/ sa he la d+ha ri ni/ u pa a b+had d+ha/
49b6(rgyud2): i ti o ka hUM/ ra tsa ha sa ni/ la b+ha na na ni/ pa ra ta te spring sa ra hUM/ bsrung ba mchog tu gyur pa ste/ rdo rje'i ra ba zhu las mgo// / go cha me 'bar bzlog
49b7(rgyud2): bar 'gyur/ khyud las dang bsrung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje bya khyud gyis// las byed ka la'i khyud nag ste/ gnas dang nye ba'i
49b8(rgyud2): gnas dag dang // zhing skyong sha za pho nya ni// mtshan mo rgyu ba las byed pa// dur khrod rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs gnas// srin po nag po 'ug rdong can// las kyi mgon
50a1(rgyud2): mgon/ @po sprul pa stimi/ oM ma hA ka la// badz+ra b+ha ru na/ ma ha k+She ta pa/ u lu mu kha ya/ ru d+hi ra pri ya ma nu Sha an tra/ tri ta a laM ka ra/ ma ma
50a2(rgyud2): sarba sha tAM/ dgra bo'i khyim du cho 'phrul phob cig swA hA/ ces so// dur khrod chas brgyan nag po ni// zhing skyong gi khug thod pa can// mdun las mchod pa las
50a3(rgyud2): bcol bye/ oM ma hA ka la khye tra pa la/ ru d+hi ra sri ya/ ma nu sha/ a na tra/ ti ta a/ lang ka ra/ ma ma sha truM b+ha ya ka ra/ uM uM uM lu lu l+r-i/ kuM kuM kuM/ u
50a4(rgyud2): tsa ta ya/ b+hi sha ya/ hAM dza hU dza/ phaT phaT swA hA/ dug dang ldag gi ling ga byas la// sngags kyi bskor tsang thug rdeg/ u lu ka'i mgo lags pa la// cho
50a5(rgyud2): 'phrul gzugs brnyan bskor// zhag nyer grub pa'o// bya khyung gi sprul pa cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o// // de nas he ru ka dpal la// bstod
50a6(rgyud2): ba 'di yis yang dag bstod// thugs rje'i dbyings nas rab bzhengs bcom ldan 'das// zhal gsum phyag drug 'thing nag dbang phyug sku/ zhal gyi gzhad
50a7(rgyud2): bas rtsigs dang rngam pa nyid/ gar nyams ro dgu ldan la phyag bstod// 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnyam gnan 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje phag ma'i ska la 'dril
50a8(rgyud2): mdzad pa/ yab yum rdo rje pad+ma dges rol ba'i/ bde chen ye shes skal phyag 'tshal bstod/ thabs dang shes rab dbyer med rang byung ska/ zag med dga'
50b1(rgyud2): pa ye shes thig le che/ bsang ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo sdom/ dpal ldan g.yas brkyang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// mchod byed mkha' 'gro'i dbus na
50b2(rgyud2): bzhugs mdzad do// glang chen kle rlon stag lpags nam bza' bsnams/ phyag rgya drug ldan rigs lngas dbu brgyan pa'i/ dar 'phyangs bcod pan mdzes la phyag
50b3(rgyud2): 'tshal lo// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bsnol bas 'khyud// ba ma ru dang kha Ti ka 'dzin cing / gri khug thod khrag mi mgo'i phreng ba can/ ye shes drug pa'i bdan
50b4(rgyud2): nyid phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas zhal ser po sku'i yon tan rdzogs/ g.yon ni ma dgang gsung gi 'phrin las nyid/ dbus mthugs mgon bde stong chos
50b5(rgyud2): nyid dang ta mi gnas he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i brgyan gyi brgyan cing kun snang dpal/ rnal 'byor ma ni b+ha d+ha ka ltar 'bar/ rdo rje bar snod sdig
50b6(rgyud2): 'dzub mdzad pa ma/ rab mdzes bde chen yum la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba mchog tu gyur pas 'gyur med pa// gangs ltar bsil ba med dpung dbus
50b7(rgyud2): na bzhags/ rdo rje sems dpa' rtser ldan sbal pa 'gyed/ ska lnga ye shes lnga ldan phyag 'tshal lo// bdud tshogs ma lus rab tu 'joms mdzad ma// hri
50b8(rgyud2): 'thing dmar zhal cig spyan gsum mche brtsigs/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan na ra'i lpags pa bsnams// rdo rje 'khros ma khrag 'thung phyag 'tshal lo// sa gsum
51a1(rgyud2): ma'o// @#dregs pa dbang bsdud zil gyi gnon/ 'gyur med 'gying bag ldan pa lha me'i bco// nyi shu rtsa lnga 'go 'phreng do shal can/ gser/
51a2(rgyud2): mdog 'jigs med ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rnam rtog rtsad nas gcod mdzad ma/ dbu skra grol cing g.yas brkyang goms pa bzhugs// ma rgad mdog can
51a3(rgyud2): gcer bu dur khrod rol// rdo rje drag rdus ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i log rtog skye mas byed 'od mnga' ma/ bde tshan nyi dbus rab gnas dpa' me ste/
51a4(rgyud2): sngags kyi sgra sgrogs ye shes rngam pa nyid/ rdo rje gzi brjid ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bde chen stong nyid 'du 'bral med pa las/ spros bral chos nyid dang las
51a5(rgyud2): lha mor sbal/ du ba'i mdog can sku la me 'od 'phro// rdo rje drag mo bdag med phyag 'tshal lo// rang byung rnam dag pha rol phyin drug yum/ snying rje chen pos
51a6(rgyud2): ngo nya tshe 'phrul ston/ rab brjid shel mdog rus pa'i mgo phag can/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo thams cad gri khug par snod 'chang
51a7(rgyud2): Da ma ru dang kha T+wA~M kha 'dzin ma/ gar mnyes sgyur byed rol pa mkha' 'gro'i mchog/ bde gshegs yum 'gyur rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// stong nyid
51a8(rgyud2): snying rje mi byed ye shes sku/ mdog kar zhal gsum phyag drug brgyan dang ldan/ rdo rje dril bu cang ti'u kha Ta ldan/ dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal la/
51b1(rgyud2): chos nyid skye med srid zhi 'das pa'i mchog/ bai dUr+ya mdog spyan gsum chad pa'i/ 'khor lo dril bu ba ru kha Ta 'tshang / rnam par snang mdzad dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
51b2(rgyud2): chags pa med pas bde ba'i sgyu ma'i bde bar rol/ ka ra pad ma thod pa ba ma ru/ kha TaM ka 'dzin ral pa'i gcod pan can/ pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug phyag 'tshal lo//
51b3(rgyud2): bde chen dga' ba mi mdzad gsang ba'i sku/ 'thing nag gri khug thod khrag phyag rgya can/ Da ma ru dang kha TaM kha bsnams pa/ dpal ldan he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
51b4(rgyud2): gzi brjid rin chen dpal gyis rgyal mtshan ldan/ gser mdog nor bu dril bu Sha ma ru/ kha Tag ldan snang byed rgyal ba che/ rdo rje nyi ma 'bar mdzad phyag 'tshal lo//
51b5(rgyud2): rdo rje gdon mi za ba don kun grub/ dur khrod sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ ba ru kha T+wAM me dpung rlong bzhugs pa'i/ rta mchog rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha'
51b6(rgyud2): 'gro zhing skyong bzhis ni rab tu bskor/ 'khor lo drug ldan dkyil 'khor dur khrod bcas/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag po lha tshogs la/ rnal 'byor bdag cag
51b7(rgyud2): gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// ces Da ki thams cad kyi yang dag bstod pa'o// // de nas dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad drag po chen po la lha ma srin bde brgyad kyis rgyas par
51b8(rgyud2): bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par bstod pa/ oM ma hA ka la gA na hri da hUM phaT/ oM gyi tshangs pa'i gnas bdun sing ge rgya mtsho bsgrol/ ma ha ma sa rag tas bkang
52a1(rgyud2): mgon/ #ba'i dung chen bsnams/ bka ni gang la'ang mi gnas yang dag lta ba can/ la ni glang sogs ti mug can kun 'byed par 'gyur/ b+hu ni yon/
52a2(rgyud2): tan ldan pas lha klu rnams kyi bstod/ na ste ngan song la sogs sa nas 'gro ba bsgrol bar byed/ hri ni byang chub snying rjes rab brgyan dpal ldan sku/ d+ha ni 'das pa'i
52a3(rgyud2): gnas kyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gre'i tshogs dbus bzhugs/ hUM las ma 'das sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can/ phaT kyi skrag byed par snang sprin bzhin rtor bar
52a4(rgyud2): mdzad/ ma hA ka la yon tan ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'jigs seng ge ltor/ thub med ded dpon bdud kyi skrag pa'i yul
52a5(rgyud2): la ni/ dpal ldan dpa' bo lha min rnams las mi 'jigs mdzad/ ma rig 'khrul pa kun las rnam par rgyal la bstod/ dus gsum bde gshegs bstan
52a6(rgyud2): pa bsrung mdzad pa/ gdug pa 'dul phyir gshin rje'i sku mdog dang tshul ston/ skye 'gro phal cher kun gyi skyabs gyur khyod kyi ni/ thugs rje'i dbang gi 'gro ba'i
52a7(rgyud2): don du cho 'phrul mdzad/ byang chub sems chen rnams slab pa mnyam la bstod/ dbang phyug rigs 'dzin rnams dang khyod kyi mthu stobs mtshungs/ khro rgyal chen
52a8(rgyud2): po rnams dang sred pa mthu mnyam pa/ lha dbang klu rgyal chen po rnams dang longs spyod mnyam/ yun ring dga' bas 'gro ba'i don du rtson 'grus bstod/ smon
52b1(rgyud2): lam phun sum tshogs pas rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/ ji ltar 'dod bzhin sangs rgyas zhing khams skyong bas 'phags/ rtag tu dmigs med chos nyid mi
52b2(rgyud2): g.yo la gnas pa/ ye shes nor bu mun sel yid bzhin nor khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bgegs 'pham par byed pa'i gsang sngags bdag po ni/
52b3(rgyud2): shAkya'i sus khyod 'byung gnas chen po chos kyi bdag/ mkha' 'gro dbang bskur bskal par bsags pa'i sdig bsgrib 'joms/ gang tshe bstan pa nyams
52b4(rgyud2): dus myur du gshegs mdzad pa'i/ gang dang gang la ces 'dul sbal mdzad phyag 'tshal lo/ ces rab tu bstod pa 'di na/ sgrub pa gus blo rtson pa
52b5(rgyud2): rnams la mchog rtsol bar gyur pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad la bstod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// // de nas 'phags pa rnam thos sras la/ lha
52b6(rgyud2): dang drang srong thams kyi bstod pa/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang / 'gro ba'i don du rnam thos sras su grags/ thugs rje tshad med rin
52b7(rgyud2): chen rter mnga' ba/ thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas byed phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen pho brang mdzes pa'i gzhal yas khang / nor gyi dbang phyug ngo mtshar
52b8(rgyud2): gnas mchog na/ mi 'jigs sing ge'i khri la bzhags mdzad pa/ hA sgom sa bon 'od zer 'phro 'du las/ 'gon po chen po gsang ba'i
53a1(rgyud2): sku bzhengs pa/ zhal gsum spyan dgu'i 'bring nag phyag drug pa/ zhal ni mche ba cung zad rtsigs pa ste/ yon tan rab rgyas khyod la phyag
53a2(rgyud2): 'tshal lo// sna tshogs pad+ma dar gyi bar na steng du/ yum ni lha mo pad+ma tsug bde la/ yab yum gnyis med dges pa'i sbyor ba mdzad/ thabs dang shes
53a3(rgyud2): rab gsal ba bde ba'i mchog/ ye shes rol pa mnyam nyid dpal ldan ste/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi ster mnga' phyag 'tshal bstod/ 'dad tshogs
53a4(rgyud2): g.yul ngo bzlog mdzad dpa' bo che/ gnod sbyin chen po khro mchog mi bzad skra/ lha chen rnams kyi khyod la rab 'dud pa/ mi 'jig 'jig
53a5(rgyud2): pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ bstan pa dus gsum phyogs bcur rgyas mdzad ma/ rgyal
53a6(rgyud2): chen bzhi'i gtso bo chen po ste/ bsgrub por dngos grub ster la phyag 'tshal stong / zhal gsum sku gsung thugs dang rnam thar gsum/ phyag
53a7(rgyud2): drug pha rol phyin pa rnam dag pa/ dpa' bo chen po 'gying bag brjid pa'i sku/ ye shes rtsal ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ rin chen nor bu
53a8(rgyud2): sna tshogs brgyan gyi sgras/ dar 'phyangs gcod pan lhab lhub dbu brgyan can/ nyi zla phrag grong g.yu 'brug gar bar rdol/ lha'i rol ma
53b1(rgyud2): sna tshogs dpag med dang / gnod sbyin chen po ma lus mchod par byed/ lha'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ gdugs dang
53b2(rgyud2): rgyal mtshan pa dan rol me can/ lha mo klu mo'i tshogs kyis rab mchod pa/ bsgrub pa po la rin chen char 'bebs pa'i/ bdud
53b3(rgyud2): 'dul lha srin tshegs kyi rab mchod pa/ nus pa'i mthu rtsal dpag med mthu stobs can/ dpal ldan rnam thos sras la phyag 'tshal
53b4(rgyud2): bstod/ bar chad thams cad bsrung zhing dngos grub brtsol/ ma lus dbang du bsdud pa'i khro rgyal che/ rin chen dbang bsdud
53b5(rgyud2): brgya'i sku tshogs 'phro/ dgos 'dod sna tshogs char bzhin 'bebs par mdzad/ phyag g.yas dang po rin chen rdo rje ni/ mi byed ye shes
53b6(rgyud2): lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags/ phyag g.yon pad+ma dri mas ma gos rtags/ yum la khyud pa bde chen rgyas pa'i rtags/ rin chen rgyal mtshan bdud
53b7(rgyud2): las rnam par rgyu la/ nga rin chen ral gri log 'dren 'joms pa'i rtags/ rin chen 'bar bas dgos 'dod skong ba'i rtags/ rdo rje zhags pa
53b8(rgyud2): thugs rjes 'dzin pa'i rtags/ gsang ba'i sku mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ yu ma ni ska mdog dmar ser chags pa che ba'i stegs//
53'a1(rgyud2): phyag g.yas klu'i nor bu yon tan ldan/ g.yon pas pad snod zhal zas yab la stob/ yab yum dges rdor
53'a2(rgyud2): rol mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ 'khor lo tshad med nor bu rin chen dang / khyab bdag blo gros ldan dang btsun mo mchog/ dmag dpon dgra bgegs
53'a3(rgyud2): ga yul ngo zlog byed pa/ dpal gyi blangs po stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul can/ rta mchog cang shes rin chen char 'bebs pa/ rin chen bdun ldan bdag la dngos
53'a4(rgyud2): grub ster/ ral gri 'bar ba dpag sam shing mchog tshe/ lha klu'i nor bu a 'bra gar pa sogs/ 'dod 'jo'i ba dang khyud mchog ma he
53'a5(rgyud2): sogs/ ra rin chen gos dang ster gyi bum pa bzang / bkra shis rdzas dang nye ba'i yo byad rnams/ rin chen bsam 'phel
53'a6(rgyud2): dbang gyi rgyal po 'dzin/ 'phrin las grub pa'i dbang phyug sna tshogs pa/ dga' bo smad byung bdag la grub pa gsol/
53'b1(rgyud2): gang gi sgrub pas 'gro ba dbang bsdud cing / dngos gru ba las chen 'phrin las dbang sbyar ba/ thugs rjes 'phongs pa sel ba'i mgon po
53'b2(rgyud2): che// khyod ni yon tan nus pa'i 'byung ga nas che// mthun pa'i mchod sbyin gi tor ma 'di ba zhes la/ sgrub pa po'i don kun grub pa dang /
53'b3(rgyud2): dgra bgegs bar chad ma lus bzlog mdzad cing / phun tshogs longs spyo da da lta nyid du gsol// ces mthun pa'i dam rdzas phul/
53'b4(rgyud2): gsol ba btab pas shin tu myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa 'brog ga nas mched lnga la/ gnod sbyin
53'b5(rgyud2): ded dben nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi be stod pa/ rin chen bzang po bang mdzod spel bar byed/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis dngos gru ba mi
53'b6(rgyud2): zad ster/ 'byung po kun la rnam par rgyal byed pa/ gang ba bzang po mchog la bstod do// rin chen yid bzhin dgos 'dod kun skong zhing /
54a1(rgyud2): mgon/ #'bru 'phel sman gyi ljon shing mnga' mdzad pa/ bsil ldan nad dang sdug bsngal las skyob pa// nor bu bzang po khyod la bdag
54a2(rgyud2): bstod do// chags pa med pas bar chad ma lus sel// rin chen bum pas tshe dang dbang phyugs 'phel// ma rung tshar gcod 'phags pa'i sar gnas pa/ gnod
54a3(rgyud2): sbyin sred slong la ni bdag bstod do// srid gsum bstan g.yo thogs med sa la ston// dud 'gro ri dgas byol song gnas skyob// snang srid bdag po cho 'phrul sna
54a4(rgyud2): tshogs ston// 'gon po yang dag shes la bdag bstod do// gtsug lag khang dang dben gnas bsrungs mdzad pa// rnam bzhi'i 'khor tshogs ri bo'i khrod
54a5(rgyud2): gnas pa// yon tan ster zhing legs par skyong byed pa// 'gon po 'brog gnas rgyal la bdag bstod do// de nas 'khor 'gyur lha klu dri za dang // mi 'am/
54a6(rgyud2): ci dang lto phye grul bum dang // srin po lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang // ma lus 'byung pos bdag gi grogs mdzad cing // gzhan yang lha mo'i tshogs dang
54a7(rgyud2): gnod sbyin mos// srin mo sha zan gdug cing rngam pa'o// klu mo 'chi bdag ma mo 'byung po rnams// rnal 'byor bdag gis mchod cing bskul ba'i tshe//
54a8(rgyud2): bar chad bzlog cing dges pa grub par mdzod// rgyal ba khyud mchog 'khor bcas mchod gyur pas// 'phrin las nus pa ma lus dngos grub gsol//
54b1(rgyud2): / ces mchod cing bstod pa'o// 'phags pa 'khor bcas la bstod pa ste le'u re brgyad pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan g+hu na sa ti la// grub pa'i lha mos
54b2(rgyud2): yang dag bstod par 'gyur/ b+h+rUM 'jig rten lha chen kun gyi dbang phyug rtso// sku mdog rab dngas zla ba byang sems mtshungs// mche ba pha rol phyin drug sku la rdzob/
54b3(rgyud2): sna ni rab dmar dbang gi las mdzad pa// lcags kyu lta bar dgug pa'i las myur mdzad// sna tshogs pad ma rin chen bye ba'i khri// nor bu skyug pas gdan mdzad ma
54b4(rgyud2): rungs gnan// rin chen dbu brgyan spyi gcig rin chen nor// oMn tra nI la be dur sna tshogs mdog/ rin chen char rgyun sgrub pa po la 'bebs// spyan gnyis gzigs
54b5(rgyud2): pa bden gnyis dge ba la// phyag bzhi bsdu dngos mi thung skyeg pa che/ phyag g.yas dang po dngos grub gsol ba ste// lha'i la phug ro mchog bcung len rtags/
54b6(rgyud2): rin chen bgrang phreng rigs sngags 'chang ba'o// g.yon pa pad gzhong 'bru sna lag pa rnams// bsgrub pa po la zas dang 'byor pa spel// dgra sta phas kyi sgol
54b7(rgyud2): ba char gcod cing // sna tshogs don kun grub ster tshogs kyi bdag/ gsus che longs spyod mtha' yas rter mnga' ba// gcod pan brgyan mdzes khyod la phyag
54b8(rgyud2): 'tshal bstod// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhis rigs bzhi'i gnas// rter mdzod bsrung zhing bar chad mi mthun bzlog/ myur 'grub dpal 'bar gzi ldan yon tan
55a1(rgyud2): mgon/ @#rtsol khyod kyi thub pa'i bstan pa bsrung mdzod la// lha srin sde brgyad dbang du bsdus nas kyang // sgrub la dngos grub sna tshogs gyur/
55a2(rgyud2): du gsol// ces bstod do// de nas gu lang gi tshogs kyi lha dbang phyug chen po la bstod pa// 'gon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// rab
55a3(rgyud2): sbrul sangs rgyas bstan pa'i thog mar ni// 'jig rten kun du 'byung ba'i bdag po che// dbang phyug chen pos lam tshol lta la bkod// phyi rol kun du rgyu ba
55a4(rgyud2): thams cad kyis// gnas 'gyur nus pa'i las chen grub byed cing // ro langs ral gri gser 'gyur gnod sbyin mo// bum pa bzang po ri lu mig sman dang / rkang /
55a5(rgyud2): mgyogs rdo rje an dza dbab pa ste// grub pa ster byed rnal 'byor dgos pa sgrubs// haM las drag po ku'i spro sbur ston// zhal cig phyag gnyis spyan gsum
55a6(rgyud2): 'jigs pa'i tshul// sku mdog sngo bsang rin chen klu dbang brgyan// g.yas pa bdud rtsi bum pa dngos grub bster// g.yon pa lcags kyus gzos pa'i
55a7(rgyud2): snying nas 'dren/ khrag gi ral pas bar snang khams rnams khyebs// srid ma'i lang ga rgyas pas gyen du 'dren// bde chen mi 'bral bzung 'dzin pa/
55a8(rgyud2): lha mo khrag mdom me tog mdangs len byed// u ma dus mtshan chags pas longs spod pa// zag bcas snying po ma me'i dbus bzhags pa// dbang phyug
55b1(rgyud2): nus ldan khyod la bdag stong ngo do// 'jig rten lha klu ma lus zil gnon cing // mthus stobs rtsal ldan rtsa gsum dbang byed pa// pha rol dgol ba'i nus pa tshar/
55b2(rgyud2): gcod cing // bdud dpung bzlog byed yon tan rgyal po che// nyan rang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// rtag tu khyod ni rab tu mchod byed pa// dbyangs
55b3(rgyud2): can lha mo dges byed mi thun ma// skyong byed 'phel byed stobs can lha mo'o// bdag po sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung byed pa/ khyod kyis srung zhing bar chad bzlog
55b4(rgyud2): par mdzod// ces rab tu bstod cing mchod par 'gyur ba'o// tshogs bdag dbang phyug la bstod pa ste le'u re dgu pa'o// // de nas ma mo 'dus pa
55b5(rgyud2): yis// ral cig ma la mngon par bstod// ma b+h+yo gsang sngags gnyen gyi bsrungs ma mthu me che// sngags bsrungs nag me rdo rje ral cig ma/ mngon par
55b6(rgyud2): bstod kyi dam las ma 'da' cig/ gru gsum dbang du bdud pa'i rtags// phyag yas tri shul rtse gsum bsnams pa ni// srid gsum rtsa da nas gcod pa'i
55b7(rgyud2): rtags// g.yon pa ban d+ha mar gyi bskang ba ni// tshe dbang dngos grub ster ba'i rtags// zhing chen tsi ta bsnams pa ni// 'gro drug skye shi rtsad nas gcod
55b8(rgyud2): pa'i rtags/ g.yon pa ga yu'i spang mo dgra thabs gtong pa ni// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs myur du bsgral ba'i rtags// thugs la spang mo dgu 'bum 'phro ba ni/
56a1(rgyud2): mgon stong khams dgra bo ma lus bsgrol ba'i rtags// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs bzhugs pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor/
56a2(rgyud2): ba'i rtags// ma mo nag mo gdug pa'i srog gcod ma// mngon par bstod kyi mthu ma chung // ma ma tra ga sha e ka dza ti i daM b+ha lang pu dza dza ho kha kha kha hI kha hI ma ma
56a3(rgyud2): snying ma ma snying kha rag ma ma ra ka sha ma ma rag sha/ rag mo snying kha rag kha la thun rbang b+h+ye b+h+yo// ma mo bskul ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu pa'o// de nas dpal
56a4(rgyud2): mgon po chen po beng can la bstod pa 'di kho na'o// hUM ba de chen 'du 'bral med pa'i rlong dkyil nas// yang dag ye shes sku cig snang ba ni// mgon po bang ma
56a5(rgyud2): gsang ba'i sku bzhengs la// mi 'gyur khro bo khyod la bdag bstod do// sku mdog mthing nag khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal dbu skra khams nag thod rtsugs gyen du bcing
56a6(rgyud2): ngar 'phyangs gcod pan rin chen 'bar bar brgyan// rigs lngas dbu la brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyan gsum bzlog cing zhal gdangs mche ba brtsigs//
56a7(rgyud2): smin ma ag chom dmar ser me ltar 'bar// ljags 'dril ha ha gzhang pa'i nga re sgrogs// 'jigs byed nag po khyod la bdag bstod do// phyag g.yas tsan
56a8(rgyud2): ngan beng chen smug po las// lha dmag nyi khri cig stong sprul pa 'gyed// lha mini gro khyer brlag par mdzad pa'o// bstan pa'i 'phrin las bskyong la phyag 'tshal
56b1(rgyud2): bstod// phyag g.yon lcags kyi bar bu sku la rten// thun rdzas mtshon chas bzas pa'i snying la rdeg dpa' bo srid gsum bdag po chen po ste// ma rungs 'joms mdzad
56b2(rgyud2): khyod la bdag bstod do// zhabs gnyis gar stabs bgrang cing 'gying bag tshul stag lpags sham thabs mi mgo phreng bas brgyan// bdud dpung ma lus rtsad nas
56b3(rgyud2): gcod byed pa// mgon po dam tshig gcan la bdag bstod do// rin chen sna tshogs nyi zla nor bu 'dzin// klu dbang gi rgyan rgyan cha rngam par ston// dus gsum rgyal
56b4(rgyud2): ba'i bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa// dpal ldan 'gon po khyod la bdag bstod do// ces lha srin rnams kyis bstod pa'o// // de nas ri bo 'di de shan gyis mgon po bad
56b5(rgyud2): 'dzin la bstod do// hUM yab cig dpal ldan mgon po chen po ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bka' bsrungs mdzad/ khro rngam 'bar ba'i sku la drag por
56b6(rgyud2): ston// dkar phyogs rgyas mdzad khyod la bdag bstod do// sdug nag zhal bskrad phaT dang hUM sgra can// shin du rno kar mche ba bzhi rtsigs cing // spyan gsum 'bar
56b7(rgyud2): bas 'od zer glog stong 'gyu// rtum po rab 'phros khyod la bdag bstod do// sku la thon 'thing nag po'i 'jol bar gsol// gser ka rin chen mdzes pa'i
56b8(rgyud2): rkyed pa bcings// sa ga ti ga yu ris khro bo'i lham du mdzad// bstan pa'i byar mdzad la bdag bstod do// tsan dan beng la lha dmag rdzod ces nas// ma rungs
57a1(rgyud2): mgon@#gro khyer sum rtsegs 'jig byed pa// g.yon pa beng zhabs phur bus dgra bgegs snying la gsor byed bdag bstod do// bdug pa 'byung po'i
57a2(rgyud2): gnod byed tshogs rnams la// beng chen gsor zhing gled pa'i rgyas su rdeg/ sku la me 'od 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// bdud dpung ma lus sreg la bdag bstod do//
57a3(rgyud2): sngon tshe he ru ka dpal spyan snga ru// dam bcas khas blangs bzhin du dgongs mdzad pa// rnal 'byor bdag cag rnams kyi dgra bo la// brgag pa'i las
57a4(rgyud2): 'di khyod kyi mthar phyung shig/ mchod sbyin dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bdag la sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// dkon mchog dbu 'phang
57a5(rgyud2): stod bya'i phyir// bdug pa'i dgra bgegs myur du bsgrol bar mdzod// ces drag tu bskul lo// dpal mgon po nag po chen po// legs ldan nag po// rig
57a6(rgyud2): 'dzin gyi srog shing // rnal 'byor gyi dgra lha// dug gsum nad kyi sman pa// ma me'i dbang phyug/ bdud 'dul gyi dpag dpon// gtsug lag khang dang //
57a7(rgyud2): dkyil 'khor gyi bsrung ma khyod kyis// bka' dang bstan pa bsrung cig/ 'khor dang gang zag skyong cig/ dkon mchog dbu 'bangs bstod par mdzad
57a8(rgyud2): du gsol// ces brjod par bya'o// legs ldan nag po bstod pa'i le'u ste don cig pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// pad+ma nyi ma
57b1(rgyud2): hUM las byung // zhal cig phyag gnyis spun gsum pa// gri khug thod pa 'dzin par mdzad// 'go 'phreng do shal sbrul gyis brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong
57b2(rgyud2): bzhugs pa// ye shes nag po chen po ste// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// dur khrod gnas nas bzhengs pa'i mgon po che// las kyi nag po zhal cig mche
57b3(rgyud2): brtsigs// spyan gsum dmar 'bar mun pa'i mdog can de// bdug pa 'dul byed khyod la bdag bstod do// g.yas pa rdo rje gri khug rnon po yis// bstan pa 'jig
57b4(rgyud2): byed lus la 'debs par byed// g.yon pa thod par bzas pa'i snying khrag bskang // zhal du gsol mdzad khyod la bdag bstod do// dug sbrul rnams dang rus pa'i
57b5(rgyud2): 'phreng bas brgyan// sta ga lpags shams thabs mgo phreng do shal can// mi thung lus las dug gi mi dpung 'phro// dgra bgegs myur bsgral khyod la bdag bstod
57b6(rgyud2): do// shin du khros pas drag po'i hUM sgra sgrogs// phaT phaT drag shul rngam pa'i skrag par byed/ khyod ni srin po khros pa rtum po ste// dpa' bo 'jig byed khyod la
57b7(rgyud2): bdag bstod do// las kyi lha mo 'dzegs pa'i tshul 'chang ba// zhal cig phyag bzhi spyan gsum ha ha sgrogs// stag zil mdog can zhing chen ga yang gzhi
57b8(rgyud2): gyon// lha mo bsgrol byed ma la bdag bstod do// khrag dang zhag gi thig les lus brgyan pa// ral pa'i zar bu me tog 'phro ba can// srad gsum mo'i
58a1(rgyud2): mgon/ tshogs rnams dbang bsdud ma// bka' nyan las byed ma la bdag bstod do// tri shul rtse gsum dgra bo'i lus phug nas/ g.yon pas
58a2(rgyud2): dgra bo'i lus ni bteg nas kyang // g.yas pas snying phyung bdag po'i zhal stob pa// dgra bgegs gsod byed ma la bdag bstod do// gang du bstan pa gnod byed
58a3(rgyud2): myur sgrol cing // sgrub pa po dngos grub ster byed pa// tshar gcod rjes 'dzin grub pa'i lha mo la// bdag cag mchod dang gtor me 'di 'bul gyis// dges par rol
58a4(rgyud2): la bar chad med pa dang // sgrub po la nus mthu dbang gi dngos grub gsol// ces brjod cing gtor ma dbul zhing stab pa drag tu bya'o// hUM mdzad las kyi 'gon po
58a5(rgyud2): yab yum la bstod pa'i le'u don gnyis pa'o// / b+h+yo ye shes lha mo mkhas ldan ma// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i nus mthu can// bar snang khams la gnas
58a6(rgyud2): bcas cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa'i byar byed// ma b+h+yo b+h+yo na ga mo re ma ti// 'thing nag spyan gsum 'bar ma ste// zhal cig gzhad pa'i mche ba can// dre'u rlung
58a7(rgyud2): nag gshog pa can// ral gris ngam nyams 'go lus 'khrol// tri shul bzas pa'i snying la gzir// 'jig rten khams kyi dbang ma tshon// ba dan g.yang
58a8(rgyud2): mos ma tshogs bsdus// ma b+h+yo sha za nag mo che/ kha 'bar chen mo dbang bsdad ma// ma mo srog gi shan pa mo// g.yas kyi spa gris dgra srog gcod//
58b1(rgyud2): g.yon gyi lcags kyus zung cing thob// srin mo khros ma'i dus byab// dred mo khams nag byibs su phyibs// stobs chen drag ma'i dus la bab// ma b+h+yo b+h+yo thu
58b2(rgyud2): lum 'bar ma ni/ khrag 'thung snying zan smug nag mo// bse mo ru cig phyibs su byibs// g.yas kyi spu gris blang ba gshog/ g.yon gyi thod khrag
58b3(rgyud2): zhal du rngubs// sgyu zhabs rag ti'i thig can// sgo 'bog khrag nad rtod byed ma// rus pa'i 'phreng bas lus brgyan ma// dam nyams rgyu ma 'dzab
58b4(rgyud2): cing drongs// gnam lcags thog chen ser ba phob// mi snyan bcug pas tshe 'phrul po ba// 'jigs pa'i rngam sgras 'dar du bcug/ drag po'i
58b5(rgyud2): nga ro 'brug ltar sgrogs// de nod nam gyi gung thun la// sprul pa'i phra men ma tshogs kyis// jam zhing rngam zhing las la rgyug/ gcod pa'i sta ris 'go
58b6(rgyud2): lus brel// ldang zhing song la dgra srog chod// sdong po rtsa ba bcas pa bzhin// rdung rgyung nas chod la shog/ khyed rnams kun gyis zas skal ni// dgra ba'i
58b7(rgyud2): sha khrag srog dbugs yani/ da lta zo cig las mkhan ma// dug mangs song la me yis sregs// thal ba rdul du rlag par gyis// hUM 'chi bdag las
58b8(rgyud2): mkhan ma ru rtse// g.yas na las kyi me long 'dzin// g.yon na bdud kyi khram shing thogs// chos kyi rgyal po'i sprul pa ste// dmar po bdud 'dul ral
59a1(rgyud2): mngonapa can// zhal cig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// ro langs ba dan la bzhugs pa ste// mi'i phyogs kyi las mkhan na// mi lpags
59a2(rgyud2): g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// lus la du sbrul nag pos brgyan// 'khor ni sgo byed brjed byed tshogs// ro langs sha za du mas bskor// 'bog nad 'go 'khor
59a3(rgyud2): dgra la btong / khram pa ma dgra bgegs 'go la rgyob// zas su dgra ba'i grad pa zo// 'byung ba sa la dbang byed pa// dam nyams lus kyi sha la zang // las
59a4(rgyud2): kyi spu gris srid rtsa rod/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// hUM las kyi srin po 'jigs pa ni// char sbran nag pa'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal cig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/
59a5(rgyud2): chu glang sngon po'i steng nas bzhengs// gzig gi stod g.yogs mdud pa byas// dpal po stag lpags rkyed la bcings// g.yas kyi ral gris gcod pan byed/
59a6(rgyud2): 'og pa mi mgo'i sgra nas bzung // g.yon pa'i spu gris myur du thob// 'og ma'i zhags pas myur du chings// ral ba khams nag gyen la gzing // chu glang
59a7(rgyud2): skad kyi sngang su chug/ bden bral phyogs nas pho nya khyod// spu gris dgra bo'i sA tsa chod// yang na khrag skyug gzer nang thong // grib non grul bum gshin rje'i
59a8(rgyud2): tshogs// ma mo ma lus rngus la// 'byung ba chu la dbang byed pas// rtsa sbubs khrag rnams ma lus drongs// sdang byed 'di'i lus po yis/ khrag dang chu
59a9(rgyud2): bang
59b1(rgyud2): zer char ltar bob/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// hUM sreg bdud nag po ma rung ba// sku mdog dud kha 'bar ba ste// zhal cig spyan gsum zhal bgrang nas//
59b2(rgyud2): mchi rtsigs mi bsrun nga ro can// ra skyes khams pa'i steng nas bzhengs// phag rgod lpags pa'i shams thabs can// drid mi'i g.yang bzhi skrag pa can/ rlung
59b3(rgyud2): lha'i phyogs kyi pho nya 'gyed// gri khug thod pas dgra snying phyung // thod pas snying khrag chu la thung // me'i khams la dbang byed pa// dgra be'i lus kyi drod
59b4(rgyud2): bsdus cig/ 'khor du sprul pa lus sprul po// lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// nag po klu'i 'khor gyi bskor// las ngan sdig can dgra bo 'di// snying
59b5(rgyud2): rtsa tshod la rings par zo/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// hUM las kyi 'chi bdag rtum po ni// ma ra tsa'i sprul pa ste// drag po srog shan rngam pa ni// sgrub
59b6(rgyud2): nag lus la rtsigs pa'i zhal// rta rgod mi zan stengs nas bzhengs// zhal cig phyag gnyis me dpung 'phro// 'khor los dgra bo'i lus po gshogs//
59b7(rgyud2): shul rtse gsum rgyab pa yis// rgyu ma rngubs la myur du zo// 'byung po'i phyogs nas las mdzod cig/ nya mdi khrab can rkyed la bcings// chu srin g.yang /
59b8(rgyud2): gzhi bstod g.yogs byas// 'khor du bdud kyi 'khor gyis bskor// dam nyams las ngan dgra bo la// zos dri glang thabs mdze nad thong // rlung gi spu bri
60a1(rgyud2): mgon/ dbang byed pa// bsrog dbugs kha phye rnam shes phrol// dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// dgra bo'i lus dang srog tu bral//
60a2(rgyud2): khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// / las kyi ma mo dang / las mkhan bstod pa'i le'u skye don gsum pa'o// // de nas drang srong thams cad
60a3(rgyud2): kyi dpal mgon po la bstod pa ni// hUM dur khrod chen po'i pho brang nas// gru gsum 'thing nag 'bar ba ste// shin du 'jigs pa'i grwa yas khang // zhing skyong
60a4(rgyud2): nag po chen po ni// bya rog ming can srin po'i gzugs// zhal cig phyag bzhi g.yas pa yis// b+he tshe'i 'bras bu ral gri bsnams// phyag g.yon thod pa kha
60a5(rgyud2): Ta 'dzin// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i khro gnyer can// spyan gsum sdang tshul phyogs bcur gzigs// dam nyams bdug pa'i sems can la// 'khros zhing
60a6(rgyud2): khrug pa'i mche bzhi rtsigs// ljags ni drag po'i glog ltar khyug/ 'jigs pa'i gad mo 'brug ltar bzhad// sku'i sprul pas dam nyams kyi// snying la ser
60a7(rgyud2): chen 'bebs par byed// u s+tha ag choms smin ma ser// thod pa rin chen sbrul gyi brgyan// mgrin pa sbom la gsus khyim che// dpa' bo stag gi shams
60a8(rgyud2): thabs can// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi stengs na// tsan dan khyil pa'i stabs kyi bzhugs// rtum po chen po g.yul las rgyal// 'jigs byed khyod la bdag bstod do//
60b1(rgyud2): ces pas so// // de nas dur khrod kyi ma mo kang ka'i la sogs las bstod pa// hUM bde gshegs thugs rje'i sku sprul pa// sems can kun la 'gon
60b2(rgyud2): skyabs mdzad// 'og mni gnas na bzhugs pa la// rab tu btud de phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bstan pa// 'drin pa'i 'jig rten mkha'
60b3(rgyud2): 'gre'i tshegs// drag po ma rung 'dul mdzad pa// ma hA ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten la gnas bdug pa 'dul// dur khrod lha mo rnams kyi gtso//
60b4(rgyud2): lha chen drag po'i skur bstan pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yis// dur khrod chen po'i rlong dkyil nas// bdug
60b5(rgyud2): ba ma lus 'dul mdzad ma// 'dul byed 'gon po nag po ni// sku mdog 'thing nag 'jigs pa la// bya rog ming can nag po che// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi steng na//
60b6(rgyud2): dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs tsan dan khyil// zhal cig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// phyag g.yas shin thog ral gri bsnams// g.yon na thod khrag kha T+wAM 'dzin// spyan
60b7(rgyud2): gsum rin chen sbrul gyis rgyan// dbu skra a ga tshems smin ma ser// mche ba rtsigs shing 'jigs byed pa// thod rlon phreng bas do shal byas// sku smad stag gi
60b8(rgyud2): shams thabs can// 'gron po dpal ldan phyag 'tshal lo// sha za ma mo bya rog 'ug pa'i tshogs// gcan zan mche ba can gyi tshems kyi bskor// ma g.yel ma 'da'
61a1(rgyud2): mgon/ @#dpal chen thugs kyi sras// zhing skyong rtse bo khyod bdag la dgongs su gsol// ma hA ka la lha'i dpon po ste// tshogs kyi bdag po mthu bo che//
61a2(rgyud2): dpal ldan khrag 'thung sran snga ru// ji ltar khas blang dam bcas pa// ma hA ka la mthu bo che// dam las ma 'da' nga tshul byon// mthun pa'i dam sngas 'di gsol
61a3(rgyud2): la// bcol ba'i 'phrin las grub par mdzod// bstan pa'i gtsug lag bsrung mdzod cig/ las su sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs// zas su sha dang khrag la
